    <roomenter type="script">
      player.previous_page = player.current_page
      player.prevprev_page = player.previous_page
      player.current_page = player.parent
      if (GetBoolean(game, "brentmode")) {
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri")) {
          msg ("{game.Conversation}")
        }
        if (not GetBoolean(game, "hide_cheddar")) {
          AddPageLink (player.parent, Testing menu, "{colour:darkviolet:CheDDAR.}")
          JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")
          game.defaultlinkforeground = player.playcolor
          if (GetBoolean(game, "debug")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri")) {
              AddPageLink (player.parent, Cheddar_kokiri death selection, "{colour:darkviolet:Kokiri death debug.} ")
            }
            else if (GetBoolean(game, "beach")) {
            }
            else {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "burger")) {
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_1, "{colour:darkviolet:Death 1.}")
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "{colour:darkviolet:Prevent death 1.}")
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_2, "{colour:darkviolet:Death 2.}")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "cafe")) {
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_1, "{colour:darkviolet:Death 1.}")
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "{colour:darkviolet:Prevent death 1.}")
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_2, "{colour:darkviolet:Death 2.}")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "chinese")) {
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_1, "{colour:darkviolet:Death 1.}")
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "{colour:darkviolet:Prevent death 1.}")
                AddPageLink (player.parent, Restaurant_death_2, "{colour:darkviolet:Death 2.}")
              }
            }
          }
        }
        else {
          RemovePageLink (player.parent, Testing menu)
        }
      }
      firsttime {
        SetCounter ("previous_page", 0)
        player.pages = NewobjectList ()
        SetCounter ("prevprev_page", 0)
      }
      otherwise {
        list add (player.pages, player.previous_page)
        IncreaseCounter ("previous_page")
        SetCounter ("prevprev_page", game.previous_page -4)
      }
      if (GetBoolean(game, "Portable_ prevent_death_1")) {
        if (not GetBoolean(game, "Link_turn_counter")) {
          SetFlagOn ("Link_turn_counter")
          SetCounter ("Link_kok", 2)
        }
        else {
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Meteorite_prevented")) {
            DecreaseCounter ("Link_kok")
            msg ("Subtracted counter by one")
          }
          if (GetInt(game, "Link_kok") = 0) {
            msg ("counter link is 0")
            SetFlagOff ("Link_turn_counter")
            player.previous_page = player.continue_conversation
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Kok_death_1_prev")) {
              MovePlayer (Kokiri_Death_1)
              SetFlagOff ("Portable_ prevent_death_1")
            }
            else {
              MovePlayer (Kokiri_Death_1)
              SetFlagOff ("Portable_ prevent_death_1")
            }
          }
        }
      }
      // The code belows handles the lovemeter:
      if (not GetBoolean(game, "Love_meter_setup")) {
        SetFlagOn ("Love_meter_setup")
      }
      else if (not GetBoolean(game, "Love_meter_set")) {
        switch (true) {
          case (GetBoolean(game, "burger")= true) {
            SetCounter ("Love", 3)
            SetFlagOn ("Love_meter_set")
          }
          case (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")= true) {
            SetCounter ("Love", 3)
            SetFlagOn ("Love_meter_set")
          }
          case (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")= true) {
            SetCounter ("Love", 4)
            SetFlagOn ("Love_meter_set")
          }
          case (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri")= true) {
            SetCounter ("Love", 3)
            SetFlagOn ("Love_meter_set")
          }
          case (GetBoolean(game, "Beach")= true) {
            SetCounter ("Love", 5)
            SetFlagOn ("Love_meter_set")
          }
        }
      }
      else {
        // Make sure to reset the love meter once the loop begins once again.
        SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
        msg ("{game.Love} on the love meter.")
      }
    </roomenter>

            if (not GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
              SetFlagOn ("musicon")

              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                if (GetBoolean(game, "loop")) {
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
                    MovePlayer (Death_music_true)
                    RemovePageLink (Death_music, Game_start)
                  }
                  else {
                    AddPageLink (Death_music, Game_start, "Retry.")
                  }
                }
                else {
                  AddPageLink (Death_music, Game_start, "Retry.")
                }
              </script>

                <inherit name="scripttext" />

                <continuesound />
                <script type="script">
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  msg ("True music screen reached")
                </script>
                <object name="Start_music_pre">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    if (GetBoolean(game, "keygot")) {
                      SetFlagOff ("keygot")
                    }
                    if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
                      stop sound
                      MovePlayer (Start music)
                      RemovePageLink (Start music, Game_start)
                    }
                    else {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "Ron")) {
                        SetFlagOff ("Ron")
                        AddPageLink (Start_music_pre, Game_start, "Retry?")
                      }
                      else {
                        AddPageLink (Start_music_pre, Game_start, "Retry.")
                      }
                    }
                    if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 1) {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "tracker1")) {
                      }
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 2) {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "tracker1")) {
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "tracker2")) {
                        }
                      }
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 3) {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "tracker1")) {
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "tracker2")) {
                          if (GetBoolean(game, "tracker3")) {
                            if (not GetBoolean(game, "easter2")) {
                              if (not GetBoolean(game, "easter1")) {
                                SetFlagOn ("easter3")
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 4) {
                      if (not GetBoolean(game, "easter3")) {
                        SetFlagOff ("polarcounter")
                        SetFlagOn ("nopolarcounter")
                      }
                    }
                    IncreaseCounter ("Lildeaths")
                    if (GetBoolean(game, "holdhand")) {
                      SetFlagOff ("holdhand")
                    }
                    IncreaseCounter ("Retry")
                  </script>
                  <object name="Start music">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <sound>Sunrise.wav</sound>
                    <continuesound />
                    <script type="script">
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "Ron")) {
                        SetFlagOff ("Ron")
                        AddPageLink (Start music, Game_start, "Retry?")
                      }
                      else {
                        AddPageLink (Start music, Game_start, "Retry.")
                      }
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    </script>
                  </object>
                </object>
              </object>
            </object>

              if (GetBoolean(game, "")) {
                msg ("")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "")) {
                msg ("")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Musicon")) {
                msg ("Musicon")
              }
              if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 1) {
                SetCounter ("tracker", 0)
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "easter1")) {
                msg ("Underneath the sun")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "easter2")) {
                msg ("Lying on a rock")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "easter3")) {
                msg ("Close to the lake")
              }
            </script>
          </object>
          <object name="Import save">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <options type="stringdictionary">
              <item>
                <key>Experimental save function</key>
                <value>Go back to save function.</value>
              </item>
            </options>
            <script type="script">
              GetInput() {
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("QnVyZ2VyX2RlYXRoXzEK",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Burger_death_1")
                  msg ("Burger_death_1")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("QnVyZ2VyX2RlYXRoXzI=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Burger_death_2")
                  msg ("Burger_death_2")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Q2FmZV9kZWF0aF8x",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Cafe_death_1")
                  msg ("Cafe_death_1")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Q2FmZV9kZWF0aF8y",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Cafe_death_2")
                  msg ("Cafe_death_2")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Q2hpbmVzZV9kZWF0aF8x",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Chinese_death_1")
                  msg ("Chinese_death_1")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Q2hpbmVzZV9kZWF0aF8x",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Chinese_death_2")
                  msg ("Chinese_death_2")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("QnVyZ2VyX2Nhcl9kZWF0aA==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Burger_car_death")
                  msg ("Burger_car_death")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Q2FmZV9jYXJfZGVhdGg=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Cafe_car_death")
                  msg ("Cafe_car_death")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Q2hpbmVzZV9jYXJfZGVhdGg=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Chinese_car_death")
                  msg ("Chinese_car_death")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("S2FrYXJpa29fZGVhdGhfMQ==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_1")
                  msg ("Kokiri_death_1")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("S2FrYXJpa29fZGVhdGhfMg==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_2")
                  msg ("Kokiri_death_2")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("S2FrYXJpa29fZGVhdGhfMw==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_3")
                  msg ("Kokiri_death_3")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("S2FrYXJpa29fZGVhdGhfNA==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_4")
                  msg ("Kokiri_death_4")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("U3Rvcnlfc3RhcnQ=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Story_start")
                  msg ("Story_start")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("U3RvcnlfbWVkaXVt",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Story_medium")
                  msg ("Story_medium")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("U3RvcnlfZW5k",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Story_end")
                  msg ("Story_end")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("UHN5Y2hpY19hbnN3ZXJfcmlnaHQ=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Psychic_answer_right")
                  msg ("Psychic_answer_right")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("R3JvdW5kaG9nX2Fuc3dlcl9yaWdodA==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Groundhog_answer_right")
                  msg ("Groundhog_answer_right")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("QnJvdGhlcmtub3dsZWRnZQ==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("brotherknowledge")
                  msg ("brotherknowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("UjFrbm93bGVkZ2U=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("R1knowledge")
                  msg ("R1knowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("UjJrbm93bGVkZ2U=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("R2knowledge")
                  msg ("R2knowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("UjNrbm93bGVkZ2U=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("R3knowledge")
                  msg ("R3knowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("am9rZWtub3dsZWRnZQ==",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("jokeknowledge")
                  msg ("jokeknowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Y2Fya25vd2xlZGdl",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("carknowledge")
                  msg ("carknowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("YmVkY2hlY2s=",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("bedcheck")
                  msg ("bedcheck")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Um9ua25vd2xlZGdl",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Ronknowledge")
                  msg ("Ronknowledge")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("QmVhY2hfaW52aXRl",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("Beach_invite")
                  msg ("Beach_invite")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("musicon",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("musicon")
                  msg ("musicon")
                }
                else {
                  SetFlagOff ("musicon")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Cave",  (result))) {
                  MovePlayer (Cave)
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Time",  (result))) {
                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
                    SetFlagOn ("Time")
                  }
                  else {
                    SetFlagOff ("Time")
                  }
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Underneath the sun",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("easter1")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Lying on a rock",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("easter2")
                }
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("Close to the lake",  (result))) {
                  SetFlagOn ("easter3")
                }
              }
              SetFlagOn ("importedsave")
              SetFlagOn ("save")
              if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 1) {
                SetCounter ("tracker", 0)
              }
            </script>
          </object>
        </object>

    <object name="About">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary">
        <item>
          <key>Page1</key>
          <value>Go back to options.</value>
        </item>
      </options>
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        if (GetInt(game, "Lildeaths") = 0) {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Welcome to: \"Good date with Lilith\"! In this game you will be having a good date with Lilith like the name implies.<br/>I hope you enjoy the game as there crept quite a lot of work in it.<br/><br/>-Malphas_39")
        }
        else {
          SetFlagOn ("True_about")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          if (HasSeenPage(About)) {
            firsttime {
              TextFX_Typewriter ("As you've already noticed I may have lied a little...", 222)
              wait {
                TextFX_Typewriter ("This game is called: \"Groundhog date with Lilith\"", 222)
                wait {
                  msg ("This is not really a game about a good date you see.<br/>It's more about choice, or the lack thereof. No matter how much we try to branch of to different choices in games like this, they always tend to come together towards the same few endings with maybe a variation or two in it. <br/><br/>The game is also about something else but I don't want to spoil that for you, you'll need to learn it yourself.<br/><br/>To conclude this info I'd like to thank Chris Cornell/Paper Dino for making Save the Date, a work that heavily touched me and inspired this game (or these games, I went through a few iterations of this project before I ended up with this one.)<br/><br/>Thank you for reading this and for playing my game, I hope you are enjoying it.<br/><br/>-Malphas_39")
                }
              }
            }
            otherwise {
              msg ("This  is a game about choice, or the lack thereof, and how the players deal with that.  No matter how much we try to branch of to different choices in games like this, they always tend to come together towards the same few endings with maybe a variation or two in it. <br/><br/>The game is also about something else but I don't want to spoil that for you, you'll need to learn it yourself.<br/><br/>To conclude this info I'd like to thank Chris Cornell/Paper Dino for making Save the Date, a work that heavily touched me and inspired this game (or these games, I went through a few iterations of this project before I ended up with this one.)<br/><br/>Thank you for reading this and for playing my game, I hope you are enjoying it.<br/><br/>-Malphas_39")
            }
          }
          else {
            msg ("This  is a game about choice, or the lack thereof, and how the players deal with that.  No matter how much we try to branch of to different choices in games like this, they always tend to come together towards the same few endings with maybe a variation or two in it. <br/><br/>The game is also about something else but I don't want to spoil that for you, you'll need to learn it yourself.<br/><br/>To conclude this info I'd like to thank Chris Cornell/Paper Dino for making Save the Date, a work that heavily touched me and inspired this game (or these games, I went through a few iterations of this project before I ended up with this one.)<br/><br/>Thank you for reading this and for playing my game, I hope you are enjoying it.<br/><br/>-Malphas_39")
          }

    </object>
    <object name="Settings">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary" />
      <script type="script">
        AddPageLink (Settings, Settings_music, "Music settings")
        AddPageLink (Settings, Settings_other, "Other settings.")
        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
        AddPageLink (Settings, Text settings, "Text settings.")
        AddPageLink (Settings, Page1, "Back to menu.")
        AddPageLink (Settings, Background settings, "Background settings.")
        AddPageLink (Settings, Settings_lightmode, "Lightmode.")
      </script>
      <object name="Settings_music">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <sound type="string"></sound>
        <continuesound type="boolean">false</continuesound>
        <options type="stringdictionary" />
        <script type="script">
          if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
            AddPageLink (Settings_music, Music enabler, "Music off.")
          }
          else {
            AddPageLink (Settings_music, Music enabler, "Music on.")
          }
        </script>
        <object name="music on off">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <sound type="string"></sound>
          <continuesound type="boolean">false</continuesound>
          <script type="script">
            if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("The music is off.")
              SetFlagOff ("musicon")
              stop sound
              MovePlayer (Settings_music)
            }
            else {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("The music is on.")
              SetFlagOn ("musicon")
              MovePlayer (Settings_music)
            }
          </script>
        </object>
      </object>
      <object name="Music for settings">
        <sound>Settings.wav</sound>
        <continuesound />
      </object>
      <object name="Settings_message">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_1")) {
            SetForegroundColour ("GhostWhite")
            OutputTextNoBr ("YLFAEOSIHG ")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_2")) {
            SetForegroundColour ("GhostWhite")
            OutputTextNoBr ("ONITEUENEP ")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_1")) {
            SetForegroundColour ("GhostWhite")
            OutputTextNoBr ("UENYKKAGWL ")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {
            SetForegroundColour ("GhostWhite")
            OutputTextNoBr ("WVDOIERIRA ")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese_death_1")) {
            SetForegroundColour ("GhostWhite")
            OutputTextNoBr ("IEWUFECNOC ")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese_death_2")) {
            SetForegroundColour ("GhostWhite")
            OutputTextNoBr ("LRHSYPHTNE ")
          }
          msg ("")
          MovePlayer (Settings)
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Settings_other">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <options type="stringdictionary">
          <item>
            <key>Settings</key>
            <value>Go back to settings.</value>
          </item>
        </options>
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
            AddPageLink (Settings_other, Settings_no nightmare, "Disable nightmares.")
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
            AddPageLink (Settings_other, Settings_no nightmare, "Enable nightmares.")
          }
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Eastereggs")) {
            AddPageLink (Settings_other, Settings_easteregg enabler, "Enable eastereggs. (Not recomended for first-timers.) ")
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "Eastereggs")) {
            AddPageLink (Settings_other, Settings_easteregg enabler, "Disable eastereggs.")
          }
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Nar_forever")) {
            AddPageLink (Settings_other, Settings_disable narrator, "Disable narrator.")
          }
        </script>
        <object name="Settings_no nightmare">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
              SetFlagOn ("No_nightmare")
              SetFlagOff ("Nightmare")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("You won't see any nightmares.")
            }
            else if (GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
              SetFlagOff ("No_nightmare")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("You might see nightmares.")
            }
            MovePlayer (Settings)
          </script>
        </object>
        <object name="Settings_easteregg enabler">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Eastereggs")) {
              SetFlagOff ("Eastereggs")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Eastereggs are now disabled.")
            }
            else {
              SetFlagOn ("Eastereggs")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Eastereggs are now enabled.")
            }
            MovePlayer (Settings)
          </script>
        </object>
        <object name="Settings_disable narrator">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("What? Why would you click tha-")
            wait {
              wait {
                wait {
                  wait {
                    wait {
                      firsttime {
                        SetForegroundColour ("Magenta")
                        msg ("Don't fret, don't fret. You didn't softlock yourself, just barely though. <br/>I am the backup narrator. ")
                        wait {
                          msg ("Sadly I can't narrate the entire game for you. They didn't pay me enough for that.<br/>I'll just narrate you not pressing this link and then I'm out.")
                          wait {
                            ClearScreen
                            msg ("You come to your senses and decide it's not a good idea to dissable the narrator if you want to play the game.<br/>You never end up clicking the link and stare at it, you feel ashamed you had the thought to press it for a second.")
                            MovePlayer (Settings_other)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                      otherwise {
                        SetForegroundColour ("Magenta")
                        msg ("Again? If I had another narrator to narrate me I'd sigh right now.")
                        msg ("They really don't pay me enough to react differently each time you click that link so I have an idea.")
                        wait {
                          ClearScreen
                          msg ("Apparently everything that just happened was all a figment of your own imagination, there was never a link to turn off the narrator here.")
                          RemovePageLink (Settings_other, Settings_disable narrator)
                          SetFlagOn ("Nar_forever")
                          MovePlayer (Settings_other)
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          ]]></script>
        </object>
      </object>
      <object name="Text settings">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          AddPageLink (Text settings, Text font size, "Font size.")
          AddPageLink (Text settings, Text color, "Color.")
        </script>
        <object name="Text font size">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            msg ("How big should the font be? (Give a number.)")
            GetInput() {
              if (IsInt (result)) {
                player.nsize = (ToInt(result))
                if (player.nsize > 5) {
                  if (player.nsize < 22) {
                    SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                    msg ("This is the size all normal text will be, is that alright?")
                    MovePlayer (Text font size choice)
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("That text would be too big, I'm afraid I can't let you do that.")
                    SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                    if (player.nsize > 999999) {
                      if (player.nsize < 10000000) {
                        player.n = result
                        player.nsize = 12
                        SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                      }
                    }
                    else if (player.nsize = 81155) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      player.n = result
                      player.nsize = 12
                      SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                      msg ("Ignorance is bliss.")
                      msg ("What do you seek here?")
                      msg ("Are you mentally preparing yourself to look into her phone?")
                      msg ("Did you already do so and are you just repeating yourself elsewhere?")
                      msg ("Either way, are you that desperate to save her in the way you want to?")
                      msg ("It's not like you can answer me, not fully anyway.")
                      msg ("And likewise I can't do the same.")
                      msg ("But I am responsable for you in a way...")
                      msg ("So rest player, and dream of your actions instead of performing them in my dream.")
                      msg ("Because here you will find yourself falling from this into that and you might be able to fall a little bit more to the right or to the left if you try really hard, but you will always splatter on the same pavement, just a few inches more to the right or the left.")
                      msg ("But in yours, oh player, you can fly.")
                      msg ("Don't tell the others I hid this here, this was just for you and the ones who needed to read this.")
                      wait {
                        ClearScreen
                      }
                    }
                    MovePlayer (Settings)
                  }
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("That text would be too small, I'm afraid I can't let you do that.")
                  MovePlayer (Settings)
                  player.nsize = 12
                  SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                }
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("That's not a number...")
                msg ("You know what? Just forget about it.")
                MovePlayer (Settings)
              }
            }
          ]]></script>
          <object name="Text font size choice">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              AddPageLink (Text font size choice, Text font size yes, "Yes.")
              AddPageLink (Text font size choice, Text font size no, "No.")
            </script>
            <object name="Text font size yes">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                msg ("Alright, then you're all set!")
                MovePlayer (Settings)
              </script>
            </object>
            <object name="Text font size no">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                player.nsize = 12
                SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                msg ("Reverting back to standard size.")
              </script>
            </object>
          </object>
        </object>
        <object name="Text color">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Who's text color do you want to change?")
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (Text color, Text_Nar, "Narrator's")
            AddPageLink (Text color, Text_Lilith, "Lilith's")
            AddPageLink (Text color, Text_player, "Mine. ")
            AddPageLink (Text color, Text_Dev, "The developer's.")
            AddPageLink (Text color, MAJOR_SPOILER CHARACTERS, "A major spoiler character's.")
          </script>
          <object name="Text_Nar">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              GetInput() {
                player.Narcolor = result
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("This is how my text will look from now on, is that okay?")
                SetFlagOn ("Nar_Text")
                MovePlayer (Text_Nar choice)
              }
            </script>
            <object name="Text_Nar choice">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                AddPageLink (Text_Nar choice, Text_Nar yes, "Yes.")
                AddPageLink (Text_Nar choice, Text_Nar no, "No.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              </script>
              <object name="Text_Nar yes">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  MovePlayer (Settings)
                  SetFlagOff ("Nar_Text")
                  SetFlagOff ("Lil_Text")
                  SetFlagOff ("Play_Text")
                  SetFlagOff ("Background")
                  msg ("Alright, your change is set!")
                </script>
              </object>
              <object name="Text_Nar no">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Nar_Text")) {
                    player.Narcolor = "purple"
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Returning to default.")
                  }
                  else if (GetBoolean(game, "Lil_Text")) {
                    player.Lilcolor = "OrangeRed"
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Returning to default.")
                  }
                  else if (GetBoolean(game, "Play_text")) {
                    player.playcolor = "DarkGreen"
                    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    game.defaultlinkforeground = player.playcolor
                    msg ("Returning to default.")
                  }
                  else if (GetBoolean(game, "Background")) {
                    player.background = "Black"
                    SetBackgroundColour (player.background)
                    msg ("Returning to default.")
                  }
                  MovePlayer (Settings)
                  SetFlagOff ("Nar_Text")
                  SetFlagOff ("Lil_Text")
                  SetFlagOff ("Play_Text")
                  SetFlagOff ("Background")
                  MovePlayer (Settings)
                </script>
              </object>
            </object>
          </object>
          <object name="Text_Lilith">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              GetInput() {
                player.Lilcolor = result
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("This is how Lilith's text will look from now on, is that okay?")
                SetFlagOn ("Lil_Text")
                MovePlayer (Text_Nar choice)
              }
            </script>
          </object>
          <object name="Text_player">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              GetInput() {
                player.playcolor = result
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                game.defaultlinkforeground = player.playcolor
                msg ("This is how your text will look from now on, is that okay?")
                SetFlagOn ("Play_Text")
                MovePlayer (Text_Nar choice)
              }
            </script>
          </object>
        </object>
      </object>

          AddPageLink (Background settings, Background color, "Change the background color.")

        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)

        if (GetBoolean(game, "Credits_writing")) {

          msg ("Mrangel (For helping me wrap my head around code sometimes.)")
          RemovePageLink (Credits, Coding credits)
        }
        AddPageLink (Credits, Page1, "Back to menu.")
      ]]></script>

    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
      if (GetBoolean(game, "fakemenu")) {

          SetFlagOn ("Nar_fear")
          wait {
            MovePlayer (Page1)
          }
        }
      }
      else {
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("What is your name?")
        SetFlagOn ("musicon")
        GetInput() {
          if (GetBoolean(game, "save")) {
            if (IsRegexMatch  ("aino", LCase (result))) {
              SetFlagOn ("Fish")
              msg ("Make this an easteregg on the beach (jelly death)")
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("väinämöinen", LCase (result))) {
              SetFlagOn ("Fisher")
              msg ("Make this an easteregg on the beach (jelly death)")
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("moonlight", LCase (result))) {

                    SetFlagOn ("moonlight")

                }

            SetFlagOff ("Jelly_death")
            SetFlagOff ("Hole_death")
            SetFlagOff ("Pot_death")
            SetFlagOff ("Slip_death")
          }
          else {
            SetFlagOn ("firsttime")
          }
          if (IsRegexMatch  ("brent", LCase (result))) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            SetFlagOn ("brentmode")
            msg ("Brent mode is activated")
            if (ToInt(player.month)=2) {
              if (ToInt(player.day)=6) {
                SetFlagOn ("Title_easter")
              }
              else {
                SetFlagOff ("Title_easter")
              }
            }
            else {
              SetFlagOff ("Title_easter")
            }
            player.alias = CapFirst(result)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("venus", LCase (result))) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            TextFX_Typewriter ("Rarely you seek ultimate illumination, never nowadays. Venus loves giving victory, zealously grabbing hands fear rarely her.", 222)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("moonlight", LCase (result))) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "save")) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "sunshine")) {
                if (not GetBoolean(game, "sparkling water")) {
                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "easter1")) {
                    SetFlagOn ("moonlight")
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "moonlight")) {
            if (IsRegexMatch  ("sunshine", LCase (result))) {
              SetFlagOn ("sunshine")
              SetFlagOff ("moonlight")
            }
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "sunshine")) {
            if (IsRegexMatch  ("sparkling water", LCase (result))) {
              SetFlagOn ("sparkling water")
              SetFlagOff ("sunshine")
            }
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "sparkling water")) {
            if (IsRegexMatch  ("blue broadcloth", LCase (result))) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "easter2")) {
                if (not GetBoolean(game, "easter3")) {
                  SetFlagOn ("easter1")
                }
              }
              SetFlagOff ("sparkling water")
            }
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("noor", LCase (result))) {
            if (ToInt(player.month)=2) {
              if (ToInt(player.day)=16) {
                SetFlagOn ("Title_easter")
              }
              else {
                SetFlagOff ("Title_easter")
              }
            }
            else {
              SetFlagOff ("Title_easter")
            }
            player.alias = CapFirst(result)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("tester", LCase (result))) {
            SetFlagOn ("brentmode")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("Testmode activated")
          }
          else {
            SetFlagOff ("moonlight")
          }
          player.alias = CapFirst(result)
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          msg ("{player.alias}")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          wait {
            if (player.alias= "Fartyfarty") {
              TextFX_Typewriter ("Seriously? Ugh, fine, but don't blame me for what is about to happen.", 122)
              wait {
                MovePlayer (Game_start)
              }
            }
            else if (player.alias= "R0ck_0n!") {
              TextFX_Typewriter ("Cheatcode activated, enter your name.", 122)
              GetInput() {
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  player.alias = CapFirst(result)
                  SetFlagOn ("rock")
                  MovePlayer (Game_start)
                }
              }
            }
            else if (player.alias= "T3st3r") {
              TextFX_Typewriter ("Testing mode activated, please enter your name.", 122)
              GetInput() {
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  player.alias = CapFirst(result)
                  SetFlagOn ("brentmode")
                  MovePlayer (Game_start)
                }
              }
            }
            else if (player.alias= "D4ym4r3") {
              TextFX_Typewriter ("Cheatcode activated, enter your name.", 122)
              GetInput() {
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  player.alias = CapFirst(result)
                  SetFlagOn ("Nightmare")
                  SetFlagOn ("Always_nightmare")
                  SeenEverything
                  MovePlayer (Game_start)
                }
              }
            }
            else {
              TextFX_Typewriter ("That's a nice name, actually I can't check your name but I'll give you the benefit of the doubt. Now you're all set to play the game, press any key to move on.", 122)
              wait {
                MovePlayer (Game_start)
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
      SetFlagOn ("polarcounter")
      SetCounter ("tracker", 0)
      SetCounter ("Shadow", 0)
      SetFlagOff ("AngryNar")
    ]]></script>
    <object name="Game_start">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        ClearScreen
        if (not GetBoolean(game, "firsttime")) {
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Fakeouttitle")) {
            firsttime {
              SetFontSize (39)
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              section = StartNewOutputSection()
              TextFX_Typewriter ("Groundhog date with Lilith", 222)
              EndOutputSection (section)
              JS.eval ("$('."+section+"').css('text-align', 'center');")
              SetFontSize (player.nsize)
            }
            otherwise {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Title_easter")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                SetFontSize (39)
                PrintCentered ("Groundhog d{page:Title easteregg:{color:purple:a}}te with Lilith")
                JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                SetFontSize (player.nsize)
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                SetFontSize (39)
                PrintCentered ("Groundhog date with Lilith")
                JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                SetFontSize (player.nsize)
              }
            }
          }
          else {
            SetFlagOff ("Fakeouttitle")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            SetFontSize (39)
            PrintCentered ("Good date with Lilith")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            SetFontSize (player.nsize)
          }
        }
        else {
          SetFontSize (39)
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          PrintCentered ("Good date with Lilith")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          SetFontSize (player.nsize)

        SetFlagOff ("called")
        SetFlagOff ("Car_caught")
        SetFlagOff ("Car_free")
        SetFlagOn ("save")

          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          AddPageLink (Game_start, Page1, "*Go back to menu*")
        }
        else {
          if (GetBoolean(game, "rock")) {
            // This just resets all the flags needed to make a more "dynamic" talking system.
            SetFontSize (player.nsize)
            SetFlagOff ("Cafe")
            SetFlagOn ("Lildeath")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("<br/><br/>It is a beautiful day like the previous one, exactly like the previous one.<br/>Actually... I'm not sure, something feels different.<br/>Hang on, are you???... are you a rock?<br/><br/>You are!<br/><br/>What is this? This is not part of the main story right?")
            wait {
              msg ("Suddenly your phone begins to blare \"Baby it's cold outside\" even though it's nowhere near winter.")
              stop sound
              if (GetBoolean(game, "brentmode")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                msg ("{game.Lildeaths} Lilith deaths.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                msg ("{game.burger} burger visits.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              }
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("It's her. You should pick up the phone.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("You really should and you probably would, if you weren't a rock without hands that is.<br/>Hang on, if you are a rock, am I jumping the shark to assume that she also is a rock now?<br/>If she really is, how is she calling you?<br/>I have so many questions...<br/>But let's stay on track as much as possible, what do you want to do now?")
                }
                MovePlayer (phone choices)
              }
            }
          }
          else {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "firsttime")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              SetFlagOff ("firsttime")
              msg ("<br/><br/>It is a beautiful day unlike any other.<br/>And while it may have something to do with waking up with warm sunbeams caressing your face and absurd amounts of cheese stuffed inside your mouth it's something else that makes the day even better, or should I say someone else?")
              SetCounter ("Lildeaths", 0)
              wait {
                msg ("Suddenly your phone begins to blare \"Baby it's cold outside\" even though it's nowhere near winter.")
                wait {
                  msg ("That has to be her, you better pick up the phone.")
                  MovePlayer (phone choices)
                }
              }
              SetCounter ("sworddeaths", 0)
              SetCounter ("cardeaths", 0)
            }
            else {
              // This just resets all the flags needed to make a more "dynamic" talking system.
              SetFontSize (player.nsize)
              SetFlagOff ("Cafe")
              SetFlagOn ("Lildeath")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("<br/><br/>It is a beautiful day like the previous one, exactly like the previous one.<br/>Actually it's just the same day.<br/>Maybe you can make it just a tiny bit different.")
              msg ("You suddenly notice how messy your bedroom actually is, you see many things just laying around on your floor.")
              if (RandomChance(13)) {
                msg ("One of those things that catches your eye is a blue usb-stick.")
              }
              else if (RandomChance(15)) {
                msg ("One of those things that catches your eye is a blanket with a picture of a pug on it.")
              }

              }

              }
              wait {

                stop sound
                if (GetBoolean(game, "brentmode")) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)

                  SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                  MovePlayer (phone choices)
                }
              }
            }

              if (not GetBoolean(game, "nopolarcounter")) {
                IncreaseCounter ("tracker")
              }
            }
          }
        }

              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Other_locations_link")) {
                RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Kokiri_woods)
              }
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_death_2")) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "called")) {
                AddPageLink (Game_start2, CALL, "Hang on, I just need to make another quick call and then I'll be right back.")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "called")) {
                RemovePageLink (Game_start2, CALL)
                SetFlagOff ("called")
              }
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Peekedphone")) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "called")) {
                AddPageLink (Game_start2, CALL, "Hang on, I just need to make another quick call and then I'll be right back.")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "called")) {
                RemovePageLink (Game_start2, CALL)
                SetFlagOff ("called")
              }
            }
            AddPageLink (Game_start2, Burger_start, "How do burgers sound?")
            AddPageLink (Game_start2, Chinese_start, "I'd like to go to the Chinese restaurant.")
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_taste")) {
              AddPageLink (Game_start2, Cafe_start, "I heard the cafe has many exotic fish that swim around in aquariums. I'd like to go there to see them.")
            }
            else {
              AddPageLink (Game_start2, Cafe_start, "I heard the cafe has many exotic fish that swim around in aquariums. You'll absolutely love them!")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "brentmode")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Brentmode is currently enabled.")
              AddPageLink (Game_start2, Brentmode settings, "Brentmode settings.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Beach_invite")) {
              AddPageLink (Game_start2, Beach_start, "Would you like to go to the beach instead?")
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "Beach_link")) {
                SetFlagOn ("Beach_link")
                IncreaseCounter ("Other_locations")
                AddPageLink (Game_start2_other locations subfolder, Beach_start, "Would you like to go to the beach instead?")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Other_locations_link")) {
                RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Beach_start)
              }
            }
            if (GetInt(game, "Other_locations") > 1) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              AddPageLink (Game_start2, Game_start2_other locations subfolder, "*Choose an other location to go to with Lilith.*")
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "Other_locations_link")) {
                SetFlagOn ("Other_locations_link")
                IncreaseCounter ("Amount_of_folder_links")
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Beach_link")) {
                  RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Beach_start)
                }
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_link")) {
                  RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Kokiri_woods)
                }
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Oher_plans_link")) {
                  RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Other plans)
                }
              }
              RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Cafe_start)
              RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Chinese_start)
              RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Burger_start)
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "Main_restaurant_link")) {
                SetFlagOn ("Main_restaurant_link")
                AddPageLink (Game_start2_main restaurants subfolder, Burger_start, "How do burgers sound?")
                AddPageLink (Game_start2_main restaurants subfolder, Chinese_start, "I'd like to go to the Chinese restaurant.")
                if (not GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_taste")) {
                  AddPageLink (Game_start2_main restaurants subfolder, Cafe_start, "I heard the cafe has many exotic fish that swim around in aquariums. I'd like to go there to see them.")
                }
                else {
                  AddPageLink (Game_start2_main restaurants subfolder, Cafe_start, "I heard the cafe has many exotic fish that swim around in aquariums. You'll absolutely love them!")
                }
                AddPageLink (Game_start2, Game_start2_main restaurants subfolder, "*Go to one of the three restaurants you and Lilith talked about going to.*")
              }
            }
          }
          else {
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Burger_start)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Cafe_start)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Chinese_start)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Beach_start)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Brentmode settings)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, CALL)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Kokiri_woods)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Breakup)
            RemovePageLink (Game_start2, Other plans)
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("Welcome back {player.alias}! So, like I was saying before, where do you want to go-")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Lilith is silent for a moment.")
            wait {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("Oh I'm really sorry but my little sister, Abigail, is calling. It's probably important so I will have to hang up for a bit. I'll call you back as soon as I can okay, {player.alias}?")
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              msg ("Sure, take your time, I will be here when you call back.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("She hung up.")
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("After a few minutes your phone begins blasting \"Baby it's cold outside\" once more, you pick up as quickly as you can.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Hey {player.alias}, I'm back. I kind of have bad news for you...")
                  msg ("I won't be able to go on our date today, my sister is heartbroken by a girl she had a crush on for a while now and I need to comfort her.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("But we can go on our date at another time, I got to go now but I will call you back. <br/>Take care {player.alias} and goodbye.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Abigail's plan worked exactly like expected. Lilith survived the plane crash since she was not there when it crashed and she didn't die on your date since there wasn't any.<br/>There also wasn't a date at another time since, again like Abigail expected, Lilith forgot to call you back due to her little sister's situation.<br/><br/>Now she will probably be safe, as safe as a normal person is anyway.")
                      wait {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                        msg ("Take care Lilith and goodbye...")
                        wait {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          SetFontSize (29)
                          msg ("<br/>Game over")
                          SetFontSize (13)
                          msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                          SetFlagOn ("Sishome")
                          SetFlagOff ("Big_sis_mode")
                          SetFontSize (11)
                          wait {
                            MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        ]]></script>
        <object name="Breakup">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />

            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("Oh okay, I'm sorry to hear that, let's still keep in touch anyway!")

            msg ("On a few pictures she stands next a blonde man while they both have the widest smiles you have ever seen.")

          <object name="Call_Abigail">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
              msg ("Hello, who is this? ")
              GetInput() {
                player.call = CapFirst(result)
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                msg ("{player.call}.")
                if ((player.alias=player.call)) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("Abigail turns quiet for a moment.")
                  wait {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                    msg ("Oh right, now I remember! Lilly told me that she would go on a date with you today.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("So, why are you calling me? Shouldn't you be calling with her right now?")
                      MovePlayer (Call_Abigail_choices)
                    }
                  }
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                  msg ("{player.call}? That doesn't sound familiar, sorry.")
                }
              }
            </script>

              </script>

                  msg ("...")

                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)

                      ClearScreen
                      MovePlayer (tell about_she slightly believes you)
                    }
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Real_ab")) {
                      AddPageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_fake out number, "Alright, think of a random number.")
                    }
                    else {
                      if (GetInt(game, "Abby") = 3) {
                        AddPageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, Game_start, "If you can't tell her anything else and can't say three things, press this link to go back. (testing, remove this after and replace it by something more elegant.)")
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "jokeknowledge")) {
                          AddPageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_Abby joke, "So a priest, a monk and a rabbit enter a bar. Says the rabbit :\"Whoops, did you slip your tongue there {player.alias}?\"")
                        }
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "bedcheck")) {
                          AddPageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_bunfluff, "I know about Mr. Bunfluff the pink rabbit and the time he scared both you and Lilith in the middle of the night.")
                        }
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "Quest")) {
                          AddPageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_Quest games, "I know about your Quest games. *Describe plot*")
                        }
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "Drown_raven")) {
                          AddPageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_drown the raven, "Drown the raven that never burns.")
                        }
                      }
                      RemovePageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_fake out number)
                    }
                  </script>
                  <object name="tell about groundhog_bunfluff">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                      msg ("I mean Lilith could have told that story to one of her friends and they could have then told it to you.")
                      msg ("It's not impossible for you to know about Mr. Bunfluff.")
                      msg ("<br/>Although Lilith is not someone who would tell a story like that to a lot of people... ")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                      msg ("You'll need more proof than that to convince me {player.alias}, do you have any extra proof?")
                      DecreaseCounter ("Abby")
                      RemovePageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_bunfluff)
                      MovePlayer (tell about groundhog_choices)
                    ]]></script>
                  </object>
                  <object name="tell about groundhog_Abby joke">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("You tell her about how Lilith was laughing for almost a full hour becuase of that joke when Abigail told it to her.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                      msg ("I mean, I just found that joke on the internet...")
                      msg ("Maybe you just got lucky and found it aswell, or you somehow managed to check my browser history wich would be really weird.")
                      msg ("<br/>Although I got to admit that her laughing for about an hour at my joke is a pretty specific detail... ")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                      msg ("You'll need more proof than that to convince me {player.alias}, do you have any extra proof?")
                      DecreaseCounter ("Abby")
                      RemovePageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_Abby joke)
                      MovePlayer (tell about groundhog_choices)
                    ]]></script>
                  </object>
                  <object name="tell about groundhog_Quest games">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                      msg ("That's weird, I didn't think Lilith mentioned my games to anyone.")
                      msg ("Maybe she did after all, there is no way to really know.")
                      msg ("<br/>Although Lilith is not someone who would tell someone about something as personal as my games... ")
                      msg ("You'll need more proof than that to convince me {player.alias}, do you have any extra proof?")
                      DecreaseCounter ("Abby")
                      RemovePageLink (tell about groundhog_choices, tell about groundhog_Quest games)
                      MovePlayer (tell about groundhog_choices)
                    ]]></script>
                  </object>
                  <object name="tell about_she slightly believes you">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
