      </object>
      <object name="phone choices">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <options type="stringdictionary" />
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          if (GetBoolean(game, "rock")) {
            AddPageLink (phone choices, phone choices_pick up, "*Remember that all rocks have a telepathic network to communicate with eachother and use it to reach out to Lilith.*")
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "rockfloor")) {
              AddPageLink (phone choices, phone choices_no pick up, "*Struggle against your inescapable prison of a body and try to roll to the phone *")
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (phone choices, phone choices_no pick up)
              SetFlagOff ("rockfloor")
            }
          }
          else {
            AddPageLink (phone choices, phone choices_no pick up, "*Do not pick up the phone*")
            AddPageLink (phone choices, phone choices_pick up, "*Pick up the phone*")
            AddPageLink (phone choices, Page1, "*Game options*")
            if (GetBoolean(game, "bedcheck")) {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "keyseennow")) {
                SetFlagOff ("keyseennow")
                RemovePageLink (phone choices, Look under bed)
              }
              else if (not GetBoolean(game, "keyseennow")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "keyseen")) {
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "keyname")) {
                    AddPageLink (phone choices, Look under bed, "Check up on {player.key}.")
                  }
                  else if (not GetBoolean(game, "keyname")) {
                    AddPageLink (phone choices, Look under bed, "Look at the key once more.")
                  }
                }
                else if (not GetBoolean(game, "keyseen")) {
                  AddPageLink (phone choices, Look under bed, "Look under the bed for monsters.")
                }
              }
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (phone choices, Look under bed)
            }
          }
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
        </script>
        <object name="phone choices_pick up">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            if (GetBoolean(game, "rock")) {
              if (player.alias= "Fartyfarty") {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Hey-")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith burst out into laughter.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Fartyfarty. Hahahahaha.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("Don't worry, soon it will be out of her system.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("Very soon.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("It could be at any moment now.")
                      wait {
                        msg ("...any moment...")
                        wait {
                          msg ("...any moment...")
                          wait {
                            msg ("...any moment...")
                            wait {
                              msg ("...any moment...")
                              wait {
                                msg ("...any moment...")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("...any moment...")
                                  wait {
                                    msg ("You know what? I'm not doing this anymore, go reset the game to change your name!")
                                    wait {
                                      MovePlayer (Page1)
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Hey {player.alias}! <br/>It's me, Lilith.<br/>But you probably knew that already since you called me via our telepathic rock-link.<br/>I wish I had thought of that, you don't want to know how long it took for me to call you with my phone.<br/>I'm still not sure why they are made to be so impractical for us.<br/><br/>I was just calling you to see to which of the three places we mentioned you'd like to go for our date.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                MovePlayer (Game_start2)
              }
            }
            else {
              if (player.alias= "Fartyfarty") {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Hey-")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith burst out into laughter.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Fartyfarty. Hahahahaha.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("Don't worry, soon it will be out of her system.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("Very soon.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("It could be at any moment now.")
                      wait {
                        msg ("...any moment...")
                        wait {
                          msg ("...any moment...")
                          wait {
                            msg ("...any moment...")
                            wait {
                              msg ("...any moment...")
                              wait {
                                msg ("...any moment...")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("...any moment...")
                                  wait {
                                    msg ("You know what? I'm not doing this anymore, go reset the game to change your name!")
                                    wait {
                                      MovePlayer (Page1)
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Hey {player.alias}! <br/>It's me, Lilith.<br/>I'm just calling you to see to which of the three places we mentioned you'd like to go for our date.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                MovePlayer (Game_start2)
              }
            }
          ]]></script>
        </object>
        <object name="phone choices_no pick up">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            if (GetBoolean(game, "rock")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("You use all your strength to slowly wiggle a little bit, falling out of your bed and landing right on the soft carpet near it.")
              msg ("One problem... your phone is lying on the nightstand beside your bed and there is no way you are getting up there from the ground.")
              msg ("So, that brings us back to the question, what are you going to do?")
              SetFlagOn ("rockfloor")
              MovePlayer (phone choices)
            }
            else {
              if (GetInt(game, "Lildeaths") = 0) {
                SetFlagOn ("Fakeouttitle")
                if (not GetBoolean(game, "not_first_time_declined")) {
                  SetCounter ("Times_declined", 0)
                  IncreaseCounter ("Time_declined")
                  SetFlagOn ("not_first_time_declined")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("You stood up your date before even knowing what she was like, why?<br/>")
                  msg ("Just because you could?")
                  msg ("Just because that was an option?")
                  msg ("<br/>The name of the game is \"Good date with Lilith\" so unless you like not playing this game you better choose the other choice next time.")
                  MovePlayer (no pick up_retry page)
                }
                else {
                  if (GetInt(game, "Times_declined") < 5) {
                    IncreaseCounter ("Time_declined")
                  }
                  else {
                    SetFlagOn ("punishment_ending")
                  }
                }
                switch (true) {
                  case (game.Time_declined = 2) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Why did you choose that option again?")
                    msg ("Were you expecting that something would be different?")
                    msg ("Well, I guess that something else did happen because of my new dialogue to acknowledge you coming back.")
                    msg ("Please interact with the game properly, you had your fill of secret dialogue so go pick up that phone.")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (no pick up_retry page)
                    }
                  }
                  case (game.Time_declined = 3) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Are you still looking for extra dialogue? ")
                    msg ("Or maybe you just want to defy me? Or even worse, defy the game?")
                    msg ("Are you trying to refrain from taking an action?")
                    msg ("Go ahead, because you are just fooling yourself.")
                    msg ("You are not tricking us, we are tricking you.<br/>We are the storyteller and the writer of this story afterall.")
                    msg ("Even choosing not to walk any road at all is still choosing one.")
                    msg ("Now, leave this road and do not come back.")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (no pick up_retry page)
                    }
                  }
                  case (game.Time_declined = 5) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("It seems like you ignored my recommendations.")
                    msg ("I guess I can't stop you that way.")
                    msg ("In here you are dependent on me to give you the content you want to consume but I am also dependent on you and the way you engage with that content.")
                    msg ("But you, you keep engaging with one small detail of the game instead of the vast expanse of other posibilities. If I would let this keep sliding I'd have to ask some of the other storytellers to give you the text here. I'm not going to let that happen though.")
                    msg ("Have fun not being able to make any choice at all, this is my punishment to you.")
                    msg ("Next time, please pick up that phone")
                    wait {
                      ClearScreen
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                      msg ("The punishment ending (work on the name)")
                    }
                  }
                  case (game.Time_declined = 4) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("You have the right idea, I'll give you that but you never experienced what the game had to offer you.")
                    msg ("Or have you played the game before?")
                    msg ("In any case I highly recommend you to not come back to the choice you just made.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Add some extra dialogue.")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (no pick up_retry page)
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                msg ("Make a few of these endings check if the player has seen every normal restaurant, only one restaurant, if the player has seen the forest, the beach etc.")
                switch (true) {
                  case (game.Lildeaths > 20) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Letting go is never easy.")
                    msg ("You had at least {game.Lildeaths} opportunities.")
                    msg ("It's good to take it after all this time {player.alias}")
                    msg ("At the very least you know Lilith will be fine.")
                    msg ("At the very least you still have all of your memories of the times you spent together.")
                    msg ("If only you could somehow make more memories and have her survive...")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Change this text slightly to make it fit better.")
                    msg ("Letting go ending")
                  }
                  case (game.Lildeaths > 9) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Maybe it's for the best...")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("An ending.")
                  }
                  case (game.Lildeaths = 1) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Oh wow, that was quick.")
                    msg ("You don't really like confronting your problems, right?")
                    msg ("All those potential choices you could make to change something, anything.")
                    msg ("And your first attempt is to just... give up?")
                    msg ("I guess you are allowed to, it just kind of feels like a waste to have this entire game made only for you to see one path and just quit.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("The quitter ending.")
                  }
                  case (game.Lildeaths <= 9) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Add an ending here aswell. (2-9 deaths)")
                  }
                }
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                AddPageLink (phone choices_no pick up, Game_start, "Retry?")
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Lakemet")) {
                  AddPageLink (phone choices_no pick up, Kokiri_visit alone, "Visit the Kokiri forest on your own.")
                }
              }
            }
          ]]></script>
          <object name="no pick up_retry page">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              AddPageLink (no pick up_retry page, Game_start, "Retry")
            </script>
          </object>
        </object>
        <object name="Look under bed">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "keyseen")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("With Lilith's story about the \"monster\" underneath the bed still in your mind you decide to check underneath your own bed. ")
              msg ("There is no monster under your bed, there is however a metal key lying there. The key has the number 22 engraved in it's metal.<br/>You are not sure what this key could even be used for... well, to open something of course but you have no idea what it could open so you let it lie right where you've found it like the procrastinator you are.")
              SetFlagOn ("keyseen")
              SetFlagOn ("keyseennow")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("The phone keeps ringing, you should probably decide whether to pick up or not because soon you won't have that choice anymore.")
              MovePlayer (phone choices)
            }
            else if (GetBoolean(game, "keyseen")) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "keyname")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("You look once again at the mystery key, you almost feel guilty for not letting it out of it's dark prison of isolation.<br/>Shouldn't you pick it up already?<br/>No, best to just name the key instead, make sure it's a good name!")
                SetFlagOn ("keyseennow")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                GetInput() {
                  player.key = CapFirst(result)
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  msg ("{player.key}.")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("What a lovely name for a lovely key!")
                  SetFlagOn ("keyname")
                  if ((player.alias=player.key)) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("You named it after yourself? How vain!  ")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("The phone keeps ringing, you should probably decide whether to pick up or not because soon you won't have that choice anymore.")
                      MovePlayer (phone choices)
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetFlagOn ("keyseennow")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("The phone keeps ringing, you should probably decide whether to pick up or not because soon you won't have that choice anymore.")
                    MovePlayer (phone choices)
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                SetFlagOn ("keyseennow")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("You wave hello to {player.key}, you like to imagine they waved back but you have no way of knowing.<br/>Let's hope they did not physically wave back because they are a key and not because {player.key} is ignoring you.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("The phone keeps ringing, you should probably decide wheter to pick up or not because soon you won't have that choice anymore.")
                  MovePlayer (phone choices)
                }
              }
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "keyuse")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("For now you will automatically pick it up, add an option to do so or not to do so.")
              SetFlagOn ("keygot")
              MovePlayer (Game_start2)
            }
          ]]></script>
        </object>
      </object>

          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
          </script>
          <object name="Riddle one menu">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              AddPageLink (Riddle one menu, Riddle one retry, "I'd like to give it another shot.")
              AddPageLink (Riddle one menu, Riddle one answer, "I'd like to know the answer.")
            </script>
            <object name="Riddle one answer">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("The answer is Arachne.")
                SetFlagOn ("R1knowledge")
                msg ("<br/>Let's move on to the next riddle.")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Riddle two retry)
                }
              ]]></script>
            </object>
            <object name="Riddle one retry">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Here it comes once more.<br/><br/>")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("To taunt the gods with webs of lies<br/>is to hang but not to die.<br/>")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                if (GetBoolean(game, "R1knowledge")) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Arachne.")
                }
                GetInput() {
                  if (IsRegexMatch  ("arachne", LCase (result))) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("That's right!")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Lets try out the next riddle.")
                      wait {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Carried by Lightning with a crown of moon.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "R2knowledge")) {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                          msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Europa.")
                        }
                        GetInput() {
                          if (IsRegexMatch  ("europa", LCase (result))) {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("That's right!<br/>")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("Lets try out the next riddle.")
                            wait {
                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                              msg ("The musical barterer returned empty-handed from the underworld.")
                              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                              msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                              msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                              if (GetBoolean(game, "R3knowledge")) {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Orpheus.")
                              }
                              GetInput() {
                                if (IsRegexMatch  ("orpheus", LCase (result))) {
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  msg ("That's right!")
                                  wait {
                                    MovePlayer (Riddle evalution page)
                                  }
                                }
                                else {
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                                  wait {
                                    IncreaseCounter ("R3W")
                                    IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                                    MovePlayer (Riddle three menu)
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                          else {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                            wait {
                              IncreaseCounter ("R2W")
                              IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                              MovePlayer (Riddle two menu)
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                    wait {
                      IncreaseCounter ("R1W")
                      IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                      MovePlayer (Riddle one menu)
                    }
                  }
                }
              ]]></script>
            </object>
          </object>
          <object name="Riddle three menu">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />

              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Carried by Lightning with a crown of moon.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                if (GetBoolean(game, "R2knowledge")) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Europa.")
                }
                GetInput() {
                  if (IsRegexMatch  ("europa", LCase (result))) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("That's right!<br/>")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Lets try out the next riddle.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("The musical barterer returned empty-handed from the underworld.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "R3knowledge")) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                        msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Orpheus.")
                      }
                      GetInput() {
                        if (IsRegexMatch  ("orpheus", LCase (result))) {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("That's right!")
                          wait {
                            MovePlayer (Riddle evalution page)
                          }
                        }
                        else {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                          wait {
                            IncreaseCounter ("R3W")
                            IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                            MovePlayer (Riddle three menu)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                    wait {
                      IncreaseCounter ("R2W")
                      IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                      MovePlayer (Riddle two menu)
                    }
                  }
                }
              ]]></script>
            </object>
          </object>
          <object name="Riddle evalution page">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              if (GetInt(game, "R1W") = 0) {
                if (GetInt(game, "R2W") = 0) {
                  if (GetInt(game, "R3W") = 0) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Wow, you got them all right, color me impressed!")
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "R1knowledge")) {
                      if (not GetBoolean(game, "R2knowledge")) {
                        if (not GetBoolean(game, "R3knowledge")) {
                          if (not GetBoolean(game, "nmDetect")) {
                            SetFlagOn ("mDetect")
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "RW") = 1) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Only one riddle wrong, not shabby at all!")
                SetFlagOn ("nmDetect")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "RW") <= 3) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("You did pretty great, you gave it your best shot!")
                SetFlagOn ("nmDetect")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "RW") <= 6) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("You are pretty determined, I like that!")
                SetFlagOn ("nmDetect")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "RW") > 6) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Oh, did I make my riddles too hard?")
                SetFlagOn ("nmDetect")
              }
              SetCounter ("R1W", 0)
              SetCounter ("R2W", 0)
              SetCounter ("R3W", 0)
              SetCounter ("RW", 0)
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour ("OrangeRed")
                msg ("What did you think of my riddles {player.alias}?")
                MovePlayer (Riddle rating)
              }
            ]]></script>
            <object name="Riddle rating">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                AddPageLink (Riddle rating, Riddle rating_easy, "They were pretty easy actually. (Make both a rude and a non-rude version of this that unlocks if you get all 3 answers right)")
                AddPageLink (Riddle rating, Riddle rating_good, "They were pretty well made, I like them a lot!")
                AddPageLink (Riddle rating, Riddle rating_hard, "The riddles were really hard to be honest with you. (Make this one and the rude option beneath it dissapear if you got all three questions right)")
                AddPageLink (Riddle rating, Riddle rating_hard rude, "How was I ever supposed to get those riddles? You made them way too hard.")
                SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
                msg ("Make sure to properly write all this linktext.")
                SetForegroundColour ("DarkGreen")
              </script>
              <object name="Riddle rating_good">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                  SetForegroundColour ("OrangeRed")
                  msg ("I'm really happy to hear that you liked them!<br/>I was kind of scared that I might have made them too hard.")
                  SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
                  msg ("Add some varying text from here based on how many times you had to try.<br/><br/>-But you seem like a natural with riddles. Have you ever learned about Greek and Roman myths before? (Make the narrator say that you had in the previous loops at the very least.)<br/><br/>-But you seem to like a challenge. (Make the narrator mention that maybe that's why you keep coming back to this game.)")
                  Railroad_riddles
                ]]></script>
              </object>

                  SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
                  msg ("Add some different extra text based on how many times you had to retry.")
                  Railroad_riddles
                ]]></script>
              </object>

                  wait {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)

                    <object name="Chinese_Abby_tell me more_funny memory">
                      <inherit name="scripttext" />
                      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        if (GetInt(game, "tracker") = 2) {
                          SetFlagOn ("tracker2")
                        }
                        msg ("I think I have a story you'll find quite funny, just stop me when I'm talking too much alright?")
                        wait {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("Abigail was like five years old at the time of our story.<br/>One night she shook me until I was awake, we used to share a bedroom with a bunk bed.")
                          wait {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("She told me she heard whispering and laughing coming from underneath our bed and begged me to go investigate it.")
                            wait {

                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                msg ("As I stood before the dark opening underneath the bunk bed I felt as if something was watching me. But monsters didn't exist, right?")

                                  msg ("Right when I was thinking that I heard something whisper.<br/>I was terrified but as Abby's big sister I couldn't let her know I was so I tried to compose myself as best as I could and looked underneath the bed.<br/>")
                                  wait {
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                    msg ("It was pitch-black so I decided to put my head fully underneath the bed, alongside with my right arm.<br/>My hand brushed against something soft and just as I grabbed it laughter came from underneath the bed.")
                                    wait {
                                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                      msg ("I jumped back out, utterly terrified, nearly bursting out in tears.<br/>In my hand I held a pink bear, Abby's favourite toy, Mr. bunfluff.")

                                        msg ("Apparently he was causing all that ruckus, his voicebox was slightly malfunctioning .")

                              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)

                              wait {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                msg ("I also sometimes feel like I will lose Abigail. When that happens I always try to give it my all so that that won't happen.")
                                msg ("If your situation with the person you mentioned is even slightly similair I'm sure you'll figure something out.")
                                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                switch (true) {
                                  case (game.Lildeaths < 4) {
                                    msg ("Lilith's words fill your heart with hope, maybe there is a way to save her. ")
                                  }
                                  case (game.Lildeaths < 7) {
                                    msg ("You are not sure if you can figure something out to save Lilith but you have to try it, for her.")
                                  }
                                  case (game.Lildeaths > 7) {
                                    msg ("You try to hold back your tears as to not alert her to something being wrong. You have seen her die so many times,. <br/>Reliving her deaths over and over while only being able to change the way to them slightly is really messing with you.")
                                  }
                                  default {
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                                    msg ("Error.")
                                  }
                                }
                                wait {
                                  MovePlayer (Chinese_phone bathroom)
                                }
                              }
                            ]]></script>

                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("Well for one, games made by a small team or even one person are almost an imprint of what those people were thinking right when they made their project.")

                                wait {
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  msg ("It's here where things begin getting a bit... special.")

                                    wait {
                                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                      msg ("It's only one voice in there but they always refer to them as if there are multiples.<br/>They keep going on and on about how you are speaking in a \"stolen voice\" and how no one wants to listen to you.<br/>And yet they keep begging you to speak, not because they listen to you or understand your words but because they like the color of your text, light green.<br/><br/>")
                                      wait {

                                        msg ("The prisoner keeps talking, mostly insulting you and commanding you to bow before them.<br/>After what felt like probably ten minutes of pure nonsense reactions to my input another voice began to speak.<br/>")
                                        wait {
                                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                          msg ("That voice was dark green, <br/>It also didn't really pay attention to what I was saying but the prisoner also didn't seem to notice the other voice.<br/>It kept calling out for help, repeatedly.")
                                          wait {
                                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                            msg ("<br/>I tried typing just the word \"help\" in the textbox, suddenly the door opened.<br/>A link appeared, if you clicked it you would enter the room so I did, I wanted to know who was talking to me this entire time.")
                                            wait {
                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                              msg ("<br/>There was no one there...<br/>Suddenly the door shut and I was locked inside.<br/><br/>After a while you begin speaking the same nonsense as the prisoner, in dark blue aswell.<br/>That's when the game ends abruptly and turns to black.")
                                              wait {
                                                ClearScreen
                                                wait {
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                  msg ("Oh, I've been talking longer than I thought I would, maybe it's better to not talk about the other game then. <br/>What do you think {player.alias}?")
                                                  wait {

                                                  }
                                                }

                                            }
                                          }
                                        }
                                      }
                                    }

                              <object name="Abby game theme choices">
                                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                <script type="script">
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                  AddPageLink (Abby game theme choices, Game theme_loops, "The theme seems to be about loops.")
                                  AddPageLink (Abby game theme choices, Game theme_pure nonsense, "There seems to be no theme, it's just pure nonsense.")
                                </script>
                                <object name="Game theme_loops">
                                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                  <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)

        <object name="Chinese_riddles_choice">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour ("DarkGreen")
            AddPageLink (Chinese_riddles_choice, Chinese_riddles_decline, "I'd rather not actually, I'm pretty bad at answering riddles.")
            AddPageLink (Chinese_riddles_choice, Chinese_riddles_accept, "Sure, I'd like that!")
          </script>
          <object name="Chinese_riddles_decline">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
              msg ("Make Lilith suggest that you ask her riddles instead.")
            </script>
          </object>
          <object name="Chinese_riddles_accept">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              SetCounter ("R1W", 0)
              SetCounter ("R2W", 0)
              SetCounter ("R3W", 0)
              SetCounter ("RW", 0)
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("<br/>Alright, here is the first riddle.<br/>They are all based around Greek and Roman myths.<br/>So here we go.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("To taunt the gods with webs of lies<br/>is to hang but not to die.<br/>")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "R1knowledge")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Arachne.")
              }
              GetInput() {
                if (IsRegexMatch  ("arachne", LCase (result))) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("That's right!")
                  wait {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Lets try out the next riddle.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Carried by Lightning with a crown of moon.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "R2knowledge")) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                        msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Europa.")
                      }
                      GetInput() {
                        if (IsRegexMatch  ("europa", LCase (result))) {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("That's right!<br/>")
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("Lets try out the next riddle.")
                          wait {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("The musical barterer returned empty-handed from the underworld.")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                            msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("So, do you have an idea who I could be talking about?")
                            if (GetBoolean(game, "R3knowledge")) {
                              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                              msg ("You remember Lilith telling you the answer was Orpheus.")
                            }
                            GetInput() {
                              if (IsRegexMatch  ("orpheus", LCase (result))) {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                msg ("That's right!")
                                wait {
                                  MovePlayer (Riddle evalution page)
                                }
                              }
                              else {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                                wait {
                                  IncreaseCounter ("R3W")
                                  IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                                  MovePlayer (Riddle three menu)
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                        else {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                          wait {
                            IncreaseCounter ("R2W")
                            IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                            MovePlayer (Riddle two menu)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
                else if (IsRegexMatch  ("demetrius", LCase (result))) {
                  if (player.alias= "Demetrius") {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                    wait {
                      msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                      wait {
                        msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                        wait {
                          msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                          wait {
                            msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                            wait {
                              SetForegroundColour ("Violet")
                              ClearScreen
                              msg ("There's not a chance, besides, in it's state I think it's going to read this instead of hearing us speak.")
                              GetInput() {
                                if (result = "A shame really, It has such potential. It reminds me of Amber, Gregory, Lisa and Steven.") {
                                  msg ("Do not mention those names here! If anyone might hear our little chat it's them, they found the true path to godhood afterall.")
                                  GetInput() {
                                    if (result= "Oh did they really do that? Now that you mention it, I remember hearing they rejected the False Gods and became Gods worth a follow themselves. How did they manage to do that?") {
                                      msg ("You know we can't discuss that, what if It found our conversation? Now let us never speak about this again and hope that It won't notice us.")
                                      wait {
                                        MovePlayer (Page1)
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
                else if (IsRegexMatch  ("adriel", LCase (result))) {
                  if (player.alias= "Adriel") {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                    wait {
                      msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                      wait {
                        msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                        wait {
                          msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                          wait {
                            msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                            wait {
                              SetForegroundColour ("DarkViolet")
                              ClearScreen
                              msg ("Demetrius, do you think they can hear us right now?")
                              GetInput() {
                                if (result = "There's not a chance, besides, in it's state I think it's going to read this instead of hearing us speak.") {
                                  msg ("A shame really, It has such potential. It reminds me of Amber, Gregory, Lisa and Steven.")
                                  GetInput() {
                                    if (result="Do not mention those names here! If anyone might hear our little chat it's them, they found the true path to godhood afterall.") {
                                      msg ("Oh did they really do that? Now that you mention it, I remember hearing they rejected the False Gods and became Gods worth a follow themselves. How did they manage to do that?")
                                      GetInput() {
                                        if (result = "You know we can't discuss that, what if It found our conversation? Now let us never speak about this again and hope that It won't notice us.") {
                                          msg ("With all those eyes It has those odds are really slim but as you wish Demetrius.")
                                          wait {
                                            MovePlayer (Page1)
                                          }
                                        }
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Hmm, not exactly who I was thinking about.<br/>would you like to try again or have me give the answer?")
                  wait {
                    IncreaseCounter ("R1W")
                    IncreaseCounter ("RW")
                    MovePlayer (Riddle one menu)
                  }
                }
              }
            ]]></script>
          </object>
        </object>

    <object name="Burger_start">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary">
        <item>
          <key>Burger_start_I will always come for burgers</key>
          <value>I can't say no to burgers!</value>
        </item>
        <item>
          <key>Burger_start_miss this for the world</key>
          <value>I wouldn't want to miss this for the world!</value>
        </item>
        <item>
          <key>Burger_start_trafic was bad</key>
          <value>Sorry, traffic was quite bad.</value>
        </item>
      </options>
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        if (GetBoolean(game, "rock")) {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Add a version of the normal path but with rocks stuff, Lilith can't emote because she is a rock.<br/>At the end she will not die.<br/>Add a path to all three main restaurants.")
        }
        else {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Burgers sure sound good, see you there!")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("You arrive a tad late, Lilith already has grabbed herself a seat and waves at you when she sees you.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Heya! Almost was scared you wouldn't show up.")
          SetFlagOn ("burger")
          if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") = 0) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "burgerstart")) {
              SetCounter ("burgerwent", 1)
            }
            SetFlagOn ("burgerstart")
          }
          else {
            IncreaseCounter ("burgerwent")
          }
          SetFlagOn ("Burger")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_1")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "brentmode")) {
              AddPageLink (Burger_start, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "Prevent death.")
            }
          }
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          if (GetBoolean(game, "brentmode")) {
            AddPageLink (Burger_start, Restaurant_death_1, "Death 1")
          }
        }
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_1")) {
          AddPageLink (Burger_start, Burger_start_try to sit somewhere else, "Hey glad to be here. Could we sit somewhere else though?")
        }
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Burger_start_I will always come for burgers">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("Lilith chuckles.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Ah, another burger fan!")
          msg ("We are at the right place I'd say, the burgers here are delicious.")
          msg ("Did you already know that or is this the first time you've eaten here?")
          if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") = 0) {
            AddPageLink (Burger_start_I will always come for burgers, Burgers_About x times exactly, "I've never been here before.")
          }
          else if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") = 1) {
            AddPageLink (Burger_start_I will always come for burgers, Burgers_About x times exactly, "I've been here only once.")
          }
          else if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") > 1) {
            AddPageLink (Burger_start_I will always come for burgers, Burgers_About x times exactly, "I've been here exactly {counter:burgerwent} times.")
          }
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
        ]]></script>
        <object name="Burger_X times menu">
          <object name="Burgers_About x times exactly">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") = 0) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("<br/>I'm sure you'll love it here then!<br/>Like I've said before, they have really amazing bugers here.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") > 3) {
                if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") > 6) {
                  if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") > 9) {
                    if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") > 12) {
                      if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") > 22) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Wow!  Almost feel like I should let you choose my burger with all that burger knowledge you must have.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("Lilith lets out a joyful laugh.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Almost though, not completely.")
                      }
                      else {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Wow... is it weird to be impressed by that?")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("Lilith lets out a small laugh.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Probably but still, I'm quite impressed by the effort you made.")
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Wow, you've been here a lot of times!<br/>... Come to think of it, you might have visited this place more than I have.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith lets out a small giggle.")
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Wow, you've been here quite a few times already!<br/>You must really like it here then, I knew we were on the same wavelength.")
                  }
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Ah, you've been here a few times already.<br/>Then you surely now how good the burgers are here.")
                }
              }
              else {
                if (GetInt(game, "burgerwent") = 1) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Ah, I hope you liked your previous meal here!")
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Ah, I hope you liked your previous meals here!")
                }
              }
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("So, which burger do you want to pick? I think I'll go for the juicy cheeseburger myself.")
                MovePlayer (Burger menu)
              }
            ]]></script>
            <object name="Burger menu">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <options type="stringdictionary">
                <item>
                  <key>Burger1</key>
                  <value>I could go for a veggie burger!</value>
                </item>
                <item>
                  <key>Burger 2</key>
                  <value>Hmm, that juicy cheeseburger sounds good!</value>
                </item>
                <item>
                  <key>Burger3</key>
                  <value>I think I'll pick the fish burger.</value>
                </item>
                <item>
                  <key>Burger 4</key>
                  <value>A beef burger sounds good.</value>
                </item>
              </options>
              <script type="script">
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              </script>
              <object name="Burger1">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  MovePlayer (Burger ordering scene)
                </script>
              </object>
              <object name="Burger 2">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  MovePlayer (Burger ordering scene)
                </script>
              </object>
              <object name="Burger3">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  MovePlayer (Burger ordering scene)
                </script>
              </object>
              <object name="Burger 4">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  MovePlayer (Burger ordering scene)
                </script>
              </object>
              <object name="Burger ordering scene">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("Lilith and you go to order the burgers. ")
                  if (GetInt(game, "Burger") = 1) {
                    msg ("You were expecting having to order them from a screen most fastfood places tend to have but instead Lilith walks to a counter.")
                  }
                  msg ("An old lady{if Rosename:, who you remember is called Rose,} smiles at the both of you.")
                  SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                  msg ("Hey Lilith, glad to see you here once more! ")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Nightmare")) {
                    if (GetBoolean(game, "Always_nightmare")) {
                      if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
                        SetFlagOn ("Burgerorder_nightmare")
                      }
                    }
                    else if (RandomChance(10)) {
                      if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
                        SetFlagOn ("Burgerorder_nightmare")
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Burgerorder_nightmare")) {
                    SetFlagOff ("Burgerorder_nightmare")
                    msg (" {if Rosename:Rose} {if not Rosename:The old lady} looks at you and nods her head. ")
                    SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                    msg ("I'm of course also glad to see you here {player.alias}!")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("This startles you, she is not supposed to know your name. It is true that you went to this restaurant before but that was only in loops so it's almost like it never happened now. You tell Rose that she's not supposed to know your name.")
                      SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                      msg ("Oh but how could I forget you?")
                      wait {
                        play sound ("gameOver and edgeofthegalaxy.wav", false, true)
                        SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                        msg ("You are her killer right?")
                        wait {
                          msg ("You shot her.")
                          msg ("You blew her to smithereens.")
                          wait {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                            msg ("You try to argue that you didn't pull the trigger, that it was someone else.<br/>That the explosion was out of your control.")
                            wait {
                              SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                              msg ("It may not have been you causing all of those things directly.")
                              msg ("But that doesn't matter.")
                              wait {
                                msg ("You knew what would happen. And you still returned.")
                                msg ("You are responsible for what happened.")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("You tell yourself you do it to save her.")
                                  msg ("But tell me the truth, isn't there a part of you that likes to watch her die again and again?")
                                  wait {
                                    msg ("Well you're in luck you coldhearted murderer, this time you can warm your hearth by eating her.")
                                    wait {
                                      msg ("I made it from Lilith herself, so there's plenty more for you.")
                                      wait {
                                        msg ("We have so many of her corpses lying around in the back, do you want to see your work?")
                                        wait {
                                          ClearScreen
                                          MovePlayer (Nightmare)
                                        }
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    msg (" {if Rosename:Rose} {if not Rosename:The old lady} looks at you for a brief moment and continues.")
                    SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                    msg ("Who did you bring along for the ride?")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Oh right, you two haven't met. Rose, this is {player.alias} and {player.alias} this is Rose.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Rose gives you a sincere smile.")
                    SetForegroundColour ("HotPink")
                    msg ("Nice to meet you {player.alias}.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("So, what can I get the two of you?")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("You tell her what you ordered and follow Lilith back to the table.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("The food order stuff needs more detail")
                      wait {
                        ClearScreen
                        MovePlayer (Burger_brother)
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  SetFlagOn ("Rosename")
                ]]></script>
                <object name="Burger_brother">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Thank you for choosing this place {player.alias}.<br/>It has been too long since I've been here, to tell you the truth I actually was avoiding this place.<br/>But now the happy memories come flooding back to me.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment, she seems unsure whether to continue or not.")
                      wait {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        TextFX_Typewriter ("You know, my brother really used to love this place before...", 200)
                        wait {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          msg ("Lilith freezes before she can continue the sentence.")
                          MovePlayer (Burger_brother_options)
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  ]]></script>

                        </item>
                      </options>
                      <script type="script">
                        SetFlagOn ("Askedbrother")

                        SetCounter ("brotherask", 0)
                        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                      </script>
                      <object name="Burger_joke">

                          <item>
                            <key>Burger_granite joke</key>

                          </item>

                            <value>The triangle thought about dating a circle but ultimately it seemed too pointless.</value>
                          </item>
                          <item>
                            <key>Burger_click joke</key>
                            <value>The computer mouse wanted to date someone who clicked with them.</value>
                          </item>
                        </options>

                          if (GetBoolean(game, "jokeknowledge")) {

                          }

                                              msg ("<br/>Then I hear Orpheus' sweet sounds rise once more from the gap between Life and Death.<br/>But Orpheus' tune is quickly twisted into something else.")

                                                msg ("<br/>And then I'll be here and you’ll be there once again.<br/>I don't know whether to cry or laugh when I look at my, our, green horizon.")
