                                          }
                                        </script>
                                        <object name="Brothertalk of silence">
                                          <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                                            ClearScreen
                                            if (GetBoolean(game, "Askedbrother")) {
                                              if (GetInt(game, "brotherask") = 0) {
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                                SetFlagOn ("Brother_knowledge")
                                                msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment.")
                                                wait {
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                  msg ("You asked what my brother's name was, right?<br/>I don't know why but I feel like I can trust you enough to tell you about him.<br/><br/>I might tear up, it's been a long time since I've told his story to anyone.<br/>")
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                  msg ("His... his name was James.")
                                                  wait {
                                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                    msg ("He was the best brother I could have asked for.<br/>He was five years older than me but we always played together.<br/>We used to be the best of friends, playing hide and seek, video games, making our own stories to act out, you name it.")
                                                    wait {
                                                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                      msg ("<br/>He was always there for me, he supported me however he could and appreciated me.")
                                                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                                      msg ("When she talks about her brother you can see one of the biggest smiles you've ever seen growing on her face.")
                                                      wait {
                                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                        TextFX_Typewriter ("But that's when it happened...", 175)
                                                        wait {
                                                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                                          msg ("Lilith pauses for a moment as she gasps for air, you can see tears dripping off her face.")
                                                          wait {
                                                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                            msg ("<br/>He was only seventeen when he got hit by a speeding car.<br/>He didn't die immediately, they say he must have layed there for an hour before...")
                                                            wait {
                                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                              msg ("<br/>My... father...")
                                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                                              msg ("She seems to test the taste of those words, looking at her expression, they seem to taste quite bitter.")
                                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                              msg ("David couldn't accept James dying and left us.<br/>That day two people were taken away  from me by a car.<br/><br/>Actually, scratch that, David had a choice in the matter, James was the only one really taken away from me.")
                                                              wait {
                                                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                                msg ("<br/>Mom really tried her best to fill the void left by them but the presence of their absence has always haunted us since that horrible day.")
                                                                wait {
                                                                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Abigailjoke")) {
                                                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                                    msg ("My sister, Abigail,the one from the joke you just told,  is 5 years younger than me so she doesn't really remember much of what happened.")
                                                                    wait {
                                                                      TextFX_Typewriter ("Sometimes I envy her.", 140)
                                                                    }
                                                                  }
                                                                  else {
                                                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                                    msg ("My sister, Abigail, is 5 years younger than me so she doesn't really remember much of what happened.")
                                                                    wait {
                                                                      TextFX_Typewriter ("Sometimes I envy her.", 140)
                                                                      wait {
                                                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                                                        msg ("<br/><br/><br/>She lets out a sigh of relief.")
                                                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                                        msg ("As much as it hurts me to talk about James it feels good to finally let it all out once again.<br/>Thank you for listening to me ramble on {player.alias}.")
                                                                        wait {
                                                                          MovePlayer (Burger_shooting scenario)
                                                                        }
                                                                      }
                                                                    }
                                                                  }
                                                                }
                                                              }
                                                            }
                                                          }
                                                        }
                                                      }
                                                    }
                                                  }
                                                }
                                              }
                                              else {
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                                msg ("Lilith and you eat the rest of your burger and fries in pure silence.")
                                                msg ("She seems to look at her watch every minute or so, frowning each time.")
                                                wait {
                                                  MovePlayer (Burger_shooting scenario)
                                                }
                                              }
                                            }
                                            else {
                                              msg ("Alternative dialog. (impossible to reach for now)")
                                            }
                                            SetCounter ("brotherask", 0)
                                          ]]></script>
                                          <object name="Burger_shooting scenario">
                                            <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                            <options type="stringdictionary">
                                              <item>
                                                <key>Burger_concern</key>
                                                <value>It's probably not our concern.</value>
                                              </item>
                                              <item>
                                                <key>Burger_sale</key>
                                                <value>Maybe there is a sale going on somewhere?</value>
                                              </item>
                                            </options>
                                            <script type="script">
                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                              msg ("Suddenly you hear screaming from a few shops further.")
                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                              msg ("What was that?")
                                              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                              if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_alt")) {
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                                RemovePageLink (Burger_shooting scenario, Restaurant_death_1_prevented)
                                              }
                                              else {
                                                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_1")) {
                                                  AddPageLink (Burger_shooting scenario, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "This is important, duck now.")
                                                }
                                              }
                                            </script>
                                            <object name="Burger_concern">
                                              <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                              <script type="script">
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                msg ("You're probably right, it's probably not even a big deal anyway.")
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_alt")) {
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                                  SetFlagOff ("Burger_alt")
                                                  AddPageLink (Burger_concern, Burger_ask her a question_choice, "*Ask her a question.*")
                                                  RemovePageLink (Burger_concern, Restaurant_death_1)
                                                }
                                                else {
                                                  AddPageLink (Burger_concern, Restaurant_death_1, "Yeah-")
                                                  RemovePageLink (Burger_concern, Burger_ask her a question_choice)
                                                }
                                              </script>
                                            </object>
                                            <object name="Burger_sale">
                                              <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                              <script type="script">
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                msg ("Let's hope it's just that.")
                                                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_alt")) {
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                                  SetFlagOff ("Burger_alt")
                                                  AddPageLink (Burger_sale, Burger_ask her a question_choice, "*Ask her a question.*")
                                                  RemovePageLink (Burger_sale, Restaurant_death_1)
                                                }
                                                else {
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                                  AddPageLink (Burger_sale, Restaurant_death_1, "Yeah-")
                                                  RemovePageLink (Burger_sale, Burger_ask her a question_choice)
                                                }
                                              </script>
                                            </object>
                                            <object name="Burger_ask her a question_choice">
                                              <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                              <script type="script">
                                                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                                if (GetBoolean(game, "Musiclover")) {
                                                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Musiclovertalked")) {
                                                    AddPageLink (Burger_ask her a question_choice, Burger_question_musiclover, "So you mentioned that you really like music. Which music do you listen to? ")
                                                  }
                                                  else {
                                                    AddPageLink (Burger_ask her a question_choice, Burger_question_musiclover, "Which music do you like to listen to?")
                                                  }
                                                }
                                                if (GetBoolean(game, "Booklover")) {
                                                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Booklovertalked")) {
                                                    AddPageLink (Burger_ask her a question_choice, Burger_question_booklover, "So you mentioned that you like writing. That made me curious, which books do you like to read?")
                                                  }
                                                  else {
                                                    AddPageLink (Burger_ask her a question_choice, Burger_question_booklover, "Which books do you like to read?")
                                                  }
                                                }
                                              </script>
                                              <object name="Burger_question_musiclover">
                                                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                  msg ("Oh, I'm glad you asked {player.alias}!")
                                                  msg ("I like quite a few genres and bands, it mostly depends on how I am feeling at the time.")
                                                  msg ("The genres I tend to listen to the most are jazz, rock, and heavy metal.")
                                                  msg ("My favourite bands shift around all of the time but for this moment I think King Crimson, I Monster and Smashing Pumpkins are in my top three.")
                                                  msg ("<br/>I think that the reason they are in my top three is how much they tend to innovate with every song they make.<br/>Now that I think about it, Kishi Bashi is also excellent at innovating, he's definetly also worth checking out!")
                                                  msg ("It's very hard to keep adding to something like an album with song after song and still make it as special as the first one someone has heard.<br/>After a while it might seem like some artists are just going through the motions of pumping out song after song that they know will do great, but that they aren't happy with.<br/>And their fans will be going through the motions of listening to each and every single song to relive that sense of wonder they had at first, but it is never going to be the same.<br/><br/>")
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                                                  msg ("(Add some choices about what she said here, before she asks you what your favourite band is.)")
                                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                                  msg ("<br/>What are your favourite bands and genres of music? ")
                                                  MovePlayer (Burger_favourite band en genre)
                                                ]]></script>

                                                        wait {

                                                          wait {
                                                            msg ("Recently I've been expanding my reach by learning about Finnish mythology, I picked up the Kalevala and haven't been to put it down until I finished it.<br/>I am less familiar with those myths since I picked it up for the first time about a week ago but I'd love t read it again for quite a few times until I'm as familiar with it as the Roman myths.")
                                                            wait {
                                                              msg ("<br/>I also really enjoy to read Haruki Murakami's works, a friend of mine introduced me to them and since then I've read 'First person singular', 'After dark' and '1q94'.<br/>He has a hauntingly beautiful way of describing even the most mundane things.     <object name="Cafe_start">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetFlagOn ("Cafe")
        SetFlagOn ("Cafe")
        if (not GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_taste")) {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("That sounds good to me! I'll meet you there!<br/>")
        }
        else {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Oh my, you surely know how to get me excited! I'll meet you there!<br/>")
        }
        wait {
          ClearScreen
          wait {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("You arrive a tad too early and find no space to park so you decide to park a few streets later and walk to the cafe.")
            wait {
              msg ("The walls are made out of glass and function as aquariums that seem to stretch on even beyond the ceiling.")
              wait {
                msg ("There are some holes in the specially shaped aquarium to allow for easy feeding of the fish and it also makes the aquarium feel more alive, with colorful fish sometimes poking their head out of the aquarium as if they want to watch the customers, maybe you are the one in the glass cage and you just don't know it.<br/>")
                wait {
                  msg ("It's probably them though, atleast they seem to be enjoying themselves.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("When you get there Lilith is already sitting at a nice looking mahogany table.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("When she notices you she waves at you enthusiastically with a wide grin on her face.")
                      wait {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Heya, glad you could make it! ")
                        wait {
                          msg ("This place has a really nice atmosphere, those mahogany tables and the aquariums are real eye catchers don't you think?")
                          wait {
                            msg ("Anyway, let's go order our food and then we can talk some more.")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                            wait {
                              msg ("You and Lilith walk towards the barista, as he glances up from his phone he greets you with a shy smile.<br/>He looks quite young, if you'd have to guess you would say he is somewhere between 17 and 18 years old.<br/>You get lost in the thoughts of how life was when you still were 17 until Lilith gives you a playful nudge.")
                              wait {
                                SetForegroundColour ("LightSkyBlue")
                                msg ("What could I get the both of you?")
                                wait {
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  msg (" Hmm, I think I'm going for the ham and cheese sandwich and a cafe cubano.<br/> What are you choosing? ")
                                  MovePlayer (Cafe_food choice)
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]]></script>

                      wait {
                        msg ("In the beginning I thought that I was weird for acting that way, I started trying to make sure that I didn't distance myself from anyone so I wouldn't hurt them.<br/>Of course this only made things worse, soon I began having almost no confidence in myself and messed up quite a few relationships and friendships.<br/>")
                        wait {
                          msg ("It took me a while before I managed to find the courage in myself to try and fix my problems.<br/>It didn't happen instantly, even now I sometimes come of as too distant, but little by little I managed to tell myself that there is nothing wrong with not needing an overdose of affection every second.<br/>")
                          wait {

                      </item>
                    </options>
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("So a priest, a monk and a rabbit enter a bar.<br/>Says the rabbit :\"Whoops, did you slip your tongue there Lilith?\"")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                      SetFlagOn ("jokeknowledge")
                    ]]></script>
                    <object name="Funny joke">
                      <inherit name="scripttext" />
                      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("Lilith explodes in laughter.")
                        wait {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("Exactly! The first time Abigail, my sister, told me that joke I spent an entire hour laughing.<br/>But then again, she always makes me laugh so much that I just might pass out one time.")
                          wait {
                            msg ("I'm kidding, I'm kidding! About the passing out part that is, she really is funny though.")
                            MovePlayer (Funny joke answers)
                          }
                        }
                      ]]></script>
                      <object name="Funny joke answers">
                        <inherit name="scripttext" />
                        <options type="stringdictionary">
                          <item>
                            <key>Restaurant_death_1</key>
                            <value>She sounds nice!</value>
                          </item>
                        </options>
                        <script type="script">
                          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                          if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_1")) {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                            AddPageLink (Funny joke answers, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "Quick, come stand next to me!")
                          }
                        </script>
                      </object>
                    </object>
                    <object name="Bad joke">
                      <inherit name="scripttext" />
                      <script type="script">
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("Lilith looks saddened by your remark.")
                        Love_decrease
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Really? ...")
                        wait {
                          msg ("I thought it was funny when Abigail told me...")
                          MovePlayer (Bad joke part 2)
                        }
                      </script>
                      <object name="Bad joke part 2">
                        <inherit name="scripttext" />
                        <options type="stringdictionary">
                          <item>
                            <key>Restaurant_death_1</key>
                            <value>Well...</value>
                          </item>
                        </options>
                        <script type="script">
                          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                          if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_1")) {
                            AddPageLink (Bad joke part 2, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "Quick, come stand next to me!")
                          }
                        </script>
                      </object>
                    </object>
                    <object name="Not getting joke">
                      <inherit name="scripttext" />
                      <options type="stringdictionary">
                        <item>
                          <key>Restaurant_death_1</key>
                          <value>No need to apoligize, I made you explain it. Besides, it's still pretty funny now that I understand the joke.</value>
                        </item>
                      </options>
                      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Oh, the point of the joke is that the other two who entered the bar where religious fiures, the monk and the priest.<br/>So the rabbit doesn't quite fit in, it's because he was actually a rabbi instead. So I mispronounced that hence the \"did you slip your tongue?\" .<br/>Now that joke isn't exactly funny anymore is it? It tends to be that way when you explain a joke so I'm sorry if I ruined it for you.")
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_1")) {
                          AddPageLink (Not getting joke, Restaurant_death_1_prevented, "Quick, come stand next to me!")
                        }
                      ]]></script>
                    </object>
                  </object>
                </object>
              </object>
            </object>
          </object>
        </object>
      </object>
      <object name="Cafe_dice">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("This is the temporary puzzle screen for the dice puzzle.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("So, the rules are simple. ")
          wait {
            SetFontSize (8)
            msg ("Actually they might be a little complex...")
            SetFontSize (12)
            wait {
              msg ("I will first roll two dice and tell you the sum of them. If I roll a double so for example if I roll two four's an extra four is added. So every double I roll is effectively a tripple.")
              wait {
                msg ("After that I can take one action each turn.")
                wait {
                  msg ("I can change one of the dice numbers into any number that isn't the number it was the last turn, so a three could become any number except for a three.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("But I also can subtract a value from one dice and add it to another, so a five and a one could become two three's.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("After every action I take I'll tell you the new sum of the dice.")
                      wait {
                        msg ("So, do you still want to do this?")
                        wait {
                          MovePlayer (Cafe_dice_choice)
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        </script>
        <object name="Cafe_dice_choice">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (Cafe_dice_choice, Cafe_dice_continue, "Sure, I'm excited to try it out!")
            AddPageLink (Cafe_dice_choice, Cafe_dice_stop, "Actually, I'm not sure about this anymore.")
          </script>
          <object name="Cafe_dice_stop">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Move the player back on track to the thing that happens after the dice minigame.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("Oh no worries {player.alias}! <br/>I might have made this a bit too daunting so I completely understand.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Make this new segway a bit better because now it doesn't make much sense.")
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith looks around in pure awe, a bright smile forms on her face.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("So, what do you think of this place now that you've seen it for the first time?")
                MovePlayer (Cafe_rate cafe)
              }
            ]]></script>
          </object>
          <object name="Cafe_dice_continue">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Add an option to peek using the reflection of the aquarium. ")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Lilith throws two six-sided dice and puts her hands in front of them so you can't see the result.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("The sum of the dice is nine.")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Diceknowledge")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                msg ("You remember that the first dice is 6 and the second dice is 3.")
              }
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)

              AddPageLink (Cafe_dice_continue, dice continue_normal, "*Play normally.*")
            </script>
            <object name="Cafe_dice_wrong answer">

                </script>

                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)

            <object name="Cafe_second dice choice">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                AddPageLink (Cafe_second dice choice, second dice_no, "No, that's not right.")
                AddPageLink (Cafe_second dice choice, second dice_yes, "Yes, that's right.")
              </script>
              <object name="second dice_no">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Oh, what do you think is the second dice then?")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  GetInput() {
                    player.dicetwo = result
                    if (   IsRegexMatch  ("(six|6)", LCase (player.diceone))) {
                      if (   IsRegexMatch  ("(three|3)", LCase (player.dicetwo))) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Wow, you managed to figure it out. Nicely done {player.alias}!<br/>I'm glad you didn't change your mind afterall,you would have been so close and yet so far if you did.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                        msg ("Make this new segway a bit better because now it doesn't make much sense.")
                        wait {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          msg ("Lilith looks around in pure awe, a bright smile forms on her face.")
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("So, what do you think of this place now that you've seen it for the first time?")
                          MovePlayer (Cafe_rate cafe)
                        }
                      }
                      else {
                        MovePlayer (Cafe_dice_wrong answer)
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      MovePlayer (Cafe_dice_wrong answer)
                    }
                  }
                ]]></script>
              </object>
              <object name="second dice_yes">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  player.dicetwo = player.dicetwoquestion
                  if (   IsRegexMatch  ("(six|6)", LCase (player.diceone))) {
                    if (player.dicetwo = 3) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Wow, you managed to figure it out. Nicely done {player.alias}!")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Make this new segway a bit better because now it doesn't make much sense.")
                      wait {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("Lilith looks around in pure awe, a bright smile forms on her face.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("So, what do you think of this place now that you've seen it for the first time?")
                        MovePlayer (Cafe_rate cafe)
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      MovePlayer (Cafe_dice_wrong answer)
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    MovePlayer (Cafe_dice_wrong answer)
                  }
                </script>
              </object>
            </object>
            <object name="dice_continue_cheat">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                SetFlagOn ("cafedicecheat")
                MovePlayer (dice continue_normal)
              </script>
            </object>
            <object name="dice continue_normal">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                if (GetBoolean(game, "cafedicecheat")) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("You peek at the dice using the aquarium as a mirror, the first dice appears to be a 6 and the second is a 3.")
                  SetFlagOff ("cafedicecheat")
                }
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Lilith waits for you to look away and she then takes an action.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("The sum of the dice is nine.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("She takes her next action.")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("The sum of the dice is eight.")
                  wait {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Lilith hums an unfamiliar song as she takes her next action, it's quite catchy.")
                    SetFlagOn ("songknowledge")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("The sum of the dice is five.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("So, that was the puzzle. You'll need one hint to solve it.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("The last action I took was changing the second dice.<br/> I hope that hint is helpful!")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("So, what was the number of the first dice on the first turn?")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                      GetInput() {
                        player.diceone = result
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        if (LengthOf (player.diceone) = 1) {
                          if (IsInt (player.diceone)) {
                            player.dicetwoquestion = 9 - ToInt(player.diceone)
                            msg ("So do you think the number of the second dice is {player.dicetwoquestion}?")
                            MovePlayer (Cafe_second dice choice)
                          }
                        }
                        else {
                          switch (true) {
                            case (IsRegexMatch ("two", LCase (player.diceone)) = true) {
                              player.diceone = "2"
                            }
                            case (IsRegexMatch ("one", LCase (player.diceone)) = true) {
                              player.diceone = "1"
                            }
                            case (IsRegexMatch ("three", LCase (player.diceone)) = true) {
                              player.diceone = "3"
                            }
                            case (IsRegexMatch ("four", LCase (player.diceone)) = true) {
                              player.diceone = "4"
                            }
                            case (IsRegexMatch ("five", LCase (player.diceone)) = true) {
                              player.diceone = "5"
                            }
                            case (IsRegexMatch ("six", LCase (player.diceone)) = true) {
                              player.diceone = "6"
                            }
                          }
                          player.dicetwoquestion = 9 - ToInt(player.diceone)
                          msg ("So do you think the number of the second dice is {player.dicetwoquestion}?")
                          MovePlayer (Cafe_second dice choice)
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              ]]></script>
            </object>
          </object>
        </object>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Kokiri_woods">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("Lilith gasps for a second.")
        wait {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("You mean the Kokiri woods? The same as I am thinking of right now?<br/>")
          msg ("You know what, let's both go to the Kokiri woods, if we are at the same spot then I'll know for sure.")
          msg ("While you're at it, try taking some food you got laying around your house with you, we can make a picknick date out of it!")
          wait {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Lilith giggles.")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("This is all pretty strange but see you there! Or so I hope...")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Lilith hangs up the phone and you immediatly start seeking every nook and cranny of your house for something that would make for good food on a picknick.<br/><br/>")
            wait {
              msg ("When you're done you drive to the Kokiri woods, hoping that things will be different there.<br/>You arrive in the woods.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Change the text above this slightly.")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Nightmare")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Always_nightmare")) {
                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
                    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_nightmare")
                  }
                }
                else if (RandomChance(10)) {
                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_nightmare")) {
                    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_nightmare")
                  }
                }
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_nightmare")) {
                  SetFlagOff ("Kokiri_nightmare")
                  MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
                }
                else {
                  SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_introduction")
                }
              }
              else {
                SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_introduction")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_introduction")) {
                MovePlayer (Kokiri_woods_introduction)
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Meteorite_distraction_is_anoying")) {
                  MovePlayer (Kokiri_woods_sit_choice)
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Game">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          msg ("Insert some dialog about that in here.")
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
            msg ("She died by the same car that kills her when she leaves a restaurant.")
            SetFlagOn ("Car_call")
            SetFlagOff ("Car_caught")
            SetFlagOff ("Car_free")
          }
          else {
            SetFlagOff ("Car_caught")
            SetFlagOff ("Car_free")
            msg ("The car doesn't kill her.")
          }
        </script>
      </object>

          }

            <object name="itsme_choice">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                AddPageLink (itsme_choice, Me no know, "I actually have no idea.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                AddPageLink (itsme_choice, tsme_talk about something else, "Actually I want to talk about something else.")
                AddPageLink (itsme_choice, Goal is to go on a good date, "I think the goal is to go on a succesful date with you.")
                AddPageLink (itsme_choice, Goal is to make my own version, "I think the goal is to reach an ending where you live.")
                AddPageLink (itsme_choice, Goal is to make my own version, "I think the goal is to make my own version of this game through a medium of my own somehow. (Mae this pop-up once Lilith suggests it.)")
                AddPageLink (itsme_choice, There is no goal, "I don't  think there is a goal, not a true one anyway.")
                SetFlagOn ("Kok_path 1")
                SetCounter ("Conversation", 0)
                SetFlagOn ("Ignore_conversation")
              </script>
              <object name="Me no know">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script">
                  Conversationfix
                  Conversationcounter
                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_game purpose")) {
                    SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_game purpose")
                    SetCounter ("game purpose", 1)
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("That's fine, we can figure your goal out together.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith scratches her chin and continues.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Let's see, first of, how does this game look to you?")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Add a few other questions before she asks this one, but make sure the questions in the end are not asked in the start, check it before you add stuff!")
                      wait {
                        MovePlayer (Me no know_choice)
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Now that you came back to this page you will be able to continue certain conversations from this page.")
                    IncreaseCounter ("game purpose")
                    if (GetInt(game, "game purpose") = 2) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Placeholder 2.")
                      AddPageLink (Kak_continue_game purpose, game purpose_I can choose to, "It's not automatic, a link with the text \"Retry\" shows up and when I click it I restart the day but I get to keep the knowledge of the things that happened.")
                      AddPageLink (Kak_continue_game purpose, game purpose_sometimes you live, "(if player has seen game overs where she lived make this an option.) You don't always die, sometimes we are just not together either because I break up with you or because you don't want to be around me anymore. But the game still considers it a game over.")
                      SetFlagOff ("Kak_gamegoal")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "game purpose") = 3) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Placeholder 3.")
                    }
                  }
                </script>
                <object name="clickable thinks">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Ah I see, so you can't see the absolutely stunning view from our picknickspot?")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (clickable links_choice)
                    }
                  </script>
                  <object name="clickable links_choice">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script">
                      AddPageLink (clickable links_choice, yup, "Yup, the best thing I can get is a description of it if the game feels like giving me one.")
                      SetFlagOn ("Kak_gamegoal")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    </script>
                    <object name="yup">
                      <inherit name="scripttext" />
                      <script type="script">
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("Hmm, let's try looking at the scenery, maybe the game will give you a description then. ")
                        wait {
                          MovePlayer (Kokiri_scenery choice)
                        }
                      </script>
                      <object name="scenery forest">
                        <inherit name="scripttext" />
                        <script type="script">
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          msg ("From the spot you picked on the hill you have a gorgeous view of the village where most of your dates with Lilith took place.")
                          msg ("It's pretty calm in the village, here and there you might catch a rare glimpse of a car or a pedestrian but other than that the streets are completly empty.")
                          wait {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("This view is absolutely fantastic isn't it?")
                            msg ("When my parents used to take walks with me and my brother in this forest I knew that I just had to keep coming back here.")
                            msg ("And I did! Many times actually. I like to come here whenever I have some spare time or when I really need to get some time away from things.")
                            wait {
                              msg ("The sunrise here is absolutely beautiful, maybe we'll be able to share that moment today.")
                              msg ("I'd like that...")
                              wait {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                msg ("As you enjoy eachother's company for a while while looking off into the distance the both of you spot a red Sedan as it drives closer and closer to the cafe at troubling speeds.")
                                if (not GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
                                  msg ("When the car reaches the cafe it rams a garbage container that falls over in front of the doors and drives up on a ramp. It launches itself over the building, coming back the other way and driving away like nothing happened.")
                                }
                                else {
                                  msg ("When the car reaches the cafe it rams a garbage container that falls over in front of the doors and the Sedan drives towards a convieniently placed ramp.                                 }
                                wait {
                                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
                                    msg ("After a short while the car speeds straight into the doors of the Chinese restaurant for it's second act of pure destruction.")
                                  }
                                  wait {
                                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
                                      msg ("The car backs away just as a swarm of geese break the doors of the restaurant wide open.")
                                    }
                                    msg ("The geese leave the restaurant with almost everyone in the restaurant kidnapped by them.")
                                    wait {
                                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                      msg ("Suddenly you can hear the sound of sirens, of police sirens.")
                                      msg ("The police sirens are coming from near the mall, where the burger restaurant is located.")
                                      wait {
                                        msg ("The same restaurant where Lilith got shot...")
                                        msg ("You point at the mall and tell her about the events that took place there.")
                                        wait {
                                          msg ("She gasps for a moment.")
                                          wait {
                                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                            msg ("Sorry, I know that you relived many scenarios like the one you just mentioned and that I have no memory of those scenarios but it will still take some getting used to the idea.")
                                            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
                                              msg ("In it's final act of destruction the car races at full speed and smashs against the entrance of the mall.")
                                              msg ("The burger restaurant explodes due to the gasexplosion, taking a sizeable chunk of the mall with it. However the Sudan escapes without a scratch.                                             }
                                            wait {
                                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                              msg ("Has it... Has it ended?")

                                                MovePlayer (scenery forest_choice)
                                              }
                                            }
                                          }
                                        }
                                      }
                                    }
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        </script>

                <object name="Kakriko_quest made">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_quest made")) {
                      SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_quest made")
                      SetCounter ("quest made", 1)
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Oh wow...")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith seems lost in thought for a moment before she continues.")
                      wait {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("I'm sorry, this is all just a bit much to process. Imagine if someone you just met told you that your entire world is in a game and that the engine the game is running on also exists in that world.")
                        msg ("Theoretically speaking the game your playing right now could even exist in my world... that's a really strange idea to wrap your head around. (Scenry, maybe add some extra dialogue before and during the scenery)")
                        MovePlayer (scenery forest)
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("This will allow you to continue this conversation when you want to.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Now that you came back to this page you will be able to continue certain conversations from this page.")
                      IncreaseCounter ("quest made")
                      if (GetInt(game, "quest made") = 2) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                        msg ("Placeholder 2.")
                      }
                      else if (GetInt(game, "quest made") = 3) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                        msg ("Placeholder 3.")
                      }
                    }
                  </script>
                </object>

              <object name="tsme_talk about something else">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Poem_conversation")) {
                    SetFlagOff ("Poem_conversation")
                  }
                  if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") < 3) {
                    Conversationcounter
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Sure, about what do you want to talk?")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_I am a crosser, "I am a crosser, I basically travel across different realities like this one. So I don't really undo what I caused, you died {game.Lildeaths} times already and I can only try to make sure you won't die again. (Put this somewhere else that better fits it.)")
                    AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_tell her about the mayo easteregg, "*Tell her about the mayo easteregg* (change this text)")
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_more poems")) {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_poem_knowledge")) {
                        AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_more poems, "You actually showed me a poem of yours on one date we had in the burger restaurant. I really liked it, could you show me another one?")
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      RemovePageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_more poems)
                    }
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_tell her about Narrator")) {
                      AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_tell her about Narrator, "This game is controlled by a Narrator. (This one actually is already integrated into the mian path, I think the first one, so it's probably better to remove it.)")
                    }
                    else {
                      RemovePageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_tell her about Narrator)
                    }
                    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_branch")
                    if (GetBoolean(game, "Kok_path 2")) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("This page was accesed from the second path in the main Kokiri branch.")
                    }
                    else if (GetBoolean(game, "Kok_path 1")) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("This page was accesed from the first path in the main Kokiri branch.")
                    }
                    else {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Somehow you accesed this page without selecting a main path in the forest, atleast my code thinks so.")
                    }
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Make these only appear if you have a flag for them.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("What do you want to continue talking about {player.alias}?")
                    AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kokiri_chat_ask_about family, "(Needs to be made entirely) Ask her something about her family.")
                    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_no real name")) {
                      AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kak_no real name, "Continue talking about the kokiri path 2 page that still needs a lot of work.")
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    // TODO: Make this act as a sort of emergency back on tracker that moves you to the death 4 dialogue.
                    MovePlayer (Kokiri_death dialogue)
                  }
                ]]></script>

                    <object name="Goal is to make my own version_less valid">
                      <inherit name="scripttext" />
                      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        msg ("And what if it was?")
                        wait {
                          msg ("What if somehow, after you made up the entire half of the story, it was exactly what the author wrote?")
                          msg ("There's always the possibility.")
                          wait {
                            msg ("<br/>So theoretically speaking, out of infinite imaginings of the story atleast one will be the one the author intended.")
                            wait {
                              msg ("I would argue that probably quite a few more of them would be author-intended since the reader has read half of the book.<br/>Because of that you can better understand the logic of the world the writer created.<br/>So you can make a few estimated guesses about how it all would go.<br/><br/>Sure, depending on the complexity of the story you might not be able to interweave the new elements the author would but you'd still be able to get the same end result.<br/><br/>")
                              wait {
                                msg ("But even if you wouldn't abide by the same logic as the author themselves, does that make your new story any less valid?")
                                msg ("<br/>An action needs observers to become real. Without something it can impact it practically doesn't exist.")
                                msg ("A writer needs readers to read his stories as much as the readers need him to write those stories.")
                                msg ("A storyteller needs an audience to be heard and the audience needs someone to listen to.<br/>")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("You can become both the action and the observer, the writer and the reader, the storyteller and the audience.<br/>That way you don't have to read the story the author wrote, you can just become your own author.<br/><br/>")
                                  msg ("If you want to make it so that a murder mystery suddenly turns into a sci-fi story about a monkey with a talking banana than you can do that.")
                                  msg ("You have taken over the role of storyteller so you can create whatever nonsense you want and it is justified in it's creation as long as you also listen to your story.")
                                  wait {
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                    msg ("Sorry if I've been rambling too much about this {player.alias}, this just something that really intrigues me!<br/><br/><br/>Maybe you should let my words sink in a bit, they can be quite much, especially if you never thought about this sort of stuff before.<br/>Do you want to watch the scenery with me? That would be a great way to take a break from breaking your head.")
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                    msg ("Lilith giggles at her joke.")
                                    MovePlayer (Kokiri_scenery choice)
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      ]]></script>

                    AddPageLink (Goal is to go on a good date, Goal good date_the game decides, "I think the game decides whether it is a succesful date or not.")
                  </script>
                  <object name="Goal good date_a date where you survive">

                  <object name="Goal good date_the game decides">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)

                                              msg ("So, after a while I started to live for Lilith and for my mom.")

                                                msg ("It's only recently that I started living for myself again. That I wanted to enjoy things again.")
                                                msg ("It's been about two years since then, I'm still not entirely healed but I'm trying my best.")
                                                msg ("So, I don't want you to worry about me alright? I'm alright all things considered.")

                                                  msg ("The best way you can help me is to just enjoy this moment with me.")

                                          }
                                        }

                                }

          <object name="talkthroughcharacter">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <options type="stringdictionary" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Lilith scratches her head as if she is trying to comprehend what you are saying.")
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("So, what you are saying is that the you I'm seeing in front of me isn't the real you but some sort of \"filtered\" version because of restrictions in what you can tell me?")
                msg ("So, for example, is {player.alias} even your real name?")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Kak_name_choice)
                }
              }
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("This path was never that great but there are some nice ideas, it needs some reworking.")
              msg ("A few ideas:<br/>\"Is there such a thing as a \"real\" you?\"--> Are you not a web woven with truths and half-lies, unseparatable from eachother?<br/>We like to escape from stuff that haunts us through escapism but even then, we remain ourselves in some ways, big or small.<br/>Sometimes we fragment ourselves into other characters to make things more acceptable, if we play the role of someone with issues it's \"more right\" than truly being someone with those issues.<br/><br/><br/>Are you real if you weren't able to influence anything? If you couldn't have an impact on anything?<br/><br/><br/>Are you real in your actions?<br/><br/><br/><br/>Are the choices you make your own?---> Is chance actually just fate but without us knowing (mention the machine that is observed by a mouse, it blinks a light at a seemingly random interval but it is actually blinking every 50 minutes, the mouse thinks it is random because it does not have a way of keeping track of time.) (Add this code when you want to talk about it: AddPageLink (kakgame_choices, whoisplaying, \"I'm playing this game, although someone else might be playing with my character in another game. (I really don't like this, might replace it with something else.)\")")
              SetCounter ("Conversation", 0)
              SetFlagOn ("Ignore_conversation")
            ]]></script>
            <object name="Kak_name_choice">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                AddPageLink (Kak_name_choice, Kak_no real name, "No, that's not my real name.")
                AddPageLink (Kak_name_choice, Kak_real name, "Yup, that's my real name.")
                AddPageLink (Kak_name_choice, tsme_talk about something else, "Can we actually talk about something else? (Make sure this sets a flag to not put you back into the first path but the second one this time.)")
                SetFlagOn ("Kok_path 2")
              </script>
              <object name="Kak_no real name">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                  Conversationfix
                  if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_no real name")) {
                    Conversationcounter
                    SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_no real name")
                    SetCounter ("no real name", 1)
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("Oh, so what is your real name then?")
                    GetInput() {
                      player.real = CapFirst(result)
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      msg ("Well, it's nice to finally meet you for real {player.real}!")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Lilith gives you a big smile.")
                      SetFlagOn ("realname")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                      wait {
                        msg ("Although, haven't I met you for real already?")
                        wait {
                          msg ("After all, even if you had a fake name, you still are the one who is in control of {player.alias}.<br/>So, the way how you treated me on this date and on the previous ones is still a reflection of you as a real person.<br/>")
                          wait {
                            msg ("It all means something, even if you didn't think it did.")
                            msg ("Even if you did something to just have fun in a videogame or to see what it would do, that still says something about you as a person.")
                            wait {
                              msg ("<br/>Sometimes we hide behind the roles we play to make actions that would not be acceptable to ourselves and others if our true self would make them.")
                              wait {
                                msg ("That's why it might feel scary to some if they catch a glimpse of themselves in the reflection of their screen. Because it's someone they don't recognise.<br/>Do you ever feel like that, {player.real}?...")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("All these different roles form a web of half-truths and lies, and in the center of it all you can find our true self.")
                                  msg ("Not the self we think we are, not the self others see us as, but the self we inevitably are.")
                                  wait {
                                    MovePlayer (Kak_what do you do for a living)
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    IncreaseCounter ("no real name")
                    if (GetInt(game, "no real name") = 2) {
                      MovePlayer (Kak_no real name 2)
                    }
                  }
                ]]></script>
                <object name="Kak_no real name_choice">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />

                        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("So it's not really (time it is supposed to be with Lilith)?")
                          JS.eval ("var today = new Date();var dd = today.getDate();var mm = today.getMonth()+1;var yyyy = today.getFullYear();var hrs = today.getHours();var mins = today.getMinutes();var secs = today.getSeconds();ASLEvent('SetHours',hrs);ASLEvent('SetMinutes',mins);if(mm<10) {	mm = '0'+mm} today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy;if(hrs>12) {	ampm = 'pm';	hrs = '0' + '' + hrs - 12}else{	ampm = 'am'}; if(dd<10) { dd = '0'+dd} if (mins<10) {	mins = '0'+mins} if(secs<10) {secs = '0' + secs}time = hrs + ':' + mins + ':' + secs + ' ' + ampm;ASLEvent('SetDate',today);ASLEvent('SetTime',time);ASLEvent('SetYear',yyyy);ASLEvent('SetMonth',mm);ASLEvent('SetDay',dd);if(mm==12&&(dd>27&&dd<=31)){ASLEvent('SetHoliday','newYears');};")
                          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                          MovePlayer (Kak_real time_choice)
                        ]]></script>

                            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                              if ((player.hoursJS) < 20) {
                                if ((player.hoursJS) > 8) {
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  msg ("So it's bright outside?")
                                  msg ("Did you watch the sunrise?")
                                  MovePlayer (Kak_did you watch the sunrise already_choice)
                                }
                                else if ((player.hoursJS) = 8) {
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  msg ("Is the sun rising right now?")
                                  msg ("Is there a window close to you? Could you watch the sunrise for me?")
                                }
                              }
                              else if ((player.hoursJS) = 22) {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                msg ("Ah, so it is the same time as it is here? That's pretty cool.")
                              }
                            ]]></script>

                <object name="Kak_no real name 2">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Thinking about your actions.")
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("We can not stop being.<br/>")
                    wait {
                      msg ("Atleast as long as there is someone to observe us, as long as we impact something we will always be something.<br/>")
                      wait {
                        msg ("I wonder sometimes, whether or not we can stop being but keep existing if we were somehow able to not be observed by anyone and don't impact anything.<br/>")
                        wait {
                          msg ("This would be really hard I imagine, because even in an empty universe without observers and without things to impact we would still observe ourselves and impact ourselves.<br/>")
                          wait {
                            msg ("We would need to exist without body. So if there is such a thing as a soul, we would need to be only our soul and nothing more. Then we would have to have enough consciousness to know we exist but not as much as is needed to truly think. I think the closest to that sensation we can get in reality might be a dream, in a dream you know you exist but you can't really ponder that, you just go along with whatever your dream throws at you.<br/>")
                            wait {
                              msg ("<br/>Except, there would be nothing thrown at you, as you are the only thing in an entire universe. So you would just go with the Nothing, barely conscious, and that would be the only way to exist without really being.<br/>")
                              wait {
                                msg ("But that's truly a thing of language, because you would ofcourse still be a thing in this empty universe but I'm talking about the act of being something, of having an identity.<br/>")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("I think as long as you would have actions that are your own you still would keep being yourself, if you only had actions that were not your own you would just be.<br/>")

                          }

          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)

            SetFlagOn ("tracker3")
          }

            msg ("Lilith stops talking for a moment as she begins staring at the star-filled night, it seems like something has drawn her attention away from you.")

          wait {

            msg ("However, one point seems to be getting bigger and bigger, it doesn't seem to be a star as it's not sending out any light.")
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_alternate place")) {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
                play sound ("gameOver and edgeofthegalaxy.wav", false, true)
              }
              wait {
                msg ("The both of you watch in absolute terror as the thing only starts to get closer, becoming larger, in an alarming rate. ")

                  msg ("Before you can move away the meteorite smashes Lilith like a newspaper would smash a fly, miraculously it didn't even hit you.")

                    msg ("Game over")
                    SetFontSize (13)
                    msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                    SetFontSize (player.nsize)

                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
            else {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("The meteorite can't kill her from where she is now sitting.")
            }
          }
        </script>
