                              SetFontSize (29)
                              msg ("<br/>Game over")
                              SetFontSize (13)
                              msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                              SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                              wait {
                                MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                              }
                            }
                          }
                          else {
                            msg ("What is happening {player.alias}?")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                            msg ("The fear in her voice is (palpapble?).<br/>Suddenly you feel the hill shooting upwards. The increased force of the gravity is pinning you against the hill but not for long, you begin to roll off the hill and fall down in the middle of a lake close to where the hill used to sit. ")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                            wait {
                              msg ("Lilith, it's safe in here, jump down!")
                              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                              msg ("I.... I can't... it's already too high...")
                              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                              msg ("She's right, you can barely hear her words anymore from that height.")
                              wait {
                                msg ("All you can do is float there, powerless, while you watch the hill and Lilith getting swallowed by the ink-black sky. As you do you notice that there are some sort of thrusters sticking out from the bottom of the hill. (Search other words for hill.)")
                                wait {
                                  SetFontSize (29)
                                  msg ("<br/>Game over")
                                  SetFontSize (13)
                                  msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                                  SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                  wait {
                                    MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        ]]></script>

                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                  AddPageLink (Kak_continue chatting please, game purpose_I can choose to, "It's not automatic, a link with the text \"Retry\" shows up and when I click it I restart the day but I get to keep the knowledge of the things that happened.")
                  AddPageLink (Kak_continue chatting please, game purpose_sometimes you live, "(if player has seen game overs where she lived make this an option.)                   SetFlagOff ("Kak_gamegoal")
                </script>
                <object name="Kak_continue_game purpose">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    Linkfix
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_game purpose")) {
                      SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_game purpose")
                      SetCounter ("game purpose", 1)
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    }
                    else {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Now that you came back to this page you will be able to continue certain conversations from this page.")
                      IncreaseCounter ("game purpose")
                      if (GetInt(game, "game purpose") = 2) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                        msg ("Placeholder 2.")
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "Kak_gamegoal")) {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                          msg ("Sure, but when you mention not having much time, do you mean I'm going to die again?... ")
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          msg ("Lilith puts her hands to her head and shudders.")
                          wait {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                            msg ("It's probably best to not think too much about my situation right now.")
                            wait {
                              msg ("So, we already now how the game looks. What about the \"retrying\" part of the game? Do you always automatically come back when I end up getting killed?")
                              wait {
                                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                MovePlayer (Kak_continue chatting please)
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                      else if (GetInt(game, "game purpose") = 3) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                        msg ("Placeholder 3.")
                        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "I can choose_that makes sense")) {
                          SetFlagOff ("I can choose_that makes sense")
                          AddPageLink (Kak_continue_game purpose, that makes sense_choices_no, "No, I think I understand the purpose of this game now. Thanks Lilith! (This is kind of useless since you reach this page by telling her you want to continue talking so you should probably remove it.)")
                          AddPageLink (Kak_continue_game purpose, that makes sense_choices_yes, "I would like to talk some more about this game. (Make this a slightly different text since it doesn't make much sense.")
                        }
                        else if (GetBoolean(game, "I can choose_that makes no sense")) {
                          SetFlagOff ("I can choose_that makes no sense")
                          AddPageLink (Kak_continue_game purpose, I can choose_but what is the point, "Alright, that actually makes a lot of sense. But what is the point of it all? (Rewrite this text slightly, it is here so you can finish your conversation while not killing Lilith with the meteorite.)")
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  </script>

          SetFlagOff ("Kokiri_introduction")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Alternate_Kokiri_introduction")) {

            SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_alternate place")

            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)

              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("You know, I'm really glad to be back here..")

              msg ("The both of you start placing down all the food on the blanket, when you're both finished you sit down on it.<br/>")
              wait {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("You know, this is really a beautiful view of the village we've got from here...")
                msg ("But how did you know about this place? I always gave it that name when I was a kid but I never told anyone.")
                wait {
                  SetFlagOn ("Kokiri")
                  MovePlayer (Kak_music)
                }
              }
            }
          }
        ]]></script>

    <object name="Beach_start">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary">
        <item>
          <key>Game_start</key>
          <value>Go back.</value>
        </item>
      </options>
      <script type="script">
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("Oh, I'd love to {player.alias}")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("This is just the beach settup, I'm only working on this once Kokiri woods is complete/stable.")
        msg ("You need to see one path to be able to come to the conclusion to flee the world. I'll already give you the flag so you can meet James.")
        SetFlagOn ("Beachpath")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("Choose a location. (purely to test things out.)")
        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
        AddPageLink (Beach_start, Waterpark_start, "Waterpark.")
        AddPageLink (Beach_start, Beach2_start, "Go to the beach and select a few different things.")
        SetFlagOn ("Beachstart")
        if (GetBoolean(game, "rain")) {
          SetFlagOff ("rain")
          SetFlagOn ("rainlover")
        }
        if (GetBoolean(game, "raintalked")) {
          SetFlagOff ("raintalked")
        }
      </script>
      <object name="Waterpark_start">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          if (GetBoolean(game, "keygot")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("For now you open the locker automatically, add an option to choose to do so.")
            MovePlayer (Waterpark_open locker)
          }
          else {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "keyseen")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("You now know that the key fits this locker, atleast you can now pick it up.")
              SetFlagOn ("keyuse")
              MovePlayer (Game_start2)
            }
            else {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Regular describing of the lockers and the waterpark.")
              MovePlayer (Game_start2)
            }
          }
        </script>

                msg ("He began to cut the salmon, slice the fish up with his knife.<br/>Suddenly the beauty sprang and it flipped into the sea from the botttom of the red boat, from the boat of Väinämöinen.<br/>And from there it raised its head and a smooth right shoulder lifted on the fifth gust of the wind and upon the sixth high roller.<br/>Then it raised a right hand up and a left foot too appeared on the seventh billow's back riding on the ninth high roller.<br/>Then it spoke in clear words and berated Väinämöinen:\"O you, you old Väinämöinen! I did not intend to come here to be sliced up for a salmon,<br/>to serve myself as cuts of fish for your breakfast, morning snacks, salmon dinners or big suppers.<br/>...<br/>You had not the sense to hold me, Vellamo's young water maiden, Ahto's favourite, little Aino.\"")

      <object name="Beach2_start">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />

          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)

            SetCounter ("beachturn", 0)
            SetFlagOff ("Beachstart")
            AddPageLink (Beach2_start, Sea dike_start, "Walk on the sea dike.")
          }
          else {
            msg ("{game.beachturn} beach turns.")
          }
        </script>
        <object name="Bookstore_start">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") >= 4) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("There is no one in the bookstore.")
              RemovePageLink (Beach2_start, Bookstore_start)
            }
            else {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "ice")) {
                SetForegroundColour ("LightSteelBlue")
                msg ("You can't just come in here with icecream!<br/>Eat it outside or come back a bit later.")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Bookstore_no food store choice)
                }
              }
              else {
                RemovePageLink (Beach2_start, Bookstore_start)
              }
            }
            if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") = 3) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "ice")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Shelves fall over on Lilith due to earthquake.")
                SetFontSize (29)
                msg ("Game over")
                SetFontSize (13)
                msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                }
              }
            }
            else if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") > 3) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Shelves have fallen over due to earthquake.")
            }
            IncreaseCounter ("beachturn")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Potential deaths: Falling shelves due to train vibration")
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Bookknowledge")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Add an option to suggest a book to her based on her preferences she mentioned in the burger restaurant.")
            }
            MovePlayer (Beach2_start)
          ]]></script>
          <object name="Bookstore_no food store choice">

                <inherit name="scripttext" />

                  if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") >= 4) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("You take some mayonnaise.")
                    if (GetInt(game, "Friet_not") = 2) {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "Mayo_license")) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        if (not GetBoolean(game, "M for mayo")) {
                          msg ("You win this one {player.alias}. Have your mayo.")
                        }
                        else {
                          msg ("Again? Fine but just know that I'm not happy with this at all {player.alias}.")
                        }
                        SetFlagOn ("M for mayo")
                        msg ("You take some mayonnaise and start shoveling it into your mouth with a tiny spoon you carry around at all times because you are such a mayonnaise-lover.")
                        MovePlayer (Beach2_start)
                      }
                      else {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("...Did you really take mayo and nothing else?")
                        msg ("Did you maybe misclick a link or something?")
                        MovePlayer (Mayo_choice)
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      MovePlayer (Beach2_start)
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("The friendly woman gives you some mayonnaise.")

                      if (GetBoolean(game, "Mayo_license")) {

                          msg ("You win this one {player.alias}. Have your mayo.")

                      }

                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                        msg ("...Did you really order mayo and nothing else?")
                        msg ("Did you maybe misclick a link or something?")
                        MovePlayer (Mayo_choice)
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      MovePlayer (Beach2_start)
                    }
                  }
                  SetFlagOff ("fakemenu")
                ]]></script>

                      </script>
                      <object name="I made no mistake_maybe I could">

                msg ("I think I will pick two scoops of vanilla icecream, what are you choosing {player.alais}?")
              }
              if (GetInt(game, "icecream") > 0) {
                AddPageLink (Icecream_selection, Icecream_move on choice, "Move on.")
              }
              AddPageLink (Icecream_selection, Vanilla, "Vanilla.")
              AddPageLink (Icecream_selection, Chocolate, "Chocolate.")

            RemovePageLink (Beach2_start, Cinema_start)
            if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") = 1) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("The hill ufo breaks through the screen. (All other rooms are locked of due to maintenance or something so you always die right now.)")
              SetFontSize (29)
              msg ("Game over")
              SetFontSize (13)
              msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
              SetFontSize (player.nsize)
              wait {
                MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
              }
            }
            else if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") > 1) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("The screen is completely broken but you and Lilith pretend to watch a film.")
            }
            else if (GetInt(game, "beachturn") = 0) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("You and Lilith watch the movie. (return)")
            }
            IncreaseCounter ("beachturn")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Potential deaths: Train bursts through screen (homage t moving film)")
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            MovePlayer (Beach2_start)

                msg ("Lilith wipes the tears out of her eyes and gives you a little smile.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("I should try to focus on reality, I'm here with you on a lovely trip to the beach. It may not be the absolutely perfect but nothing is and nothing can be. This moment with you is very good and that is absolutely perfect in it's own way.")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Sea dike_right_choice)
                }
              </script>
              <object name="Sea dike_walk right_warn choice">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />

                  AddPageLink (Sea dike_walk right_warn choice, walk right_no pot warn, "Continue walking towards where the flower pot will fall.")
                  AddPageLink (Sea dike_walk right_warn choice, walk right_pot warn, "Move slightly to the left.")
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Eastereggs")) {
                    firsttime {
                      SetFontSize (6)
                      msg ("{page:Shadowman:{color:black:.}}")
                      JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")

                  }

                  </script>
                </object>
                <object name="walk right_pot warn">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />

      <object name="Chinese_phone bathroom">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("I'll be right back {player.alias}, I just need to go to the bathroom real quick.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("Lilith stands up from her chair and pushes it back under the table.")
          msg ("As she enters the bathroom stall you see that she has forgotten her phone, it is still laying on the table.")
          if (GetInt(game, "Lildeaths") >= 7) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Peekedphone")) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            }
            else {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("You know it isn't right to do but maybe you could find a way to save her on her phone. <br/>If there is even the slightest chance that it will help her you owe it to her to try that out, right?")
              SetFlagOn ("Nopeek")
            }
          }
          MovePlayer (Chinese_phone_choice)
        ]]></script>
        <object name="Chinese_phone_choice">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (Chinese_phone_choice, Chinese_phone_choice_peek, "Take a quick peek at her phone.")
            AddPageLink (Chinese_phone_choice, Chinese_phone_choice_no peek, "Respect her privacy.")
          </script>
          <object name="Chinese_phone_choice_peek">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <options type="stringdictionary">
              <item>
                <key>Chinese_phone_put phone back</key>
                <value>Put the phone back before she catches you.</value>
              </item>
            </options>
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("As you open her phone you are greeted by a picture of a pug as the phone's background and a prompt. <br/>The prompt says \"Enter password\". {if not Pass: Suddenly it dawns on you that you do not know what Lilith her password is.}")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Pass")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("You remember that her password is 81155")
                GetInput() {
                  if (IsRegexMatch  ("81155",  (result))) {
                    MovePlayer (peek_phone numbers)
                  }
                  else {
                    MovePlayer (peek_phone numbers_caught)
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                SetFlagOn ("Need_pass")
                MovePlayer (phone_choice_peek_choice)
              }
            ]]></script>
            <object name="peek_phone numbers">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("You see the family section of her phone numbers, four names are listed there.<br/>If anyone besides Lilith will have some handy information about her it's them.<br/><br/>You might just have enough time to learn one phone number.")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (peek_phone numbers_choice)
                }
              ]]></script>
              <object name="peek_phone numbers_choice">

                  AddPageLink (peek_phone numbers_choice, phone numbers_choice_Abigail, "Learn Abigail's phone number.")
                  AddPageLink (peek_phone numbers_choice, phone numbers_choice_David, "Learn David's phone number.")
                  AddPageLink (peek_phone numbers_choice, phone numbers_choice_James, "Learn James' phone number.")
                  AddPageLink (peek_phone numbers_choice, phone numbers_choice_Lila, "Learn Lisa's phone number.")
                </script>
                <object name="phone numbers_choice_David">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    SetFlagOn ("David_call")
                    SetFlagOn ("Peekedphone")
                    MovePlayer (peek_phone numbers_caught)
                  </script>
                </object>
                <object name="phone numbers_choice_Abigail">

                    SetFlagOn ("Abigail_call")
                    SetFlagOn ("Peekedphone")
                    MovePlayer (peek_phone numbers_caught)
                  </script>
                </object>

    <object name="Restaurant_death_2">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
            play sound ("gameOver and edgeofthegalaxy.wav", false, true)
          }
          msg ("Suddenly a inmense sensation of pain overwhelms you, the only thing you can see is a glimpse of pure white and an eternity of black.")
          wait {
            msg ("When you awaken you find yourself surrounded by doctors, they tell you that with the force of sheer luck the stray bullet that would've hit Lilith managed to cause a gas leak.")
            msg ("The gas explosion that followed was quite severe, you were in a coma and had to have your wounds cleaned with some surgical procedures.")
            msg ("After a week you got out of your coma, Lilith however didn't have such luck.")
            wait {
              msg ("The doctors tell you that she atleast went out pretty quickly, almost like dying in your sleep but with more explosions.")
              wait {
                SetFontSize (29)
                msg ("Game over")
                SetFontSize (13)
                msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                SetFlagOn ("Burger_death_2")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
          ClearScreen
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("Suddenly you begin to hear the sound of shattering glass.<br/>As you turn to look at the source of the sound you can see that the aquarium next to where Lilith was sitting has shattered.<br/>The water is gushing out rapidly and it does not seem to be planning to stop.<br/>It seems as if somehow the merlin must have made a crack form.<br/>You think about the pure shenanigans that were needed to even make this exact thing happen but you are soon interrupted by the water flowing past your shoes with some fish coming along for the ride.<br/>")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
            play sound ("gameOver and edgeofthegalaxy.wav", false, true)
          }
          wait {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("Quick {player.alias}, we need to do something!")
            wait {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("You try to open the main exit of the restaurant but it doesn't seem to be giving in, almost as if something is blocking it.")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Quick! Maybe we can still go to the first floor, we need to go higher!")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("Pretty much without any other option you two decide to make a rush for the first floor of the restaurant. <br/>When you turn around the corner you see that the stairs are blocked of by an extremely large closet made out of lignum vitae, you can not carry that, all you can do is admire the craftmanship.")
                msg ("You give Lilith a firm hug and tell her that there's nothing else you two can do except for waiting.")
                msg ("And so the both of you wait, in eachothers arms, for certain death.<br/>And it surely came.")
                wait {
                  SetFontSize (29)
                  msg ("Game over")
                  SetFontSize (13)
                  msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                  SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  IncreaseCounter ("Lildeaths")
                  IncreaseCounter ("drowndeaths")
                  wait {
                    MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("You give Lilith a firm hug and tell her that there's nothing else you two can do except for waiting.<br/>")
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Lilithlike")) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("If I have to go now I atleast get some comfort out of the fact that you are here for me.")
                    wait {
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "groundhog")) {
                        msg ("add different ending greet depending on wich excuse you gave.")
                      }
                      else {
                        msg ("Goodbye {player.alias}, thank you for everything.")
                        wait {
                          SetFontSize (29)
                          msg ("Game over")
                          SetFontSize (13)
                          msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                          SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          IncreaseCounter ("Lildeaths")
                          IncreaseCounter ("drowndeaths")
                          wait {
                            MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                  else {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("And so the both of you wait, in eachothers arms, for certain death.<br/>And it comes as expected.")
                    wait {
                      SetFontSize (29)
                      msg ("Game over")
                      SetFontSize (13)
                      msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                      SetFontSize (player.nsize)
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      IncreaseCounter ("Lildeaths")
                      IncreaseCounter ("drowndeaths")
                      wait {
                        MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              SetFlagOn ("Cafe_death_2")
            }
          }
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("Suddenly you hear the faint sound of quacking.")
          msg ("The sound of the quacking steadily grows louder and louder untill it's all you can hear.")
          wait {
            msg ("A true quackophony if you will.")
            wait {
              msg ("Lilith looks over your shoulder with a frightend look in her eyes.")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "musicon")) {
                play sound ("gameOver and edgeofthegalaxy.wav", false, true)
              }
              wait {
                msg ("When you turn around you see a wave of angry geese breaking through the doors of the once cozy Chinese restaurant, the staff is running around in sheer panic.")
                msg ("Before you can make another sound everything turns to white, the white of pesky geese feathers.")
                wait {
                  msg ("The pain you are experiencing is too much and you fall unconscious.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("When you wake up again all the cutomers and staff have dissapeared, including Lilith.")
                    msg ("The room is completely filled to the brim with geese feathers, you begin to sneeze just thinking about that.")
                    msg ("While you are sneezing you notice that someone put a sticky note on your hand.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("It reads a as following: \"We took everyone and you won't be seeing them back, let this be a lesson on why you should not eat or serve geese or ducks, as those are also part of our family. <br/><br/>- Sincerely, the geese\"")
                      wait {
                        SetFontSize (29)
                        msg ("Game over")
                        SetFontSize (13)
                        msg ("Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
                        SetFontSize (11)
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                        SetFlagOn ("Chinese_death_2")
                        wait {
                          MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        else {
          msg ("Error, no flag detected.")
          AddPageLink (Restaurant_death_1, Game_start, "Retry.")
        }
        SetFlagOff ("Car_caught")
        SetFlagOff ("Car_free")
        MovePlayer (Death_music)
      ]]></script>

        <object name="Groundhog_breaking loop">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("So...")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            wait {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("You mean that I have died multiple times in here and that every time I do so you get sent back in time?")
              msg ("So does you saving me just now mean that we are save? That your whole looping problem is able to stop?")
              MovePlayer (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS)
            }
          </script>
          <object name="Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone, "Yup, I broke the loop for once and all.")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop still exists, "Actually you still are going to die. (Add a seperate response eventually that tells her how she dies)")
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop still exists, "Actually you still are going to die. (Add a seperate response eventually that tells her how she dies)")
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop still exists, "Actually you still are going to die. (Add a seperate response eventually that tells her how she dies)")
                }
              }
              else {
                msg ("Error, no flag detected.")
                AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Game_start, "Retry.")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone lie, "*Lie* Yup, I broke the loop once and for all!")
                  RemovePageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone)
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone lie, "*Lie* Yup, I broke the loop once and for all!")
                  RemovePageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone)
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone lie, "*Lie* Yup, I broke the loop once and for all!")
                  RemovePageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Loop gone)
                }
              }
              else {
                msg ("Error, no flag detected.")
                AddPageLink (Groundhog_breaking loop QUESTIONS, Game_start, "Retry.")
              }
              SetFlagOff ("Car_caught")
              SetFlagOff ("Car_free")
            </script>

          </object>
          <object name="Ask_for_proof">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                msg ("She tells the start of the story.")
                SetFlagOn ("Story_start")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Restaurant_death_2)
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                msg ("She tells the middle of the story.")
                SetFlagOn ("Story_medium")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Restaurant_death_2)
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                msg ("She tells the end of the story.")
                SetFlagOn ("Story_end")
                wait {
                  MovePlayer (Restaurant_death_2)
                }
              }
              else {
                msg ("Error, no flag detected.")
                AddPageLink (Restaurant_death_1, Game_start, "Retry.")
              }
              MovePlayer (Restaurant_death_2)
            </script>
          </object>
        </object>

          }

            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)

            msg ("Do you have any proof to maybe show you're a psychic?")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          }
          AddPageLink (Psychic, Prove_test, "Alright, pick a word, doesn't matter wich one but make it a hard one to guess.")
          AddPageLink (Psychic, No_prove, "I've got no clue what to tell you honestly.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          SetFlagOff ("Groundhog")
        </script>
      </object>

  <object name="Page2">
    <object name="Cave">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary">
        <item>
          <key>Cave_2</key>
          <value>Write a message.</value>
        </item>
        <item>
          <key>Cave_3</key>
          <value>Read messages.</value>
        </item>
        <item>
          <key>Page1</key>
          <value>Back to menu.</value>
        </item>
      </options>
      <script type="script">
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("You find yourself in a cave, there are some crayons laying around to write messages on the walls.")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
      </script>
      <object name="Cave_2">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          if (GetInt(game, "message") = 0) {
            player.text = NewStringList()
            player.color = NewStringList()
            player.chat = NewStringList()
            SetCounter ("message", 0)
          }
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("In what color do you want to write your message?")
          GetInput() {
            list add (player.color, CapFirst(result))
            IncreaseCounter ("message")
            if (GetInt(game, "message") >= 7) {
              player.color = NewStringList()
              player.text = NewStringList()
              player.chat = NewStringList()
              SetCounter ("message", 0)
              list add (player.color, CapFirst(result))
              SetCounter ("message", 1)
            }
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("What should your message be?")
            GetInput() {
              game.n = ToString (GetRandomInt(1000000, 9999999))
              if (GetInt(game, "message") = 1) {
                game.n1 = game.n
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 2) {
                game.n2 = game.n
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 3) {
                game.n3 = game.n
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 4) {
                game.n4 = game.n
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 5) {
                game.n5 = game.n
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 6) {
                game.n6 = game.n
              }
              game.encryptedstring = ""
              game.s = "1"
              game.a = result
              for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
                game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
                t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
                if (t>90 or t<65) {
                  t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
                }
                game.t = Chr(t)
                game.encryptedstring = game.encryptedstring + Chr (t)
              }
              game.h = game.encryptedstring
              game.a = ""
              if (GetInt(game, "message") = 1) {
                game.h1 = game.h
                list add (player.text, game.h1)
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 2) {
                game.h2 = game.h
                list add (player.text, game.h2)
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 3) {
                game.h3 = game.h
                list add (player.text, game.h3)
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 4) {
                game.h4 = game.h
                list add (player.text, game.h4)
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 5) {
                game.h5 = game.h
                list add (player.text, game.h5)
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 6) {
                game.h6 = game.h
                list add (player.text, game.h6)
              }
              JS.eval ("var today = new Date();var dd = today.getDate();var mm = today.getMonth()+1;var yyyy = today.getFullYear();var hrs = today.getHours();var mins = today.getMinutes();var secs = today.getSeconds();ASLEvent('SetHours',hrs);ASLEvent('SetMinutes',mins);if(mm<10) {	mm = '0'+mm} today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy;if(hrs>12) {	ampm = 'pm';	hrs = '0' + '' + hrs - 12}else{	ampm = 'am'}; if(dd<10) { dd = '0'+dd} if (mins<10) {	mins = '0'+mins} if(secs<10) {secs = '0' + secs}time = hrs + ':' + mins + ':' + secs + ' ' + ampm;ASLEvent('SetDate',today);ASLEvent('SetTime',time);ASLEvent('SetYear',yyyy);ASLEvent('SetMonth',mm);ASLEvent('SetDay',dd);if(mm==12&&(dd>27&&dd<=31)){ASLEvent('SetHoliday','newYears');};")
              if (GetInt(game, "message") >= 7) {
                player.color = NewStringList()
                player.text = NewStringList()
                player.chat = NewStringList()
                SetCounter ("message", 0)
                list add (player.color, CapFirst(result))
                SetCounter ("message", 1)
              }
              if (GetInt(game, "message") = 1) {
                player.chatday1 = player.day
                player.chatmonth1 = player.month
                player.chathour1 = player.hoursJS
                player.chatmin1 = player.minutesJS
                player.chatyear1 = player.year
                list add (player.chat, "[{player.chatday1}/{player.chatmonth1}/{player.chatyear1}  {player.chathour1}:{player.chatmin1}]")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 2) {
                player.chatday2 = player.day
                player.chatmonth2 = player.month
                player.chathour2 = player.hoursJS
                player.chatmin2 = player.minutesJS
                player.chatyear2 = player.year
                list add (player.chat, "[{player.chatday2}/{player.chatmonth2}/{player.chatyear2}  {player.chathour2}:{player.chatmin2}]")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 3) {
                player.chatday3 = player.day
                player.chatmonth3 = player.month
                player.chathour3 = player.hoursJS
                player.chatmin3 = player.minutesJS
                player.chatyear3 = player.year
                list add (player.chat, "[{player.chatday3}/{player.chatmonth3}/{player.chatyear3}  {player.chathour3}:{player.chatmin3}]")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 4) {
                player.chatday4 = player.day
                player.chatmonth4 = player.month
                player.chathour4 = player.hoursJS
                player.chatmin4 = player.minutesJS
                player.chatyear4 = player.year
                list add (player.chat, "[{player.chatday4}/{player.chatmonth4}/{player.chatyear4}  {player.chathour4}:{player.chatmin4}]")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 5) {
                player.chatday5 = player.day
                player.chatmonth5 = player.month
                player.chathour5 = player.hoursJS
                player.chatmin5 = player.minutesJS
                player.chatyear5 = player.year
                list add (player.chat, "[{player.chatday5}/{player.chatmonth5}/{player.chatyear5}  {player.chathour5}:{player.chatmin5}]")
              }
              else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 6) {
                player.chatday6 = player.day
                player.chatmonth6 = player.month
                player.chathour6 = player.hoursJS
                player.chatmin6 = player.minutesJS
                player.chatyear6 = player.year
                list add (player.chat, "[{player.chatday6}/{player.chatmonth6}/{player.chatyear6}  {player.chathour6}:{player.chatmin6}]")
              }
              MovePlayer (Cave)
            }
          }
        ]]></script>
      </object>

              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 0))

              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c3 = game.c3 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c3}")
            msg ("")
            game.c3 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 3))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 3))
            }
            game.n = game.n4
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h4
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c4 = game.c4 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c4}")
            msg ("")
            game.c4 = ""
          }
          else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 5) {
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 0))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 0))
            }
            game.n = game.n1
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h1
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c1 = game.c1 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c1}")
            msg ("")
            game.c1 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 1))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 1))
            }
            game.n = game.n2
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h2
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c2 = game.c2 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c2}")
            msg ("")
            game.c2 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 2))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 2))
            }
            game.n = game.n3
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h3
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c3 = game.c3 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c3}")
            msg ("")
            game.c3 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 3))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 3))
            }
            game.n = game.n4
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h4
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c4 = game.c4 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c4}")
            msg ("")
            game.c4 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 4))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 4))
            }
            game.n = game.n5
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h5
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c5 = game.c5 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c5}")
            msg ("")
            game.c5 = ""
          }
          else if (GetInt(game, "message") = 6) {
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 0))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 0))
            }
            game.n = game.n1
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h1
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c1 = game.c1 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c1}")
            msg ("")
            game.c1 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 1))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 1))
            }
            game.n = game.n2
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h2
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c2 = game.c2 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c2}")
            msg ("")
            game.c2 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 2))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 2))
            }
            game.n = game.n3
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h3
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c3 = game.c3 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c3}")
            msg ("")
            game.c3 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 3))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 3))
            }
            game.n = game.n4
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h4
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c4 = game.c4 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c4}")
            msg ("")
            game.c4 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 4))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 4))
            }
            game.n = game.n5
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h5
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c5 = game.c5 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c5}")
            msg ("")
            game.c5 = ""
            SetForegroundColour (ListItem(player.color, 5))
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Time")) {
              msg (ListItem(player.chat, 5))
            }
            game.n = game.n6
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h6
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.c6 = game.c6 + Chr (t)
            }
            msg ("{game.c6}")
            msg ("")
            game.c6 = ""
          }
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          game.c1 = ""
          game.c2 = ""
          game.c3 = ""
          game.c4 = ""
          game.c5 = ""
          game.c6 = ""
        ]]></script>
      </object>
    </object>

  <object name="Tree of life">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      SetForegroundColour ("DarkOrchid")
      msg ("What do you seek so deep into this code? ")
      GetInput() {
        if (IsRegexMatch  ("the good ending", LCase (result))) {
          SetForegroundColour ("DarkOrchid")
          msg ("Ah, you seek THE good ending eh?")
          wait {
            msg ("Well... ")
            wait {
              msg ("You did dig pretty far into this game.")
              msg ("You might be able to go a little bit further and find what you seek.")
              msg ("Just be warned, at this point I'm not sure if anything you can find here will suffice.")
              wait {
                msg ("But if you really want to pursue it then you have to find a conversation between two pieces of this game.")
                msg ("A conversation between Adriel and Demetrius.")
                wait {
                  msg ("But to get access to that conversation you'd have to find a way to become Adriel and Demetrius, I'm sure you already got an idea to do just that.")
                  msg ("Unfortunately there is one complication... you have to mention the name of the person you became once again in another conversation that has something to do with their own conversation.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("They are a sort of God-followers, beings that watch the struggle of players against the Creator and the Narrator, so any conversation that mentions gods without you steering it that way should do.")
                    msg ("Good luck player, may you eventually find what you seek.")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (Page1)
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("a good ending", LCase (result))) {
          SetForegroundColour ("DarkOrchid")
          msg ("Ah, you seek a good ending eh?")
          wait {
            msg ("Well... ")
            wait {
              msg ("You did dig pretty far into this game.")
              msg ("You might be able to go a little bit further and find what you seek.")
              msg ("Just be warned, at this point I'm not sure if anything you can find here will suffice.")
              wait {
                msg ("But if you really want to pursue it then you have to find a conversation between two pieces of this game.")
                msg ("A conversation between Adriel and Demetrius.")
                wait {
                  msg ("But to get access to that conversation you'd have to find a way to become Adriel and Demetrius, I'm sure you already got an idea to do just that.")
                  msg ("Unfortunately there is one complication... you have to mention the name of the person you became once again in another conversation that has something to do with their own conversation.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("They are a sort of God-followers, beings that watch the struggle of players against the Creator and the Narrator, so any conversation that mentions gods without you steering it that way should do.")
                    msg ("Good luck player, may you eventually find what you seek.")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (Page1)
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("good ending", LCase (result))) {
          SetForegroundColour ("DarkOrchid")
          msg ("Ah, you seek the good ending eh?")
          wait {
            msg ("Well... ")
            wait {
              msg ("You did dig pretty far into this game.")
              msg ("You might be able to go a little bit further and find what you seek.")
              msg ("Just be warned, at this point I'm not sure if anything you can find here will suffice.")
              wait {
                msg ("But if you really want to pursue it then you have to find a conversation between two pieces of this game.")
                msg ("A conversation between Adriel and Demetrius.")
                wait {
                  msg ("But to get access to that conversation you'd have to find a way to become Adriel and Demetrius, I'm sure you already got an idea to do just that.")
                  msg ("Unfortunately there is one complication... you have to mention the name of the person you became once again in another conversation that has something to do with their own conversation.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("They are a sort of God-followers, beings that watch the struggle of players against the Creator and the Narrator, so any conversation that mentions gods without you steering it that way should do.")
                    msg ("Good luck player, may you eventually find what you seek.")
                    wait {
                      MovePlayer (Page1)
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
        else {
          msg ("I'm sorry, I can't help you with that.")
          msg ("I'll show you the exit so you can leave this place, sorry to disappoint you.")
          wait {
            MovePlayer (Page1)
          }
        }
      }
    </script>
  </object>

      JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")
      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
      AddPageLink (Starsky, Game_start, "Go back after having watched the stars.")
      if (GetBoolean(game, "starsky")) {
        play sound ("Starsoundeffect.mp3", false, false)
      }
      else {
        play sound ("Starsintheforest.wav", false, false)
      }
    ]]></script>
  </object>
  <object name="starskyeaster">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
      if (not GetBoolean(game, "starsky")) {
        ClearScreen
        RemovePageLink (Starsky, starskyeaster)
        SetFlagOn ("starsky")
        MovePlayer (Starsky)
      }
      else {
        play sound ("Starsoundeffect.mp3", false, false)
        ClearScreen
        SetForegroundColour ("Red")
        msg ("What is the password?")
        GetInput() {
          if (player.alias="Brent") {
            if (IsRegexMatch  ("raven", LCase (result))) {
              SetForegroundColour ("Red")
              msg ("The easteregg works!")
              game.n = player.n
              game.encryptedstring = ""
              game.s = "-1"
              game.a = "Nelto(umerm,(jk ywu(bwe zeienng(tpjx tpa|!reavs(ztu uavbled(tw!fccms{!yhi{ pjidev xbwt wf(ume oauf%spmcqgncatl!radm npw o|hms%pewptf%in(m!qifm.(Kk ywu(bwe vo|!xommovf%whw lfxer~e{!yo zeie%thqs(umen(ptffse(dwo,t.(C}u%if(ywv%arm,(bsd qf(ztu irm!wealivh%thqs(ztu xrwcfbl isj tpev!uleism!gy ilt!reavs(ht apeie3 J(miej tpi{!kor(ywv%so(evkty qt(bx m}cp!fs o}(i lqkm!yo.(Vvet tpe(cwokmn(pse |o(nfke(tpfr wpotf3"
                for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
                  game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
                  t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
                  if (t>90 or t<65) {
                    t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
                  }
                  game.t = Chr(t)
                  game.encryptedstring = game.encryptedstring + Chr (t)
                }
                game.h = game.encryptedstring
                game.a = ""
                msg ("{game.h}")
                game.n = player.n
                game.encryptedstring = ""
                game.s = "-1"
                game.a = "Wsdw |hf%bzoseo%ove(tp%mikm umeu hpqe6"

                    t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
                  }
                  game.t = Chr(t)
                  game.encryptedstring = game.encryptedstring + Chr (t)
                }
                game.h = game.encryptedstring
                game.a = ""
                msg ("{game.h}")
              }

  <object name="Benchman">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
      JS.eval ("var today = new Date();var dd = today.getDate();var mm = today.getMonth()+1;var yyyy = today.getFullYear();var hrs = today.getHours();var mins = today.getMinutes();var secs = today.getSeconds();ASLEvent('SetHours',hrs);ASLEvent('SetMinutes',mins);if(mm<10) {	mm = '0'+mm} today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy;if(hrs>12) {	ampm = 'pm';	hrs = '0' + '' + hrs - 12}else{	ampm = 'am'}; if(dd<10) { dd = '0'+dd} if (mins<10) {	mins = '0'+mins} if(secs<10) {secs = '0' + secs}time = hrs + ':' + mins + ':' + secs + ' ' + ampm;ASLEvent('SetDate',today);ASLEvent('SetTime',time);ASLEvent('SetYear',yyyy);ASLEvent('SetMonth',mm);ASLEvent('SetDay',dd);if(mm==12&&(dd>27&&dd<=31)){ASLEvent('SetHoliday','newYears');};")
      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
      msg ("As you are walking to your picknickspot on the hill you pass a bench you've never seen before, or maube you just never paid it attention.")
      msg ("On it sits a man, I would describe him more but frankly, he is not really worth describing, just picture an ordinary man in your head.")
      SetForegroundColour ("SeaGreen")
      msg ("Oh dear, odd to catch you here.")

      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
      msg ("Uhm what happened just now? Oh right, the absolute lunatic sprints of into the distance without even awaiting your answer.")
      msg ("Better get moving {player.alias}.")
      firsttime {
        player.oneday = player.day
        player.onemonth = player.month
        player.oneyear = player.year
        wait {
          MovePlayer (Page1)
        }
      }
      otherwise {
        if (ToInt(player.oneday) > ToInt(player.day)) {
          SetForegroundColour ("SeaGreen")
          msg ("Excellent, it appeared to have worked. (If it's the first day  of a month make sure to check whether the month before it  has 29, 28, 30 or 31 days so you can make sure that it's the previous day, seems pretty doable to code.)")
        }
        else {
          msg ("It didn't work yet.")
        }
      }
    ]]></script>

            msg ("Suddenly you spot a very familiar red Sedan driving towards all of you.")
            msg ("You can't react in time before you meet the immense force of the car.")
            wait {
              msg ("Everything turns to black.")
              wait {
                msg ("After drifting  around in the dark for what feels like an eternity you awaken.")
                msg ("You are in a hospital bed.")
                wait {
                  msg ("When you look around to check for any nurses or doctors you instead place your gaze on a half familiar figure.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("It's David.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Davecolor)
                      msg ("Hello {player.alias}, I'm happy to see that you've finally awoken.")
                      msg ("It's been quite a while, you've been in a coma for about 2 years.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("You ponder the implications about what David said for a moment when another thought enters your mind.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                      msg ("Make this an option to choose.")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                      msg ("What happened to Lilith? Is everyone fine?")
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Davecolor)
                      msg ("Lilith didn't make it...<br/>Lisa and Abigail are fine, as fine as they could be after losing Lilith.<br/>")
                      msg ("I am also moving along, it's what she would have wanted I tell myself.<br/>She was angry with me for leaving our family behind with James' death so I'm not going to make that mistake once again.")
                      msg ("Most days, I get up and after eating breakfast and brushing my teeth I see them in the mirror, James and Lilith.<br/>The thing is, the first time I saw them I expected them to be angry, but they weren't, they were smiliing at me.")
                      msg ("They were asking me to keep living, because they couldn't anymore.<br/><br/>And now, I am asking you to undo all of this.")
                      msg ("<br/>That's why I came to visit for 2 years, to beg you to undo all of this.<br/>If it's possible I'd like to still do the reunion we had but with her surviving.")
                      msg ("<br/>Maybe if you didn't talk that long with us we would've walked away somewhere where that car wouldn't hit us?<br/><br/>But, if you find out that she dies whatever choice you make at the reunion, please don't reunite us again.")
                      msg ("Can you promise me you'll try your best?<br/><br/>(Make a clickable link with I promise.)")
                      MovePlayer (show up_I reunited you_David choice)
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        ]]></script>
        <object name="show up_I reunited you_David choice">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (show up_I reunited you_David choice, I reunited you_David_I promise, "I promise.")
            AddPageLink (show up_I reunited you_David choice, I reunited you_David_no undone, "Actually it doesn't work like that, she will still stay death in this world but in another one she will live.")
            AddPageLink (show up_I reunited you_David choice, I reunited you_David_already tested the other options, "Oh, she survives in the other alternatives of that moment, I've already seen them. (Make this an option if you saw them)")
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Davidpromise")) {
              AddPageLink (show up_I reunited you_David choice, I reunited you_David_this is no the first time, "I have had this conversation with you multiple times already. I'm not promising you anything.")
            }
            SetFlagOn ("Davidpromise")
            // This flag bascially makes it so that I can check whether or not the player has seen this screen.
          </script>
          <object name="I reunited you_David_I promise">

                msg ("So go, and be there for Lilith.")
                msg ("I'll live my life here with a smile, both for what I still have and what my other self will gain without knowing.")

  <object name="Forest nightmare">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
      msg ("The forest looks quite different for some reason...")
      msg ("You can go south, west and east. (the directions work, make some text for them)")
      GetInput() {
        if (IsRegexMatch  ("west", LCase (result))) {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west1)
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("w", LCase (result))) {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west1)
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("south", LCase (result))) {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_south1)
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("s", LCase (result))) {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_south1)
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("east", LCase (result))) {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_east1)
        }
        else if (IsRegexMatch  ("e", LCase (result))) {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_east1)
        }
        else {
          MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_softlock preventer)
        }
      }
    </script>
    <object name="Forest nightmare_start">
      <object name="Forest nightmare_east1">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("You can go further east or go back to the west. (E1)")
          GetInput() {
            if (IsRegexMatch  ("west", LCase (result))) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("w", LCase (result))) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("back", LCase (result))) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("further", LCase (result))) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_east2)
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("east", LCase (result))) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_east2)
            }
            else if (IsRegexMatch  ("e", LCase (result))) {

      <object name="Forest nightmare_south1">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          SetCounter ("south", 0)
          msg ("The trees are very dense in this part of the forest. <br/>You can't go any other way than south, well you can go north I suppose.")
          MovePlayer (south1_logistics)
        ]]></script>
        <object name="south1_logistics">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            GetInput() {
              player.remember_result = result
              if (IsRegexMatch  ("north", LCase (player.remember_result))) {
                if (GetInt(game, "south") = 0) {
                  SetFlagOn ("nonorth")
                }
              }
              else if (IsRegexMatch  ("n", LCase (player.remember_result))) {
                if (GetInt(game, "south") = 0) {
                  SetFlagOn ("nonorth")
                }
              }
              else if (IsRegexMatch  ("south", LCase (player.remember_result))) {
                SetFlagOn ("south1")
              }
              else if (IsRegexMatch  ("s", LCase (player.remember_result))) {
                SetFlagOn ("south1")
              }
              if (GetBoolean(game, "nonorth")) {
                SetFlagOff ("nonorth")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("As you begin to walk back towards the north on autopilot you almost walk right into a tree.<br/>It appears that somehow a tree has grown just to block your path.")
                msg ("it seems you have no other choice than to move south...")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "south1")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                IncreaseCounter ("south")
                switch (true) {
                  case (game.south= 1) {
                    msg ("You walk deeper into the natural hallway of trees.")
                    msg ("You can go south.")
                  }
                  case (game.south= 2) {
                    msg ("For a brief moment you almost think you can hear a voice in the distance.")
                    msg ("You look around startled but there are only trees around you.")
                    msg ("The trees are closer than you'd like, in fact, did they get closer to you?")
                    msg ("You can go south.")
                  }
                  case (game.south= 3) {
                    msg ("You're going crazy aren't you?")
                    msg ("Stop thinking about that voice, there are more pressing matters on hand.")
                    msg ("Continue.")
                    msg ("You can go south.")
                  }
                  case (game.south= 4) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("That's better, this is good for you you know.")
                    msg ("Only having one direction.")
                    msg ("Certainty.")
                    msg ("A gentle push in the right direction.")
                    msg ("Don't mind the treebranches that are clinging onto you.")
                    msg ("Do not let them hold you back from your destination.")
                    msg ("You have to go south.")
                  }
                  case (game.south= 5) {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                    msg ("Can't you smell it?")
                    msg ("The death this place is filled with.")
                    msg ("Or better said, the death you filled it with.")
                    msg ("So many decomposing bodies.")
                    msg ("Left alone in these woods.")
                    msg ("They all are her's, Lilith's.")
                    msg ("Don't worry, that voice you heard can't be her.")
                    msg ("She can only speak the language of the forest now, utter silence.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("You can go to hell for all I care.")
                    }
                  }
                  default {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                    msg ("Error!")
                  }
                }
                if (GetInt(game, "south") < 5) {
                  MovePlayer (south1_softlock preventer)
                }
              }
              else {
                MovePlayer (south1_softlock preventer)
              }
            }
          ]]></script>
          <object name="south1_softlock preventer">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              if (GetBoolean(game, "south1")) {
                SetFlagOff ("south1")
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                msg ("You can't go that way. <br/>You can only go south.")
              }
              MovePlayer (south1_logistics)
            ]]></script>
          </object>
        </object>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Forest nightmare_west1">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        msg ("You find yourself near the opening of a denser part of the forest, the trees are shifting places as you watch them.<br/>It seems like they are forming a maze that keeps changing, it might not be wise to enter unless you know the layout of the maze.<br/>You can go back to the east or proceed towards the west into the maze.")
        GetInput() {
          if (IsRegexMatch  ("east", LCase (result))) {
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("e", LCase (result))) {
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("back", LCase (result))) {
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("west", LCase (result))) {
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west2)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("w", LCase (result))) {
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west2)
          }
          else if (IsRegexMatch  ("maze", LCase (result))) {
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west2)
          }
          else {

          }
        }
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Forest nightmare_west2">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          msg ("The maze seems to change too fast, you probably need to run to make it in time but you're not sure where to go.<br/> (Make the input box show a suggestion, ewswssee or eastwestsouthwest...)<br/><br/>Or you can go back east and leave the maze.")
          GetInput() {
            if (LCase (result) = "east") {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west1)
            }
            else if (LCase (result) = "e") {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west1)
            }
            else if (LCase (result) = "back") {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west1)
            }
            else if (LCase (result) = "neneneeesswwn"  ) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_cabin)
            }
            else if (LCase (result) = "northeastnortheastnortheasteasteastsouthssouthwestwestnorth"    ) {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_cabin)
            }
            else {
              MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_maze fail)
            }
          }
        ]]></script>

              msg ("Please come in.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("The door creaks open slowly, you peak your head inside but you can't see another person.")
              msg ("You enter and close the door behind you.")
            }
          </script>
        </object>

            msg ("Luckily the trees seem to have mercy on you and shift themselves in their original position, you are exactly where you started running")
            MovePlayer (Forest nightmare_west2)
          </script>
        </object>
