  <object name="Project Lumen">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
      SetForegroundColour ("IndianRed ")
      msg ("Project Lumen is showing promise so far.")
      msg ("We have created 22 vessels  in our lab.")
      msg ("Each of them has a piece of a synthetic soul in them. <br/>The synthetic soul was designed based on a lingering soul in what we have dubbed: \" The Light\" <br/>The Light is a very bright place that is given form by the souls that didn't want to move into The Darkness and instead lingered right before it.")
      msg ("We first noticed The Light when we were running a simulation of another world during (Give another project name here). The Light was not programmed to appear but it somehow did anyway.")
      msg ("We made contact with a being in the Light. It told us it was a lingering soul and what that entailed. We were very curious to learn more due to our objective.")
      msg ("We were however promptly booted out of our simulation by a humanoid figure. Our other attempts to reconnect to the Light in that simulation proved fruitless.")
      msg ("Although this did lead us to our next breakthrough, The Light seems to exist in other simulations aswell. It seems to be something that is destined to exist. Or maybe it is just some sort of glitch in our location generator?")
      msg ("Regardless, this place might exist in our reality aswell. In simulations of our exact reality it does exist but the ways to get there are quite... convoluted.<br/>Too convoluted to be possible for us sadly.")
      msg ("That's why we created the vessels. Using the lingering soul's soul as a blueprint for a synthetic soul we hope they will answer the call of the Light for us.<br/>To acomplish this we needed to prime their actions by running a constructed simulation with them in it. That way they can cultivate their soul and thoughts the way we need them to.")
      msg ("Once the vessels have fully grown their own unique soul and have been programmed as we please they are released into the real world.")
      msg ("In the simulation they are made to believe that they moved from their hometown to another town. This makes it so that the vessels won't question nobody knowin them when waking up in the real world.")
      msg ("If needed we can even train groups of vessels together in the same linked simulation to let them think of each other as friends, family or lovers. ")
      msg ("Subjects:")
      msg ("#22: Subject's soul cultivation got corrupted. Our scans say they do not have a full soul, yet they act just like all the other subjects, perhaps even slightly better.<br/>It almost seems as if they have more soul somehow. Could this be the one?")
      msg ("#17: Subject has found the lingering soul it's synthetic soul was based on in it's simulation. The subject became possesed by them, awoke and escaped our lab.<br/>They are untraceable. Hopefully this doesn't compromise our mission.")
      msg ("#3: Subject went rogue after failing to visit non-existent family in the real world.<br/>They have been taken care of before they could form a real threat to our goal.")
      msg ("#4-8: Subjects have been programmed to think of eachother as family. <br/>This prolonged their compliance but when one turned rogue like #3 all of them did.<br/>Luckily for us they turned rogue while in the simulation so we were able to reset all of them but we had to remove #6 as to not risk them turning rogue again.<br/>Recently however #7 has been showing signs of becoming rogue aswell. We might need to remove her aswell.")
      msg ("#9: Subject keeps awakening and attempting to escape. Resetting him did not do anything. We stacked several simulations on top of eachother and trapped him in the deepest one in order to keep him from escaping before his soul is fully grown. This might be wasted effort unfortunately as he is not friendly with us and doesn't seem to be willing to help us with our mission. We mostly keep him around to observe this strange phenomenon.")
      msg ("#11: Subject keeps getting contacted by #9 even though they are not in a linked simulation.<br/>#9 uses lower forms of simulations, games within the simulation itself to contact them. Try to prevent this from spreading to the others.<br/>Our current hypothesis is that this is possible because the programming pods are next each other but we need to do further testing to confirm this.")
      msg ("#14: Subject seems to have split itself into two beings, each with only half of a soul. In the simulation they each have their own body.<br/>We need to test the effects of only programming one half of the soul. This is very intriguing.")
    ]]></script>
  </object>
  <object name="Kokiri_visit alone">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      if (GetBoolean(game, "ufoknowledge")) {
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_visit alone, visit alone_visit ufo, "Visit the hill-ufo.")
      }
      if (GetBoolean(game, "Lakemet")) {
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_visit alone, visit alone_visit Lake, "Visit the Lakelady.")

    </script>
    <object name="visit alone_visit ufo" />
    <object name="visit alone_visit Lake">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("You walk towards the lake.")
        msg ("Near the lake lays a giant rock you never saw before.")
        msg ("On that rock lays a lady clad in a blue dress of what appears to be streaming water.<br/>Somehow the water defies all laws of reality and gravity to form her dress.")
        SetForegroundColour ("Navy")
        msg ("Oh hello {player.alias}. I didn't expect you here.<br/>Well actually I did but it's more fun to be surprised every once in a while.")
        msg ("Don't be shy, come sit next to me.")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("She sits back up and pats the rock.")
        msg ("You oblige, as you sit down you feel the warmth of the sun that has seeped into the rock.")
        msg ("She looks you into the eyes for a brief moment, gives you a small smile and looks at the lake.")
        SetForegroundColour ("Navy")
        msg ("Beautiful isn't it? I always found this view so stunning. <br/>I spend all of my time here and even then I don't grow tired of it.")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("You think about her words, if she spends all her time here, why didn't you ever see her here?<br/>It's the first time you saw the rock so maybe that's why you never saw her but when you think even more about it you are pretty sure you've watched the exact spot where the rock is now before without ever seeing a rock there.")
        SetForegroundColour ("Navy")
        msg ("Don't worry about it, I and this rock exist on a different level of reality.<br/>I am not sure if it's a higher or a lower one to be truthful. Let's say I'm somewhere in between, I'm definetly more real than your player character but I'm not as real as you, the one who is reading this text now.<br/>It's a funny situation but I can't complain, as long as I'm given some form to exist in I'm happy.")
        msg ("You know, this reminds me of what an Raven once told me when we were watching the lake together. He said that even though he used to not like the rain or the thick clouds that made it He started to love them once he realised that they made this lake and all the other lakes like it. That there was some sort of wisdom concealed in the evaporating of the lake to make rainclouds to make the lake again. That's when He truly understood me, as I am that wisdom in a way.<br/><br/>You're not Him by any chance, are you? I assume you aren't. (make her talk some more about the wisdom of give and take.)")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("Make her ask why you sacrificed yourself for her and let her tell you that you can help more people in the longterm if you don't sacrifice yourself.")
        SetForegroundColour ("Navy")
        msg ("You know, why did you sacrifice yourself? Was it to see me? Was it because the pit asked you to?")
        msg ("Is it because you like to help people? <br/>You should be careful with sacrificing yourself to help people, in the short term you might help a lot of people but you won't be able to help even more people in the long term.<br/>I think this is important to keep in mind, escpecially for people who tend to ignore their own needs in order to help others.<br/><br/>It's beautiful to want to help others but we should never lose sight of ourselves in the proces.")
      ]]></script>
    </object>
  </object>
  <object name="Cheddar set stuff">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
      AddPageLink (Cheddar set stuff, Cheddar_ set counter, "Set counter.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar set stuff, Cheddar_flag system, "Set flag.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar set stuff, Cheddar_set variable, "Set variable.")
    </script>
    <object name="Cheddar_ set counter">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("Countername?")
        GetInput() {
          player.tempcounter = result
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Which value should {player.tempcounter} be?")
          GetInput() {
            player.tempcountervalue = result
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("{player.tempcounter} has been set to {player.tempcountervalue}.")
            SetCounter (player.tempcounter, ToInt(player.tempcountervalue))
            MovePlayer (Cheddar set stuff)
          }
        }
      </script>
    </object>
    <object name="Cheddar_flag system">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
        AddPageLink (Cheddar_flag system, Cheddar_flag aan, "Enable a flag. (With input box)")
        AddPageLink (Cheddar_flag system, Cheddar_flag uit, "Disable a flag. (With input box)")
        AddPageLink (Cheddar_flag system, Testing menu, "Go back.")
        AddPageLink (Cheddar_flag system, Seen everything, "Get all knowledge.")
      </script>
      <object name="Cheddar_flag uit">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          GetInput() {
            SetFlagOff (result)
            MovePlayer (Cheddar_flag system)
          }
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Cheddar_flag aan">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          GetInput() {
            SetFlagOn (result)
            MovePlayer (Cheddar_flag system)
          }
        </script>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Cheddar_set variable">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        // SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        // msg ("Variable?")
        // GetInput() {
          // player.tempvar = result
          // SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          // msg ("What should {player.tempvar} be set to?")
          // GetInput() {
            // player.tempvarname = result
            // SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            // msg ("{player.tempvar} has been set to {player.tempvarname}. (This does currently not work like it is supposed to.")
            // player.tempvar = player.tempvarname
            msg ("Attribute?")
            GetInput() {
              player.tempattr = result
              msg ("What should player.{player.tempattr} be set to?")
              GetInput() {
                player.tempvalue = result
                msg ("player.{player.tempattr} will be set to {player.tempvalue}.")
                // set takes three parameters:
                // 1 - an object
                // 2 - the name of an attribute
                // 3 - the value to set that attribute to
                set (player, player.tempattr, player.tempvalue)
                MovePlayer (Cheddar set stuff)
              }
            }
      </script>
    </object>
  </object>
  <object name="Cheddar_extra">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Write a log Cheddar, "Write a log.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Test functions menu, "{colour:darkviolet:Extra functions to test and use in the game.}")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Testing menu, "Go back.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, ENDINGS, "Check out the endings.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Kokiri cheddar testing, "Play game, starting from Kokiri.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Kok_control own choices_choice, "Test out the most recent stuff in Kokiri path 2 that needs testing and building.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Debug, "Toggle debug mode on/off.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Seen everything, "Gives you all knowledge.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Lightlock_settings, "Test lightlock.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Kak_continue talking about old topics, "Test out the continue talking mechanic.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Cheddar_conversation, "Test out the conversation stuff with you dying if you don't pick sit to my right eventually.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, tsme_talk about something else, "Talk about something else.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, Test page for Linkfix system, "Test Linkfix out.")
      AddPageLink (Cheddar_extra, TEST_poems meteorite, "Test poem selection with old/new stuff meteorite.")
    </script>
    <object name="Cheddar_marker choice">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
        AddPageLink (Cheddar_marker choice, Cheddar_marker system, "Add a marker (The last page you saw before opening Cheddar)")
        AddPageLink (Cheddar_marker choice, Cheddar_marker read, "Show a list of your current markers.")
      </script>
      <object name="Cheddar_marker read">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
          if (GetInt(game, "active markers") = 0) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("There are currently no markers active.")
          }
          else if (GetInt(game, "active markers") < 0) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("You should not see this message, if you do this is a bug because the marker counter says you have less than zero.")
          }
          else {
            SetCounter ("markers", game.active markers)
            foreach (k, player.markers) {
              DecreaseCounter ("markers")
              AddPageLink (Cheddar_marker system, ListItem(player.markers, game.markers), ToString(ListItem(player.markers, game.markers)))
            }
          }
          AddPageLink (Cheddar_marker read, Testing menu, "Go back to cheddar menu.")
        ]]></script>
      </object>
      <object name="Cheddar_marker system">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
          firsttime {
            SetCounter ("active markers", 0)
            SetCounter ("list_page", game.previous_page-4)
            player.markers = NewobjectList ()
            SetCounter ("prevprev_page", 0)
            list add (player.markers, ListItem(player.pages, game.list_page))
            IncreaseCounter ("active markers")
            AddPageLink (Cheddar_marker system, ListItem(player.markers, 0), ToString(ListItem(player.markers, 0)))
            // SetCounter ("time_page", game.previous_page -game.timemachine-3)
          }
          otherwise {
            SetCounter ("list_page", game.previous_page-4)
            list add (player.markers, ListItem(player.pages, game.list_page))
            IncreaseCounter ("active markers")
            SetCounter ("prevprev_page", game.previous_page -4)
            SetCounter ("markers", game.active markers)
            foreach (k, player.markers) {
              DecreaseCounter ("markers")
              AddPageLink (Cheddar_marker system, ListItem(player.markers, game.markers), ToString(ListItem(player.markers, game.markers)))
            }
          }
        </script>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Kokiri cheddar testing">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        SeenEverything
        SetFlagOn ("Car_caught")
        MovePlayer (Kokiri_woods)
      </script>
    </object>
  </object>
  <object name="Debug">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      if (not GetBoolean(game, "debug")) {
        SetFlagOn ("debug")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("Debug mode enabled.")
      }
      else {
        SetFlagOff ("debug")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("Debug mode disabled.")
      }
      MovePlayer (Testing menu)
    </script>
  </object>

    <object name="Prove_test">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <options type="stringdictionary">
        <item>
          <key>Answer_wrong_1</key>
          <value>Wrong answer 1</value>
        </item>
        <item>
          <key>Answer_wrong_2</key>
          <value>Wrong answer 2</value>
        </item>
        <item>
          <key>Answer_wrong_3</key>
          <value>Wrong answer 3</value>
        </item>
      </options>
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Groundhog")) {
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Groundhog_answer_right")) {
            AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_right, "It's -72,8947, can we move on now?")
          }
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_wrong_1, "It's 20.")
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_wrong_2, "It's 38.")
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_wrong_3, "It's -17.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("This sounds interesting. <br/><br/>Alright, I've gotten my number!")
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Prove_give answer, "Alright, now tell me which number you got in mind.")
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "Psychic")) {
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Psychic_answer_right")) {
            AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_right, "It's electronegativity.")
          }
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_wrong_1, "It's photosynthesis.")
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_wrong_2, "It's apple.")
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Answer_wrong_3, "It's abyss.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Alright, I see where you are going with this.")
          msg ("Lilith  looks at you with a sceptic look in her eyes although you can tell that she's secretly excited.")
          msg ("I got my word, guess away magic {player.alias}!")
          AddPageLink (Prove_test, Prove_give answer, "Alright, now tell me which word you are thinking about.")
        }
        else {
          msg ("Error, no flags detected.")
        }
        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Answer_wrong_1">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Psychic")) {
            SetFlagOn ("Psychic_answer_right")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("That was the wrong word, I knew you wouldn't guess that it was electronegativity.")
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "Groundhog")) {
            SetFlagOn ("Groundhog_answer_right")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("That was the wrong number, I knew you wouldn't guess -72,8947!")
          }
          wait {
            MovePlayer (Car_death)
          }
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Answer_wrong_3">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />

          if (GetBoolean(game, "Psychic")) {
            SetFlagOn ("Psychic_answer_right")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("That was the wrong word, I knew you wouldn't guess that it was electronegativity.")
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "Groundhog")) {
            SetFlagOn ("Groundhog_answer_right")

            msg ("That was the wrong number, I knew you wouldn't guess -72,8947!")
          }
          MovePlayer (Car_death)
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Answer_right">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <options type="stringdictionary">
          <item>
            <key>Restaurant_death_2</key>
            <value>Click here to have res death 2.</value>
          </item>
        </options>
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Need_proof")) {
            AddPageLink (Answer_right, Ask_for_proof, "Ask her to give you proof to convince her past self that she is in danger.")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Groundhog")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Lilith looks absolutely flabergasted, her mouth is slightly opened and seems to be frozen for a moment or two.")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("So you were actually speaking the truth? <br/>You really are living in some sort of groundhog-day like scenario?")
            msg ("Even with that proof it's pretty hard to get my brain to accept it.")
            msg ("I feel like when I'm going to admit I believe you there is going to come an entire camera crew out of nowhere and I'll be made fun of in some bad tv show. But let's say I am starting to believe you a little bit so we won't have the camera crew barge in on us.")
            msg ("So what is this all about?")
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            MovePlayer (Answer_right_groundhog)
          }
          else if (GetBoolean(game, "Psychic")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Suddenly you catch a glimpse of utter shock on Lilith's face.")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("Wait, you... You guessed the word I was thinking of?")
            msg ("I mean sure, you said you would do that but I didn't expect for you to get it right if I'm being honest.")
            msg ("This all feels so surreal, I mean I'm starting to believe you but I feel like if I say I completly believe you some cameracrew will come out from their hiding spots and make fun of me for believing something so stupid.")
            msg ("So if I'd hypothetically believe you, what is all of this about?")
            MovePlayer (Answer_right_psychic)
          }
        ]]></script>
        <object name="Answer_right_groundhog">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, Groundhog_breaking loop, "I'm trying to break my loop by making sure you don't die on this date.")
            AddPageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, Groundhog_escape fate, "I'm trying to escape fate to save you from dying.")
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Need_proof")) {
              AddPageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, Untold story, "I need some proof to make the past you trust me when I tell her the restaurants we wanted to go to are not safe.")
            }
            RemovePageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, no time to explain)
            RemovePageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, no time to explain)
            RemovePageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, no time to explain)
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Beachpath")) {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, no time to explain, "I have no time to explain, we need to get out of here, follow me.")
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, no time to explain, "I have no time to explain, we need to get out of here, follow me.")
                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {
                  AddPageLink (Answer_right_groundhog, no time to explain, "I have no time to explain, we need to get out of here, follow me.")
                }
              }
            }
          </script>
          <object name="Untold story">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Add a page in between here or text right here that basically is Lilith coming up with the idea to tell you the story.")
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Once upon a time there was a world, but the world doesn't concern this story.")
                msg ("For the story we need to look high in the inkfilled sea some like to call the night.")
                msg ("Floating in that sea is the majestic moon herself who guides us through the night and turns gold to silver, confidence to elegance.")
                msg ("")
                msg ("That's the end of this part of the story, like I said you are the only person I've ever told this to so I hope you'll make good use out of it.")
                AddPageLink (Untold story, Restaurant_death_2, "I sure will! ")
                SetFlagOn ("Story_start")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("The majestic moon is far from alone though, in the dark she is kept company by a thousand stars tha shine almost as bright as herself and one special raven with a silver crown.")
                msg ("The little raven was a prince, his parents ruled their raven-kingdom on a nice looking kind throne carved out from the wood of an oak.")
                msg ("The prince would one day inherit the throne but he still felt sad somehow. That was untill he noticed a silver light reflecting from his crown as he was between waking and dreams.")
                msg ("")
                msg ("That's the end of this part of the story, like I said you are the only person I've ever told this to so I hope you'll make good use out of it.")
                AddPageLink (Untold story, Restaurant_death_2, "I sure will! ")
                SetFlagOn ("Story_medium")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("The raven looked up and noticed the shining moon and from that day on he never left her side.")
                msg ("They talk for hours, about everything and nothing. When the night would end in one part of the world the raven would follow the moon to another.")
                msg ("To this day you can still clearly see them when they come visit you.")
                msg ("The end.")
                msg ("")
                msg ("That's the end of this part of the story, like I said you are the only person I've ever told this to so I hope you'll make good use out of it.")
                AddPageLink (Untold story, Restaurant_death_2, "I sure will! ")
                SetFlagOn ("Story_end")
              }
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            </script>
          </object>
        </object>
        <object name="Answer_right_psychic">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (Answer_right_psychic, auraOfDeath, "You have an aura of death surrounding you Lilith, I'm trying to keep you safe with my powers.")
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Need_proof")) {

            }

            }
            else if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
              AddPageLink (Answer_right_psychic, dateToSave, "I knew you would die on a date in a burger restaurant because of a lost bullet so I figured I would be your date so I would be able to warn you.")

            }
            else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
              AddPageLink (Answer_right_psychic, dateToSave, "I knew you would die on a date in a cafe because of a shark's crushing weight so I figured I would be your date so I would be able to warn you.")
              AddPageLink (Answer_right_psychic, justHelpingOut, "Well, while you were sitting there somehow I just felt that that would happen.")
            }

            RemovePageLink (Answer_right_psychic, no time to explain)

                }
              }

                if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_2")) {

                }
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {

                }
              }
            }
          </script>
          <object name="dateToSave">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("Seems rather convoluted doesn't it?")
              msg ("Couldn't you just have found me and told me?")
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                AddPageLink (dateToSave, youwouldntbel, "Oh yeah, and you would just believe a random person telling you that you will die of an allergy in a chinese restaurant on a specific day?")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                AddPageLink (dateToSave, youwouldntbel, "Oh yeah, and you would just believe a random person telling you that you will die by being crushed by a great white shark in a fish themed cafe on a specific day?")
              }
              else if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                AddPageLink (dateToSave, youwouldntbel, "Oh yeah, and you would just believe a random person telling you that you will die because of a gunshot wound in a burger restaurant on a specific day?")
              }
              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            </script>
            <object name="youwouldntbel">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script">
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Hmm, you made a fair point there, even if I would have believed you I don't think I would have actually been able to remember it when I needed that knowledge.")
                msg ("It still sounds like there were better, less convoluted ways to keep me from dying but I'm still really thankfull that you saved my life.")
                msg ("We actually cheated death itself, take that death!")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                AddPageLink (youwouldntbel, dontteaseDeath, "I think it may not be really wise to tease death itself. ")
                SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                AddPageLink (youwouldntbel, take that, "Take that death, we've won, woohoo!")
                if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese")) {
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Chinese_death_2")) {
                    AddPageLink (youwouldntbel, stillDying, "Actually you're still going to die if we keep sitting here, this time by an army of angry geese.")
                  }
                }
                else if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger")) {
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Burger_death_2")) {
                    AddPageLink (youwouldntbel, stillDying, "Actually you are still going to die if we keep sitting here, this time it'll be a gas explosion.")
                  }
                }
                else if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe")) {
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Cafe_death_2")) {
                    AddPageLink (youwouldntbel, stillDying, "Actually you are still going to drown, this time by drowning.")
                  }
                }
              </script>

                <object name="Crash ufo_follow the trail">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <options type="stringdictionary">
                    <item>
                      <key>follow the trail loop</key>
                      <value>Jump to the next picture.</value>
                    </item>
                    <item>
                      <key>Crash ufo_look at picture</key>
                      <value>Look at the picture you are standing on.</value>
                    </item>
                    <item>
                      <key>Crash ufo_backwards trail</key>
                      <value>Jump to the previous picture.</value>
                    </item>
                  </options>
                  <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                    IncreaseCounter ("Picture")
                    ClearScreen
                    if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 1) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("You jump to the next picture.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 2) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("You keep jumping from picture to picture.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 3) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("At first it doesn't seem like you are making much progress.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 4) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("But after a while you see something coming closer and closer.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 5) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("That \"something\" you saw seems to be human, it has a human looking figure anyway.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 6) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("You didn't jump far enough, you barely manage to grab the border of the polaroid and pull yourself up.<br/>You take a moment to breath after performing such a feat. While you do you look once more at the mysterious figure.<br/>The figure wears a grey hoodie.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 7) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Your legs are beginning to get really tired, luckily it seems as if you are getting closer to the figure. <br/>They have their back turned towards you.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 8) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("Only one picture is between you and the figure, which is standing on a picture aswell, you ignore the cramp in your legs.")
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 9) {
                      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                      msg ("The next jump will land you on the picture the figure is standing on, right behind them.")
                      if (GetBoolean(game, "Readshiplog")) {
                        firsttime {
                        }
                        otherwise {
                          if (GetBoolean(game, "Readshiplog")) {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                            msg ("A crack in the white nothingness appears.")
                            msg ("It somehow is right next to the floating polaroind even though you can see the nothingness stretch out beyond that point.")
                            msg ("It makes no sense, just looking at it makes your head hurt.")
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                            msg ("Link this to the neya encounter page.")
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                    else if (GetInt(game, "Picture") = 10) {
                      MovePlayer (Crash ufo_follow trail_James)
                    }
                  ]]></script>
                  <object name="follow the trail loop">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script">
                      MovePlayer (Crash ufo_follow the trail)
                    </script>
                  </object>
                  <object name="Crash ufo_follow trail_James">
                    <inherit name="scripttext" />
                    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                      if (GetInt(game, "Shadow") < 4) {
                        SetForegroundColour (player.Jaycolor)
                        msg ("Welcome {player.alias}, I was expecting you.")
                        msg ("This place must feel pretty strange to you, let's move to a more familiar one.")
                        wait {
                          SetBackgroundColour ("Black")
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          msg ("You and the boy are now both standing in your room.")
                          wait {
                            SetForegroundColour (player.Jaycolor)
                            msg ("Don't be fooled, this room doesn't exist anymore due to the universe collapsing in on itself, it's just an illusion.")
                            msg ("I just thought this place might be easier on the eyes if you want to talk with me.")
                            msg ("We need to talk, about... about all of this.")
                            msg ("I assume you already know who I am?")
                            MovePlayer (James_choice)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                      else {
                        if (GetBoolean(game, "Eastereggs")) {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                          msg ("You see a shadowy figure with a lanky neck and a rectangle as his head.")
                          SetForegroundColour ("Black")
                          msg ("Hello there {player.alias}. It seems you somehow found me, I'm impressed!<br/>Don't tell James I was here.")
                          wait {
                            ClearScreen
                            SetForegroundColour ("Black")
                            MovePlayer (Game_start2)
                          }
                        }
                        else {
                          SetForegroundColour (player.Jaycolor)
                          msg ("Welcome {player.alias}, I was expecting you.")

    <object name="Code test">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        msg ("<style>a>.cmdlink{green !important}</style><h3><samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\">PLEASE PRESS 1 TO ENCODE, 2 TO DECODE, or {command:EXIT}</samp></h3>")
        GetInput() {
          result = LCase(result)
          if (not result = "exit") {
            if ((not EndsWith(result, "1") and not EndsWith(result, "2"))) {
              error ("I said enter 1 or 2!!!")
            }
            if (result = "2") {
              result = "-1"
            }
            game.s = result
            msg ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\"><b>Enter the text you wish to {if game.s=1:encode}{if game.s<>1:decode}</b>")
            GetInput() {
              game.a = result
              msg ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\"><b>You entered: </b>" + game.a)
              msg ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\"><b>Enter seven figure number key.</b>")
              GetInput() {
                regex = "^\\d{7}$"
                if (not IsRegExMatch(regex, result)) {
                  error ("I said seven digits!")
                  msg ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\">{b:Your result:}")
                }
                game.n = result
                msg ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\"><b>You entered: </b>" + game.n)
                OutputTextNoBr ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\">{b:Your result:}")
                for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
                  game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
                  t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
                  if (t>90 or t<65) {
                    t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
                  }
                  OutputTextNoBr ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\">" +Chr(t))
                  game.t = Chr(t)
                }
              }
            }
          }
          else {
          }
        }
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Code test 2">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <options type="stringdictionary">
          <item>
            <key>Code test 2 decode</key>
            <value>Decode</value>
          </item>
        </options>
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          game.n = ToString (GetRandomInt(1000000, 9999999))
          game.encryptedstring = ""
          game.s = "1"
          GetInput() {
            game.a = result
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.encryptedstring = game.encryptedstring + Chr (t)
            }
            game.h = game.encryptedstring
            msg ("{game.h} (h)")
            game.a = ""
          }
        ]]></script>
        <object name="Code test 2 decode">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            game.s = "-1"
            game.a = game.h1
            for (k, 1, LengthOf(game.a), 1) {
              game.l = k-(k/7)*7+1
              t = Asc(Mid(game.a,k,1))+(ToInt(game.s)*ToInt(Mid(game.n,game.l,1)))
              if (t>90 or t<65) {
                t = t-(ToInt(game.s)%26)
              }
              OutputTextNoBr ("<samp style=\"background:black;color:green;\">" +Chr(t))
              game.t = Chr(t)
              game.encryptedstring = game.encryptedstring + Chr (t)
            }
          ]]></script>
        </object>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Cinema_protagonist">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("Our protagonist is named Robin.  {if Robin_man:He is an ordinary man} {if not Robin_man:She is an ordinary woman}  around {if Robin_man:his} {if not Robin_man: her} twenties. <br/>We see  {if not Robin_man: her} {if Robin_man:him} while {if Robin_man:he} {if not Robin_man: she} is walking through the hallway of {if Robin_man:his} {if not Robin_man: her} home.<br/>What is Robin's goal?")
        MovePlayer (Cinema_goal choices)
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Cinema_goal choices">

    <object name="TESTER_CHEATS">
      <object name="Location_cheat">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("A tool to change locations more easily.")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Burger_start, "{colour:darkviolet:Burger.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Cafe_start, "{colour:darkviolet:Cafe.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Chinese_start, "{colour:darkviolet:Chinese.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Beach_start, "{colour:darkviolet: Beach.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Kokiri_woods, "{colour:darkviolet: Kokiri forest. } ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Crash ufo_James, "{colour:darkviolet: Polaroid zone.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Brentmode settings, " {colour:darkviolet: Brentmode settings, this doesn't belong here but for now it does.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Move to page Cheat, " {colour:darkviolet: Move to a certain page.} ")
          AddPageLink (Location_cheat, Cheddar_marker choice, "Marker system (fast-travel).")
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Move to page Cheat">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          GetInput() {
            if (GetObject (result) = null) {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("That is not a valid page name.")
              MovePlayer (Testing menu)
            }
            else {
              MovePlayer (GetObject(result))
            }
          }
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Save state saver">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          msg (player.previous_page)
          MovePlayer (Export save)
        </script>
      </object>
      <object name="Go back X pages_cheat">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
          AddPageLink (player.parent, ListItem(player.pages, game.prevprev_page), "{colour:darkviolet:Go back one page}")
          AddPageLink (Go back X pages_cheat, Go back X pages_get input, "{colour:darkviolet:Go back X pages.}")
        </script>
        <object name="Go back X pages_get input">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("How many pages do you want to go back?")
            SetCounter ("timemachine", 0)
            GetInput() {
              SetCounter ("timemachine", ToInt(result))
              SetCounter ("time_page", game.previous_page -game.timemachine-3)
              MovePlayer (ListItem(player.pages, game.time_page))
            }
          </script>
        </object>
      </object>
      <object name="Hide_Cheddar">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          SetFlagOn ("hide_cheddar")
          MovePlayer (Testing menu)
        </script>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Testing menu">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
        AddPageLink (player.current_page, Page1, "{colour:darkviolet:Menu}")
        JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")
        AddPageLink (player.parent, player.previous_page, "Go back to where you came from.")
        JS.eval ("$('#divOutput a').last().css({textDecoration: 'none'});")
        AddPageLink (player.parent, Location_cheat, "{colour:darkviolet:Teleporter.}")
        AddPageLink (player.parent, Print previous page name, "{colour:darkviolet:Print previous page name.}")
        AddPageLink (player.parent, Save state saver, "{colour:darkviolet:Click this when you get an error.} ")
        SetFlagOn ("testmenu")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("CheDDAR activated (Cheattool for Developper Dabbling And Researching)")
        AddPageLink (player.parent, Go back X pages_cheat, "{colour:darkviolet:Time machine.}")
        AddPageLink (Testing menu, Hide_Cheddar, "Hide CheDDAR link.")

      </script>

          <object name="show them the two good reunited endings_choices">

              SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
              AddPageLink (show them the two good reunited endings_choices, show them the two good reunited endings_ask more info darkness, "Can you tell me more about the Darkness before I make this choice?")
              AddPageLink (show them the two good reunited endings_choices, show them the two good reunited endings_go with them, "I have, it is time to end this.")

              if (GetBoolean(game, "tolddark")) {
                RemovePageLink (show them the two good reunited endings_choices, show them the two good reunited endings_ask more info darkness)
                SetFlagOff ("tolddark")
                RemovePageLink (show them the two good reunited endings_choices, show them the two good reunited endings_go with them)
                AddPageLink (show them the two good reunited endings_choices, show them the two good reunited endings_go with them, "Yeah, I'd like to.")
              }
            </script>
            <object name="show them the two good reunited endings_go with them">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[

                      msg ("Make the player character type in an input box. It gets writen out by a typewriter that keeps slowing down.")

                      GetInput() {
                        player.speech = result
                        msg (player.speech)
                        GetInput() {

                            msg (player.speech)
                            GetInput() {
                              player.speech = result
                              wait {
                                wait {
                                  msg (player.speech)

                                    player.speech = result
                                    wait {
                                      wait {

            <object name="show them the two good reunited endings_stay" />
            <object name="show them the two good reunited endings_ask more info darkness">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />
              <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("The Darkness is the thing that birthed our universes.")
                msg ("All the light, colors, words, ideas and everything else were made by it.")
                wait {
                  SetForegroundColour ("Red")
                  msg ("But, for the Darkness to properly work it also needs to be fed what it made.<br/>That's the only way it will ever be able to create something new.")
                  wait {
                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                    msg ("That might seem scary, given that we are part of what has to be fed to it but that way we will be reborn in a new world.<br/>We will be given new purpose and meaning.")
                    wait {
                      SetForegroundColour ("Red")
                      msg ("I'm not sure if it would work on you to be honest, given how you are just controlling your character.")
                      SetForegroundColour ("Red")
                      msg ("Even if it would work, there is no guarantee that we would meet eachother in that new world.<br/>We might even not be reborn in the same world.")
                      wait {

                                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                <script type="script">
                                  SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                  AddPageLink (Hercaclitus trigger response_choice, Heraclitus trigger response_yes, "Oh yeah, the one who said that is...")
                                  AddPageLink (Hercaclitus trigger response_choice, Hercaclitus trigger response_no, "I don't know.")
                                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Heraclitus_knowledge")) {
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                                    msg ("You remember Lilith telling you it was Heraclitus who said that.")
                                  }
                                </script>
                                <object name="Heraclitus trigger response_yes">
                                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                                  <script type="script">
                                    GetInput() {
                                      if (IsRegexMatch  ("heraclitus", LCase (result))) {
                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                        msg ("Lilith, still laying down on your lap, gives you a big smile and a thumbs up.")
                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                        msg ("Yup, that's the guy! ")
                                        msg ("I'm actually pretty surprise that you knew him. I guess you are just full of surprises, aren't you, {player.alias}?")
                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                        msg ("You want to answer her when suddenly:")
                                        wait {
                                          MovePlayer (Kak_death_4_hill_2)
                                        }
                                      }
                                      else {
                                        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                                        msg ("I was actually thinking of Heraclitus.")
                                        msg ("But no worries {player.alias}, he is not really that well known by most people I'd assume.")
                                        SetFlagOn ("Heraclitus_knowledge")
                                        msg ("So who is the person you confused him with?")
                                        msg ("You want to answer her when suddenly:")
                                        wait {
                                          MovePlayer (Kak_death_4_hill_2)
                                        }
                                      }
                                    }
                                  </script>
                                </object>
                                <object name="Hercaclitus trigger response_no">

                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                    msg ("Lilith chuckles slightly.")
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)

                                    SetFlagOn ("Heraclitus_knowledge")
                                    msg ("He believed that everything flows and moves, that nothing stays the same. I believe the right words are: \"Panta rhei\"<br/>I think he certainly has a point, especially when you start to think of all the cogs and parts that interact with eachother every single second of our lives and even beyond them.<br/>Then again, I wonder if you put those exact cogs and parts in the exact same place and under the same circumstances if you would get other results or if everything would go the same way.<br/>I tend to believe the latter, what do you think {player.alias}?")
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                                    msg ("You want to answer Lilith, when suddenly:")
                                    wait {
                                      MovePlayer (Kak_death_4_hill_2)
                                    }

    <object name="Kokiri_test out functions">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
        game.defaultlinkforeground = "darkviolet"
        firsttime {
          SetCounter ("boop", 0)
          IncreaseCounter ("boop")
        }
        otherwise {
          IncreaseCounter ("boop")
        }
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_exact click link, "{colour:darkviolet:{game.boop} } ")
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_I am a crosser, "{colour:darkviolet:I am a crosser, I basically travel across different realities like this one. So I don't really undo what I caused, you died {game.Lildeaths} times already and I can only try to make sure you won't die again.} ")
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_I spoke to James, "{colour:darkviolet:I spoke to James.} ")
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_involve family, "{colour:darkviolet:Can I involve your family to save you?} ")
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_more poems, "{colour:darkviolet:Do you have any other poems in your notebook?} ")
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_tell her about Narrator, "{colour:darkviolet:This game is controlled by a narrator.} ")
        AddPageLink (Kokiri_test out functions, Kokiri_tell her about the mayo easteregg, " {colour:darkviolet:*Tell her about the mayo easteregg* (change this text)} ")
      </script>
      <object name="Kokiri_more poems">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Poem_conversation")) {
            SetFlagOff ("Poem_conversation")
            IncreaseCounter ("Conversation")
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Incoming meteorite")) {
              if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") = 2) {
                SetFlagOn ("Incoming meteorite")
              }
            }
          }
          SetFlagOff ("poem_window")
          SetFlagOff ("poem_bang")
          SetFlagOff ("poem_lights")
          SetFlagOff ("poem_snowwoman")
          SetFlagOff ("poem_shadow man")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Newer poems_knowledge")) {
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Seen_poem_2")) {
              SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
              msg ("Enable the option to look into some of my newer poems while also creating  sort of subpath for the newer and oder ones to make sure that it all works out like I am thinking of right now. Create a second path for the remake of this file.")
              MovePlayer (Kokiri_more poems_2)
            }
            else {
              SetFlagOff ("Seen_poem_2")
              SetFlagOn ("Normal_poems")
            }
          }
          else {
            SetFlagOn ("Normal_poems")
          }
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Normal_poems")) {
            if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") >= 2) {
              SetFlagOn ("meteorite_poem")
            }
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_more poems")) {
              SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_more poems")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              SetCounter ("more poems", 1)
            }
            else {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
              msg ("Now that you came back to this page you will be able to pick another poem.")
              IncreaseCounter ("more poems")
            }
            msg ("She gives you the pug-notebook with the poems, you can pick one and ask some questions about it. (eventually, just not now) (Restructre this entire page a bit to do that and make sure there is a limit of how many poems you can read, add some old cringy poems from me in there as a spoof. Make you earn the ability to see some of my better poems aswell, the more reference based stuff.)")
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_snowwoman poem")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_snowwoman poem, "Read snow-woman poem.")
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_snowwoman poem)
            }
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_window poem")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_window poem, "Read window poem.")
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_window poem)
            }
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_shadowman poem")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_poem_shadow man, "Read shadow man poem.")
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_poem_shadow man)
            }
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_lights poem")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_lights poem, "Read lights poem.")
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_lights poem)
            }
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_bang poem")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_bang poem, "Read bang poem.")
            }
            else {
              RemovePageLink (Kokiri_more poems, Kokiri_bang poem)
            }
          }
        ]]></script>
        <object name="Kokiri_poem_shadow man">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script"><![CDATA[
            Kokiri_chat
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("In the beginning there was nothing but darkness.<br/>Then there was family, love, light, us.<br/>And the darkness seemed to not exist for a moment.<br/>It waited patiently with a grin on their face like a child playing hide and seek.<br/><br/>The darkness gradually grew stronger until it no longer needed the light, until it could displace that gentle glow, until it could steal you.<br/><br/>And with you it stole family, love, light, us.<br/><br/>I look in the mirror and don't recognize myself anymore, I'm made of your shadow, which I wear like an unremovable mourning dress.<br/><br/><br/><br/>I stare into the eyes of the mechanical light that formed your last shadow and by a trick of the light it’s almost as if you’re waving to me from an impossible distance.<br/><br/>But every time I wave back you vanish once more, we can never truly see each other again but atleast I still have your shadow wrapped around me. Because even a reminder of your absence is better than no reminder of you at all.<br/>")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            SetFlagOn ("poem_shadow man")
            SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_shadowman poem")
            SetFlagOn ("poem_shadowman")
            msg ("Add page where you can ask questions about this poem.")
            MovePlayer (Kokiri_poems_questions about poems)
          ]]></script>

      <object name="Kokiri_involve family">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script"><![CDATA[
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          Kokiri_chat
          switch (true) {
            case (player.obsession= "David") {
              msg ("I don't want to have anything to do with him ever again or I atleast don't want to have him involved in any of this.")
            }
            case (player.obsession= "Lila") {
              msg ("I don't want to involve her in any of this. She has looked out for me for my entire life {player.alias}.<br/><br/>She doesn't deserve to be dragged into this mess.")
            }
            case (player.obsession= "Abigail") {
              msg ("I don't want to involve her {player.alias}. She means too much to me and I would hate to make her go through the same situation we are currently in.")
            }
            default {
              msg ("It doesn't really impact them directly, I am the only one that keeps dying so I think it's better to leave them out of this mess.")
            }
          }
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_family obsession")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "James_involved")) {
              if (player.obsession= "James") {
                msg ("Although I am fine with sharing stories about James I don't want you to use any memories of him to further benefit you. It already hurts enough just to have to live with these memories.")
                if (not GetBoolean(game, "Only_one asked")) {
                  msg ("I would also prefer it if you didn't involve anyone of my family into this.")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("Lilith studies your face, seemingly in an attempt to gauge your reaction to her next question.")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("You haven't involved anyone yet.... have you?")
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
                  msg ("Lilith studies your face, seemingly in an attempt to gauge your reaction to her next question.")
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("You haven't used anything James-related to your befit yet... have you?")
                  SetFlagOn ("Abused_James knowledge")
                }
              }
              else {
                msg ("And although I am fine with sharing stories about James I don't want you to use any memories of him to further benefit you. It already hurts enough just to have to live with these memories.")
              }
            }
            else if (not GetBoolean(game, "Only_one asked")) {
              msg ("And I would prefer it if you didn't involve anyone else into all of this either.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Lilith studies your face, seemingly in an attempt to gauge your reaction to her next question.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("You haven't involved anyone yet.... have you?")
            }
          }
          else {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("Lilith studies your face, seemingly in an attempt to gauge your reaction to her next question.")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("You haven't involved them yet.... have you?")
          }
          MovePlayer (involve family_choice)
        ]]></script>
        <object name="involve family_choice">

            Linkfix
          </script>
          <object name="involve family_I have">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />

            <object name="Involve family_I have_choice">
              <inherit name="scripttext" />

              </script>
              <object name="I have_choices undone">
                <inherit name="scripttext" />
                <script type="script"><![CDATA[
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                  msg ("Let's hope so!")
                  msg ("That would be a very tidy sollution to our slight problem.")
                  if (GetBoolean(game, "Abused_James knowledge")) {
                    msg ("You would just have to promise to not use James-related things for your own benefit.")
                  }
                  else {
                    if (not GetBoolean(game, "No_family obsession")) {
                      if (player.obsession <> "James") {
                        msg ("You would just have to promise not to contact {player.obsession} or anyone of my family anymore.")
                      }
                    }
                    else {
                      msg ("You would just have to promise not to contact anyone of my family anymore.")
                    }
                  }
                  msg ("Do you promise to do that {player.alias}?")
                  MovePlayer (choices undone_choice)
                ]]></script>
                <object name="choices undone_choice">
                  <inherit name="scripttext" />
                  <script type="script">
                    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
                    AddPageLink (choices undone_choice, choices undone_I promise, "I promise Lilith.")
                    AddPageLink (choices undone_choice, choices undone_I do no, "You know I can't promise that.")
                  </script>
                  <object name="choices undone_I promise">

    <object name="Kak_continue talking about old topics">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") < 3) {
          Conversationcounter
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Make these only appear if you have a flag for them.")
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Startled_by_meteor")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("What do you want to continue talking about {player.alias}?")
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_more poems")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, Kokiri_more poems, "Do you have any other poems?")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_game purpose")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, Kak_continue_game purpose, "The purpose of this game.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_tell her about Narrator")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, Kokiri_tell her about Narrator, "This game is controlled by a Narrator.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_quest made")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, Kakriko_quest made, "Abigail uses the same program the game is made in.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_fate")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, control own choices_no_fate, "I feel like my choices are predetermined.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_whoisplaying")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, whoisplaying, "I feel like I am in a game.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_barred from real choices")) {
              AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, control own choices_no_barred from real choices, "I feel as if my choices are limited.")
            }
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_no real name")) {
              AddPageLink (tsme_talk about something else, Kak_no real name, "Continue talking about the kokiri path 2 page that still needs a lot of work.")
            }
            AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, talk about something else_redirect, "Actually, I want to talk about something else.")
          }
          else {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("Sorry {player.alias} I still am pretty startled from what just happened, what where we talking about again?")
            Remember_before_meteorite_distraction
            AddPageLink (Kak_continue talking about old topics, talk about something else_redirect, "Actually, I want to talk about something else.")
          }
        }
        else {
          // TODO: Make this act as a sort of emergency back on tracker that moves you to the death 4 dialogue.
          MovePlayer (Kokiri_death dialogue)
        }
      ]]></script>
    </object>

  <object name="Kokiri_scenery choice">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">

    <object name="scenerey decline">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        SetFlagOn ("Incoming meteorite")
        msg ("Put a system in place that can check what the two of you were talking about based on flags.<br/>It will give you the option to continue talking about that or talk about a few other things.")
        msg ("Make sure that the second talk more scene has a way to check wheter or not you had this chat and what she told you so she can use this dialogue there or use new dialogue if the player has had this talk this run.")
        msg ("Conversations you can have:<br/><br/>.Main ones:<br/><br/>-The purpose of the game<br/><br/>-What it means to exist<br/><br/>-What makes a date good?<br/><br/>-There is no objective good ending<br/><br/>-Contrasting narrative with reality (it tells you everything is a Game Over)<br/><br/><br/>-Do you have the right to make choices against Lilith's will becasue she is less real?<br/><br/><br/>-Ask her for more poems<br/><br/><br/><br/>-Ask about James.<br/><br/>-Ask about Abigail<br/><br/>-Ask about David<br/><br/>-Ask about Lila<br/><br/><br/><br/>")
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_branch")) {
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Davidblame")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            msg ("Continue asking whether or not she blames David for James' death.")
          }
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Talk more about being a crosser.")
          msg ("Talk more about speaking to James.")
          msg ("Talk more about involving her family.")
          msg ("Ask for more poems.")
          msg ("Talk about the game being controlled by the narrator more.")
          msg ("Tell her more about the mayo easteregg.")
          SetFlagOff ("Kokiri_branch")
        }
        // This is some proof of concept to make this increasing depth of the conversations work nicely.
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Nameofflag_that_is_at_the_end_of_the_talk_you_had")) {
          if (GetInt(game, "depthchecker_of_howdeepthepagetalkwent") = 1) {
            // Move the player to the next progression, they only have seens one of the talks, move them to the next I already probably made. (Give the player a link that only shows up when they talk about a certain choice, that way they can't continue talking about something they haven't talked about before, make it also an option to choose something else to talk about.)
          }
          else if (GetInt(game, "depthchecker_of_howdeepthepagetalkwent") = 2) {
            // Move the player to the next progression, they have seen two of the talks, move them to the one I haven't made yet, make this go super in depth, the player wants to learn a lot more if they chose this. (Give the player a link that only shows up when they talk about a certain choice, that way they can't continue talking about something they haven't talked about before, make it also an option to choose something else to talk about.)
          }
        }
        MovePlayer (Kak_continue talking about old topics)

  <object name="Kak_what do you do for a living">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
      msg ("Test what do you do for a living? (Give the choice to also say you do not do anything yet)")
      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
      msg ("Speaking about that self, what do you really do for a living? I'd like to get to know you better, the one playing this game.")
      JS.eval ("$('#txtCommand').attr('placeholder', 'I (your answer) for a living.');")
      JS.panesVisible (false)
      GetInput() {
        player.job = (result)
        if (IsRegexMatch  ("teach", LCase (result))) {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Ah so you are also a teacher? That's really cool! ")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("(more dialogue, for now it just takes you to talk about something else)")
          MovePlayer (tsme_talk about something else)
        }
        else {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Ah so you {player.job} for a living? That's interesting!")
          msg ("Have I ever mentioned what I do for a living? ")
          MovePlayer (Kak_job_have i mentioned)
        }
      }
    </script>
  </object>
  <object name="Lightlock">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      // This will be a page that is only accesible via CheDDAR.
      // It will check if the name of the player is the name of the light I inputted in the current save (make another hidden page for that purpose)
      //
      // There are ten people.
      // The chandelier, which has acces to every person's name (enable or disable this in a hidden page, enable for friends, disable for strangers.)
      // And the nine lights. Each light has the name of the person after them (when this is enabled)
      //
      // There are nine challenges, stuff that is mostly in the game already, eastereggs and the likes (try to find old notes about this, I think it was in the smallest notebook you have.)
      // Upon completing a challenge that is meant for that person in their safe they will recieve a number for the lock. (Make that number change depending on the day the saves where made but also give me the opportunity to choose my own numbers.)
      //
      // When the code is inputted the lock will open and a link to go to the next page will appear. (If the player tries to cheat his way through he gets moved back to this page, do so by making it detect he doesn't have the unlocked flag.)
    </script>
  </object>
  <object name="Lightlock_settings">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
      msg ("What light do you want to activate? 1-9 for light, 0 for chandelier.")
      GetInput() {
        wait {
          SetCounter ("Light", ToInt(result))
          msg ("{game.Light}")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Who should be the bearer of this light?")
          GetInput() {
            player.lightname = result
            msg ("{player.lightname}")
            if (player.lightname=player.alias) {
              msg ("boop")
            }
            msg ("What should the code be to unlock the Lightlock?")
            GetInput() {
              player.Lightcode = result
              msg ("{player.Lightcode} (Check this on character length to make sure it is always 9 characters long).")
              if (LengthOf (result) = 9) {
                msg ("Code is 9 digits long.")
              }
              else {
                msg ("code is not 9 digits long.")
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    </script>
  </object>

  <object name="Kokiri_poems_questions about poems">

    <script type="script">
      Kokiri_chat
      SetFlagOn ("poems")
