        msg ("You checked the shadow-man poem.")
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_snowwoman")) {
        msg ("You checked the snow-woman poem.")
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_lights")) {
        msg ("You checked the lights poem.")
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_bang")) {
        msg ("You checked the 'a bang to wake me up'  poem.")
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_window")) {
        msg ("You checked the window poem.")
      }
      MovePlayer (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems)
    </script>
    <object name="questions about poems_answers about poems">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("Make this a system that checks what poem you have been reading and what question you asked her.")
        if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_shadow man")) {
          msg ("You checked the shadow-man poem.")
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_snowwoman")) {
          msg ("You checked the snow-woman poem.")
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_lights")) {
          msg ("You checked the lights poem.")
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_bang")) {
          msg ("You checked the 'a bang to wake me up'  poem.")
        }
        else if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_window")) {
          msg ("You checked the window poem.")
        }

I just see the lead-up to the picture and not the horifying aftermath of it all.<br/><br/>However badly the memory of the aftermath still haunts me, I can't let that be the only part of his life I remember. I want to make sure all the beautiful memories we made throughout all the years will live on as long as possible. (Use that as a framing device for her telling you a few stories about him.)<br/><br/>So you wanted to hear about James right? <br/>I'll tell you some stories if you'd like, since if the stories only stay in my memories they can only exist for one more day. (Code/cipher breaker on birthday cards.) (Don't do this one, scrap it.)<br/><br/>------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------<br/><br/>1: The house we grew up in had a field that mostly grew corn on the opposite side.         <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
          AddPageLink (Kokiri_chat_Abigail, Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her, "Can you tell me about Abigail?")
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_quest made")) {
            AddPageLink (Kokiri_chat_Abigail, Kakriko_quest made, "Abigail uses the same program the game is made in.")
          }
          else {
            RemovePageLink (Kokiri_chat_Abigail, Kakriko_quest made)
          }
        </script>
        <object name="Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            if (GetInt(game, "Abigail") = 2) {
              SetCounter ("Abigail", 3)
            }
            SetFlagOn ("Abigail_char")
            Kokiri_chat
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            Family_curiosity_checker
            if (not GetBoolean(game, "Family_curiosity")) {
              if (not GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_Abigail")) {
                SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_Abigail")
                SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
                msg ("Well, as you probably already know Abigail is my little sis.")
                wait {
                  msg ("We went through a lot like most sisters but we always managed to get through it all.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("...This stays between us alright {player.alias}?")
                    wait {
                      msg ("...Lately I've had this weird feeling.")
                      wait {
                        msg ("As if there's something Abigail is hiding from me.")
                        wait {
                          msg ("She has always been the happy type but now there's something underlying in that happiness, something almost forced.")
                          wait {
                            msg ("She seems as if she's putting up a performance for someone.")
                            wait {
                              msg ("I really hope I am just wrong and that she just is happier than I have ever seen her for a positive reason.")
                              wait {
                                msg ("But I like to think that I know Abigail quite well and my guts are telling me something's wrong.")
                                wait {
                                  msg ("I just wish she would open up about it if there truly was something going on.")
                                  wait {
                                    SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                                    msg ("Rewrite this dialogue a bit more.")
                                    SetCounter ("Abigail", 1)
                                    SetFlagOn ("Abigail_hides_something_knowledge")
                                    MovePlayer (All characters family_talk about them_all choices)
                                  }
                                }
                              }
                            }
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
              else {
                SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                msg ("Now that you came back to this page you will be able to continue certain conversations from this page.")
                IncreaseCounter ("Abigail")
                if (GetInt(game, "Abigail") = 2) {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                  msg ("Placeholder 2.")
                  MovePlayer (All characters family_talk about them_all choices)
                }
                else {
                  SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
                  msg ("Placeholder 3.")
                  MovePlayer (All characters family_talk about them_all choices)
                }
              }
            }
            else {
              SetFlagOff ("Family_curiosity")
            }
          </script>
          <object name="Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her_call her">

                SetFlagOn ("Meteorite_prevented")

                SetForegroundColour (player.Abbycolor)
                msg ("...So it's true?")

                                          msg ("You are doing  a great job! You're telling me about this. <br/>That way I can help.   <object name="Kokiri_Death_Lilith leaves angrily">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script"><![CDATA[
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
      msg ("Lilith leaves angrily and trips over a branch, her head hits against a big rock.")
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)

      SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
      msg ("Lilith jumps up from where she was lying mere moments ago, on her face is a visible layer of anger or is it... dissapointment?<br/>You're not sure which one would sting more, probably a combination of the two.<br/>She wipes the crumbs on her clothes away with a frightening speed and begins walking off the hill.")

      msg ("Goodbye {player.alias}, we are done here. <br/>Do not come back if you have even the slightest slither of respect for me. (Make this only appear if you made one really big mistake)")

        msg ("The hill floats towards her and uses it's beams to trap her into the ufo.")
        msg ("The increased force of the gravity is pinning you against the hill but not for long, you begin to roll off the hill and fall down in the middle of a lake close to where the hill used to sit. ")
        msg ("All you can do is float there, powerless, while you watch the hill and Lilith getting swallowed by the ink-black sky. As you do you notice that there are some sort of thrusters sticking out from the bottom of the hill. (Search other words for hill.)")

          SetFontSize (29)
          msg ("<br/>Game over")
          SetFontSize (13)
          msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
          SetFontSize (player.nsize)
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)

            MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
          }
        }
      }

        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("Lilith angrily storms down the hill.")
        msg ("She doesn't get far from the hill, maybe a metre or fifteen before she seemingly trips over a tree root.")
        msg ("She does not get up.")
        msg ("When you rush to her you notice why.")
        msg ("Lilith fell on a small rock with her head.<br/>The end result looks horifying.<br/><br/>You call an ambulance but when they arrive they tell you what you already knew deep down.<br/><br/>She didn't make it.")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("Change the text above this to be a bit better.")

          SetFontSize (29)
          msg ("<br/>Game over")

  <object name="Test page for Linkfix system">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />

      SetFlagOn ("Incoming meteorite")
      SetFlagOn ("Car_caught")
      msg ("Test test")

      Kokiri_chat
      MovePlayer (Linkfix test question 1)

    <object name="Linkfix test question 1">

      </script>

  <object name="Kakariko Buffer 1">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      if (GetBoolean(game, "tell her about Nar")) {
        MovePlayer (tell her about Nar_ he said hi)
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "Lila_char")) {
        if (GetInt(game, "Lila") = 1) {
          MovePlayer (Kokiri_chat_Lila_talk about her_call her)
        }
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "Abigail_char")) {
        if (GetInt(game, "Abigail") = 1) {
          MovePlayer (Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her_call her)
        }
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "James_char")) {
        if (GetBoolean(game, "I spoke to James")) {
          MovePlayer (I spoke to James_I can prove it)
        }
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "poems")) {
        ClearScreen
        if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_window")) {
          MovePlayer (Kokiri_window poem_is poem about you)
        }
        else {
          MovePlayer (questions about poems_answers about poems)
        }
        // This acts as the place where you can ask questions about the poems.
      }
      else if (GetBoolean(game, "Sit_choice")) {
        SetFlagOff ("Sit_choice")
        SetFlagOn ("Normal_Kokiri_introduction")
        MovePlayer (Kokiri_woods_introduction)
      }
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
      msg ("Make this work with the other parts that still need to be made.")
    </script>
  </object>
  <object name="Kakariko Buffer 2">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      if (GetBoolean(game, "Sit_choice")) {
        SetFlagOff ("Sit_choice")
        SetFlagOn ("Alternate_Kokiri_introduction")
        MovePlayer (Kokiri_woods_introduction)
      }
    </script>
  </object>
  <object name="Extra cringy poems for Kokiri">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      // Some old poems from me from back in the day.
    </script>
    <object name="Kokiri_window poem">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetFlagOn ("connection_open eyes")
        SetFlagOn ("poem_window")
        SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_window poem")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("Windows of the soul,")
        msg ("<br/>Reflect like mirrors,")
        msg ("<br/>All the pain, the lies,")
        msg ("<br/>Of lost shadows on the street,")
        msg ("<br/>That fall in the darkness without moon.")
        wait {
          msg ("<br/>Their thoughts carved into the silenced stone.")
          msg ("<br/>Sometimes a little bit of light appears,")
          msg ("<br/>A star in their eyes,")
          msg ("<br/>But the light drowns in their tears")
          msg ("<br/>And then they stumble through their starless night.")
          wait {
            msg ("<br/>Hollow carcasses that got scraped empty slowly.")
            msg ("<br/>Waiting untill time dissolves their bodies.")
            msg ("<br/>Their eyes closed to run from the reflection.")
            msg ("<br/>An unspoken truth rests on their lips")
            msg ("<br/>They tumble deeper into this nightmare")
            msg ("<br/>With no beginning, with no end")
            msg ("<br/>But still they laugh their empty smiles")
            msg ("<br/>Speak their meaningless words of hope")
            msg ("<br/>Their eyes closed to keep the pain inside.")
            msg ("<br/>Hoping to one day wake up,")
            msg ("<br/>To open their eyes.")
            MovePlayer (Kokiri_poems_questions about poems)
          }
        }
      ]]></script>
      <object name="Kokiri_window poem_is poem about you">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("Well yes, or it used to be about me anyway.")
          msg ("Most of these poems are quite old so they don't really apply to the person I am anymore.")
          msg ("They are now just a part of my past that I sometimes like to look back on.")
          msg ("Even if it sometimes hurts it's very interesting to get a glimpse into how I used to be.")
          msg ("It's almost like a sort of archive of my mindset at a very specific moment in time.")
          MovePlayer (is poem about you_choice)
        </script>
        <object name="is poem about you_choice">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            AddPageLink (is poem about you_choice, is poem about you_did you wake up, "So did you wake up?")
            AddPageLink (is poem about you_choice, is poem about you_what time moment, "What moment of your life does this poem capture?")
          </script>
          <object name="is poem about you_did you wake up">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script">
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Lilith gives you a big smile and for a moment you could swear you saw something sparkle in her eyes.")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("I guess I did.")
              msg ("It's funny, because at that moment you are not really focussed on the shift in what you are feeling.")
              msg ("It sort of just... happens I suppose.")
              msg ("Sometimes it still feels as if I'm asleep, the feeling keeps haunting me.")
              msg ("But I've grown able to identify it better, so if I know the feeling has returned once again I'm able to better shield myself from it.")
              msg ("This life, even through all it's flaws, is still mine.")
              msg ("So I have to make sure it gets lived.")
              SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
              msg ("Add some extra dialogue. (Cuts to the talk about something else page for now)")
              MovePlayer (tsme_talk about something else)
            </script>
          </object>
          <object name="is poem about you_what time moment">
            <inherit name="scripttext" />
            <script type="script"><![CDATA[
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              msg ("Most of these poems were made around the time James... passed away.")
              msg ("Since I couldn't hold a camera without it falling on the ground I needed another outlet for my feelings.")
              msg ("At that time I still used to play the trombone but that wasn't really enough for me, I needed another outlet.")
              msg ("That's when I really started trying to make poems, before I used to make some smaller and sillier ones.")
              msg ("<br/>Sometimes I still like to make a poem but as of late I kind of have no idea what I should write about.")
              msg ("Most of my best poems were made when I was kind of in a bad mindset. <br/>But now that I'm doing pretty okay-ish in my life I can't write much more poems.<br/><br/>And the few things that do bother me have been so overdone as subjects of my poems that it feels wrong to write about them again.")
              msg ("Add some extra dialogue. (Cuts to the talk about something else page for now)")
              MovePlayer (tsme_talk about something else)
            ]]></script>
          </object>
        </object>
      </object>
    </object>
    <object name="Kokiri_bang poem">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        msg ("She kind of likes this one. (She is proud of it)")
        SetFlagOn ("connection_closed eyes")
        SetFlagOn ("poem_bang")
        SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_bang poem")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("A bang, to keep me awake<br/><br/>A mix of rust and salt on my tongue<br/><br/>Deep cut my broken dreams<br/><br/>in the skin of an idiot<br/><br/>It still rings in my ears<br/>")
        wait {
          msg ("The reality is breaking<br/><br/>I still can not understand it<br/><br/>A lie and still the truth")
          wait {
            msg ("<br/>Time seems to stand still<br/><br/>And yet I do not get any younger<br/><br/>But also not smarter<br/><br/>Just more of myself and then less")
            wait {
              msg ("<br/>Because everything finally falls down,<br/><br/>The leaves of a proud tree,<br/><br/>The feathers of lost birds,<br/><br/>My life.<br/>")
              wait {
                msg ("It is the law of gravity<br/><br/>Who laughs with us,<br/><br/>Who raised us.")
                wait {
                  msg ("<br/>The really much too heavy force.<br/><br/>Who slowly slaughter us,<br/><br/>Who slowly laughs at us,<br/><br/>Who is waiting for us.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("<br/>Constantly day and night<br/><br/>We push our whole life against a gigantic boulder on our hill and when we are at the top it slowly rolls to the other side.<br/><br/>I try to be smarter, different than they are.<br/>")
                    wait {
                      msg ("But that makes me exactly like them. My other me blames me every day<br/><br/>How I was the match, the fire and the ashes.<br/><br/>I cry for help but they do not hear it,<br/><br/>I cry for help but you do not hear it,<br/><br/>I cry for help but I do not hear it.<br/>")
                      wait {
                        msg ("Falling stars fall to the ground, I bathe in the light and yet I drown in the inkblack<br/><br/>Hopping for air, hoping for a sign I sink deeper and deeper and more and more unclear until nothing is left of me.<br/><br/>Dead hands pull me with them,<br/><br/>Living hands push me even further<br/><br/>Stuck in this night-filled  realm<br/><br/>With all the shadows<br/>")
                        wait {
                          msg ("But in the darkness of our thoughts<br/><br/>It looked like I could  see light<br/><br/>It was the moon that made all this nothing something.<br/><br/>It was the world that made this new something nothing.<br/><br/>It was me who closed my eyes.")
                          wait {
                            MovePlayer (Kokiri_poems_questions about poems)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]]></script>
    </object>
    <object name="Kokiri_lights poem">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetFlagOn ("poem_lights")
        SetFlagOn ("connection_locked inside")
        SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_lights poem")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("Turn the lights off, close the door.<br/><br/>No, I can’t do it anymore.<br/>")
        wait {
          msg ("Let me rot in this darkness<br/><br/>Leave me alone in this madness")
          wait {
            msg ("<br/>Don’t let the darkness escape.<br/><br/>Don’t let my thoughts take shape")
            wait {
              msg ("<br/>Let the ghost fight her ghosts.<br/><br/>Leave the host to her hosts.")
              wait {
                msg ("<br/>Leave the echo with the voices<br/><br/>Leave the silence with the noises.")
                wait {
                  msg ("<br/>Leave my darkened mind in the dark.<br/><br/>Leave the fish with the shark.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("<br/>Voices whispering from the dark.<br/><br/>Trying to erase my small spark.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("<br/>Invisible hands let me drown in ink.<br/><br/>I can’t stop this no matter what I think.")
                      wait {
                        msg ("<br/>Leave me to suffer.<br/><br/>Leave me to me, the duffer.")
                        wait {
                          msg ("<br/>Leave me alone in here.<br/><br/>You can't fight my fear.")
                          wait {
                            msg ("<br/>Leave me alone.<br/><br/>Leave the sculptor with her stone.")
                            MovePlayer (Kokiri_poems_questions about poems)
                          }
                        }
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]]></script>
    </object>
    <object name="Kokiri_snowwoman poem">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script"><![CDATA[
        SetFlagOn ("poem_snowwoman")
        SetFlagOn ("connection_locked outside")
        SetFlagOn ("Conversation tracker_snowwoman poem")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("I am sitting against a locked door.<br/><br/>I don't have the key aymore.")
        wait {
          msg ("<br/>I am freezing to death.<br/><br/>Trying to keep myself warm with my breath.")
          wait {
            msg ("<br/>What I wouldn’t do to get inside<br/><br/>Cold tears I cried.")
            wait {
              msg ("<br/>I am falling in the snow.<br/><br/>The icy wind continues to blow.")
              wait {
                msg ("<br/>I see the fire flickering red,<br/><br/>The fire that led to my death")
                wait {
                  msg ("<br/>The snow covers my carcas,<br/><br/>the snow erases who I was.")
                  wait {
                    msg ("<br/>Now I’m dreaming about that unreachable fire.<br/><br/>That is the only thing I desire.")
                    wait {
                      msg ("<br/>So close yet so far<br/><br/>from that fire flickering like a star.")
                      wait {
                        msg ("<br/>I wasn't much but I became less than.<br/><br/>I died and I  became a snow-woman.")
                        MovePlayer (Kokiri_poems_questions about poems)
                      }
                    }
                  }
                }
              }
            }
          }
        }
      ]]></script>
    </object>
  </object>

          if (GetBoolean(game, "poem_bang")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            msg ("Oh, thank you very much! ")
            msg ("Personally I don't find the poem very good but it does show some potential.<br/>I'm really flattered you like it though!<br/><br/>To me those poems will always be remnants of my times as an inexperienced writer and poet but I'm flatteredl!<br/><br/>I haven't written a lot of new poems lately, the few I have are a whole lot longer and kind of hard to get since they reference a lot of Greek and Roman mythology.<br/>If you like to I could also show you them but just be warned that they are a lot less accessible than my poems from back in the day.")

          }
          else {

        AddPageLink (Kokiri_call_Lila of Abby_choice, Kokiri_call_Lila of Abby_convince her, "Well, you are still going to die so there isn't really anything holding you back now. You could finally get clarity on the situation.")
      </script>
      <object name="Kokiri_call_Lila of Abby_convince her">
        <inherit name="scripttext" />
        <script type="script">
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("Change the upcoming text a bit.")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
          msg ("I suppose you are right {player.alias}. I might aswell call now.")
          // Add a check here to see f she's in the wrong spot and you know about the meteor. If you do you can tell her to sit somewhere to your left.
          if (not GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_alternate place")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_death_1")) {
              MovePlayer (call_Lila of Abby_warn her meteor)
            }
            else {
              if (GetBoolean(game, "Abigail_char")) {
                MovePlayer (Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her_call her)
              }
              else {
                MovePlayer (Kokiri_chat_Lila_talk about her_call her)
              }
            }
          }
          else {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Abigail_char")) {
              MovePlayer (Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her_call her)
            }
            else {
              MovePlayer (Kokiri_chat_Lila_talk about her_call her)
            }
          }
        </script>
        <object name="call_Lila of Abby_warn her meteor">
          <inherit name="scripttext" />
          <script type="script">
            SetFlagOn ("Meteorite_alert")
            SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Abigail_char")) {
              AddPageLink (call_Lila of Abby_warn her meteor, Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her_call her, "You might want to sit to my right instead of my left before you start your call, trust me.")
              RemovePageLink (call_Lila of Abby_warn her meteor, Kokiri_chat_Lila_talk about her_call her)
            }
            else {
              AddPageLink (call_Lila of Abby_warn her meteor, Kokiri_chat_Lila_talk about her_call her, "You might want to sit to my right instead of my left before you start your call, trust me.")
              RemovePageLink (call_Lila of Abby_warn her meteor, Kokiri_chat_Abigail_talk about her_call her)
            }
          </script>
        </object>
      </object>
    </object>
  </object>

  <object name="Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems">
    <inherit name="scripttext" />
    <script type="script">
      if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") = 2) {
        SetFlagOn ("meteorite_poem")
      }
      Linkfix
      SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
      AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1, "Well, what does.... (Make this link do something and put a few others here)")
      AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kokiri_poems_rate them, "Rate the poem. (Menu selection to let her know what you thought about it.)")
      switch (true) {
        case (GetBoolean(game, "poem_window")= true) {
          AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1, "Is the poem about you?")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_closed eyes")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_open eyes")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kokiri_poems_question_connection between poems, "There seems to be a connection between some of your poems. In one you close your eyes, in the other the shadows hope to open their eyes. Was that intentional?")
            }
          }
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "poem_bang")= true) {
          AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1, "Is the poem about you?")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_closed eyes")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_open eyes")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kokiri_poems_question_connection between poems, "There seems to be a connection between some of your poems. In one you close your eyes, in the other the shadows hope to open their eyes. Was that intentional?")
            }
          }
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "poem_lights")= true) {
          AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1, "Is the poem about you?")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_locked inside")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_locked outside")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kokiri_poems_question_connection between poems, "There seems to be a connection between some of your poems. In one you seem to be locked inside and in the other you are locked outside. Was this intentional?")
            }
          }
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "poem_snowwoman")= true) {
          AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1, "Is the poem about you?")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_locked inside")) {
            if (GetBoolean(game, "connection_locked outside")) {
              AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kokiri_poems_question_connection between poems, "There seems to be a connection between some of your poems. In one you seem to be locked inside and in the other you are locked outside. Was this intentional?")
            }
          }
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "poem_shadowman")= true) {
          AddPageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1, "Is the poem about you?")
        }
        default {
          SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
          msg ("Filler to hopefully prevent crash.")
        }
      }
      if (GetBoolean(game, "Poem_rate block")) {
        RemovePageLink (Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, Kakariko Buffer 1)
        // Fix this, it removes the wrong link sometimes since multiple pages can link to the first buffer.
      }
    </script>
    <object name="Kokiri_poems_question_connection between poems">
      <inherit name="scripttext" />
      <script type="script">
        SetForegroundColour ("OrangeRed")
        msg ("I am honestly not entirely sure.")
        msg ("I definetly see where you are coming from but I think that most similarities are actually a coincidence.")
        msg ("I do really like to make some of my poems cyclical or make them reference eachother.")
        msg ("But the poems where I really started to do that actually were a lot more recent.")
        msg ("Due to me referencing my past poems in them they are pretty inacessible for readers.")
        msg ("It doesn't help that most of them use quite a few references to mythology.")
        SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
        msg ("Make the player able to ask if they can read some of those harder poems. (Make them the poems I kind of like)")
        SetFlagOn ("Newer poems_knowledge")
        MovePlayer (tsme_talk about something else)
      </script>
    </object>

  <function name="SetTimeAndDate"><![CDATA[
    JS.eval ("var today = new Date();var dd = today.getDate();var mm = today.getMonth()+1;var yyyy = today.getFullYear();var hrs = today.getHours();var mins = today.getMinutes();var secs = today.getSeconds();if(dd<10) {	dd = '0'+dd} if(mm<10) {	mm = '0'+mm} today = mm + '/' + dd + '/' + yyyy;if(hrs>12) {	ampm = 'am';	hrs = '0' + '' + hrs - 12}else{	ampm = 'pm'} if (mins<10) {	mins = '0'+mins} if(secs<10) {secs = '0' + secs}time = hrs + ':' + mins + ':' + secs + ' ' + ampm;ASLEvent('SetDate',today);ASLEvent('SetTime',time);")
  ]]></function>
  <function name="SetupDate" parameters="param">
    params = Split(param,";")
    calendar.day = params[0]
    calendar.day = ToInt(calendar.day)
    calendar.month = params[1]
    calendar.month = ToInt(calendar.month)
  </function>
  <function name="SetMonth" parameters="month">
    player.month = month
  </function>
  <function name="HolidayMessage" parameters="holiday" type="string">
    return (StringDictionaryItem(player.holidays,holiday))
  </function>
  <function name="SetHoliday" parameters="holiday">
    player.isHoliday = true
    player.holiday = holiday
  </function>
  <function name="SetDay" parameters="day">
    player.day = day
  </function>
  <function name="SetTempF" parameters="temp">
    player.tempF = temp
  </function>
  <function name="SetWeatherCode" parameters="weatherCode">
    player.weatherCode = weatherCode
  </function>
  <function name="SetCityFromWeather" parameters="city">
    player.weatherCity = city
  </function>
  <function name="SetTempCelsius" parameters="tempCelsius">
    player.tempC = tempCelsius
  </function>
  <function name="WeatherStatus" parameters="code" type="string">
    status = StringDictionaryItem(player.weatherCodeDict,code)
    return (status)
  </function>
  <function name="SetCityManually" parameters="city">
    player.playerCity = city
  </function>
  <function name="SetYear" parameters="year">
    player.year = year
  </function>
  <function name="SetDate" parameters="date">
    player.dateAsString = date
  </function>
  <function name="SetTime" parameters="time">
    player.timeJS = time
  </function>
  <function name="SetHours" parameters="hrs">
    player.hoursJS = ToInt(hrs)
  </function>
  <function name="SetMinutes" parameters="min">
    player.minutesJS = ToInt(min)
  </function>

  </function>

  <function name="SeenEverything">
    SetFlagOn ("Chinese_death_1")
    SetFlagOn ("Cafe_taste")
    SetFlagOn ("Cafe_death_1")
    SetFlagOn ("Burger_death_1")
    SetFlagOn ("Chinese_death_2")
    SetFlagOn ("Cafe_death_2")
    SetFlagOn ("Burger_death_2")
    // Car deaths here.
    SetFlagOn ("Chinese_car_death")
    SetFlagOn ("Cafe_car_death")
    SetFlagOn ("Burger_car_death")
    SetFlagOn ("Story_start")
    SetFlagOn ("Story_medium")
    SetFlagOn ("Story_end")
    SetFlagOn ("Psychic_answer_right")
    SetFlagOn ("Groundhog_answer_right")
    SetFlagOn ("Psychic_answer_right")
    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_1")
    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_2")
    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_3")
    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri_death_4")
    SetFlagOn ("Kak_death_4_hill")
    SetFlagOn ("Kak_death_4_no hill")
    SetFlagOn ("Brother_knowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("R1knowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("R2knowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("R3knowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("Kokiri")
    SetFlagOn ("jokeknowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("carknowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("bedcheck")
    SetFlagOn ("Ronknowledge")
    SetFlagOn ("Beach_invite")

    SetFlagOn ("Quest")

  <function name="Kokiri_chat"><![CDATA[
    SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
    msg ("Kokiri_chat check...")
    SetFlagOn ("Continue_conversation")
    SetFlagOn ("Kok_chat")
    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_alternate place")) {
      if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") > 1) {
        SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
        msg ("If the counter works properly you should see this.")
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Incoming meteorite")) {
          SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
          msg ("If the incoming meteorite part works then you should see this message.")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_death_1")) {
            SetFlagOn ("Portable_ prevent_death_1")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
            SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
            msg ("Kokiri_chat works.")
          }
        }
        else if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") = 3) {
          // Fix this a bit more, this should set a flag that after a while moves the player to the page below this text.
          // MovePlayer (Kak_death_4_hill_2)
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("If you see this text you will be moved to the death page in the future (unless it shows up too soon)")
        }
        else {
          SetFlagOn ("Continue_conversation")
        }
      }
      else {
        SetFlagOn ("Continue_conversation")
      }
    }
  ]]></function>
  <function name="Conversationfix">
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Ignore_conversation")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Ignore_conversation")
    }
  </function>
  <function name="Linkfix">
    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_alternate place")) {
      if (GetBoolean(game, "Portable_ prevent_death_1")) {
        AddPageLink (player.parent, Kokiri_Death_1_prevented, "You might want to sit on my right instead of my left.")
      }
      else {
        SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
        RemovePageLink (player.parent, Kokiri_Death_1_prevented)
      }
    }
    SetForegroundColour ("LightGreen")
    msg ("Linkfix works.")
  </function>
  <function name="Family_asked_how many times_counter">
    if (not GetBoolean(game, "Asked_about_family")) {
      SetCounter ("Family_ask", 1)
      SetFlagOn ("Asked_about_family")
    }
    else {
      IncreaseCounter ("Family_ask")
    }
  </function>
  <function name="Remember_before_meteorite_distraction">
    SetForegroundColour ("DarkGreen")
    SetFlagOn ("Meteorite_distraction_is_anoying")
    if (GetBoolean(game, "meteorite_poem")) {
      AddPageLink (player.parent, Kokiri_poems_question logic for poems, "You actually showed me one of your poems and I was going to say something about it. (Rewrite this slightly in the future)")
    }
    else {
      AddPageLink (player.parent, ListItem(player.pages, game.prevprev_page), "Go back to the page you were on before the meteorite distracted her.")
    }
    RemovePageLink (player.parent, Kokiri_Death_1_prevented)
  </function>
  <function name="Kokiri_chat_reset_counters_and_flags">
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_Abigail")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_Abigail")
      SetCounter ("Abigail", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_David")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_David")
      SetCounter ("David", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_James")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_James")
      SetCounter ("James", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_Lila")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_Lila")
      SetCounter ("Lila", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_more poems")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_more poems")
      SetCounter ("more poems", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_game purpose")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_game purpose")
      SetCounter ("game purpose", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_tell her about Narrator")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_tell her about Narrator")
      SetCounter ("tell her about Narrator", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_quest made")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_quest made")
      SetCounter ("quest made", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_fate")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_fate")
      SetCounter ("fate", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_whoisplaying")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_whoisplaying")
      SetCounter ("whoisplaying", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_barred from real choices")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_barred from real choices")
      SetCounter ("barred from real choices", 0)
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_blame David")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_blame David")
    }
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Conversation tracker_I spoke to James")) {
      SetFlagOff ("Conversation tracker_I spoke to James")
    }
  </function>
  <function name="Judge_player_for_actions">
    // Write the code here to create a system that can judge the player based on which actions they took.
    //
    // Actions to judge:
    //
    // -Peeking at the phone.
    //
    // -Contacting family when you know that she doesn't want you to do that.
    //
    // -Being rude to her in general. (Multiple times)
    //
    // -Lying to her.
    //
    // -Telling her she doesn't matter.
    //
    // -Telling James she doesn't matter.
  </function>
  <function name="Family_curiosity_checker">
    if (GetInt(game, "Family_ask") = 3) {
      // This will make sure that the incoming text is tailored to the charachter you asked about.
      Involve family_custom dialogue system
      // Save the page where you asked about someone so for example you asked about Abigail's quest game. Then an if else flag should check wheter or not she asks you about your curiosity first or you get to see the normal stuff, you get to see the normal stuff afterwards in the worst case scenario.
      SetFlagOn ("Family_curiosity")
      player.moveback_curiosity = player.current_page
      SetCounter ("Family_ask", 0)
      switch (true) {
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Interest_James")= true) {
          player.obsession = "James"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Obsession_James")= true) {
          SetFlagOn ("Only_one_asked")
          player.obsession = "James"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Interest_David")= true) {
          player.obsession = "David"
          player.fampronoun = "him"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Obsession_David")= true) {
          SetFlagOn ("Only_one_asked")
          player.obsession = "David"
          player.fampronoun = "him"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Interest_Abigail")= true) {
          player.obsession = "Abigail"
          player.fampronoun = "her"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Obsession_Abigail")= true) {
          SetFlagOn ("Only_one_asked")
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          player.obsession = "Abigail"
          player.fampronoun = "her"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Interest_Lila")= true) {
          player.obsession = "Lila"
          player.fampronoun = "her"
        }
        case (GetBoolean(game, "Obsession_Lila")= true) {
          SetFlagOn ("Only_one_asked")
          player.obsession = "Lila"
          player.fampronoun = "her"
        }
        default {
          SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
          msg ("This message should trigger if you don't have asked her about someone more than one times.")
        }
      }
      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
      if (GetBoolean(game, "Only_one_asked")) {
        msg ("You know, you have quite an interest in {player.obsession}. (change this line)")
        if (player.obsession= "James") {
          msg ("You haven't been using info about him to try to \"win\" the game, right?")
        }
        else {
          msg ("You haven't involved {player.fampronoun} in all of this yet, right?")
        }
      }
      else {
        if (player.obsession= true) {
          msg ("You know, you have quite an interest in my family, {player.obsession} in particular. (change this line)")
          if (player.obsession= "James") {
            msg ("You haven't been using info about him and my family to try to \"win\" the game, right?")
          }
          else {
            msg ("You haven't involved {player.fampronoun} or anyone else in all of this yet, right?")
          }
        }
        else {
          msg ("You know, you have quite an interest in my family. (Change this line)")
          msg ("You haven't involved them yet in all of this, right?")
          SetFlagOn ("No_family obsession")
        }
      }
      MovePlayer (Kokiri_involve family)
    }
  </function>
  <function name="Moveback_to_family_page">
    MovePlayer (player.moveback_curiosity)
    // Add a script that makes the segway a bit smoother.
    // Make part of it based on flags the pages themselves set and read the counter to have a brief line of commentary about where she was in her story.
  </function>
  <function name="Railroad_poems">
    SetForegroundColour (player.playcolor)
    AddPageLink (player.current_page, tsme_talk about something else, "Talk about something else.")
    AddPageLink (player.current_page, Kokiri_more poems, "Read another poem")
    SetFlagOn ("Poem_conversation")
  </function>
  <function name="Scenery_already_seen_checker">
    if (GetInt(game, "Conversations") = 2) {
      // If the player has about the same value where Lilith normally asks to see the scenery she will ask again, Add the Scenery_seen tag as a sort of safety if things were to go wrong.
      if (not GetBoolean(game, "Scenery_seen")) {
        SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
        msg ("For a moment everything grows silent as Lilith stares into the distance. (Write this line better)")
        SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
        msg ("Would you like to watch the scenery with me {player.alias}? It looks absolutely beautiful.")
        MovePlayer (Kokiri_scenery choice)
      }
    }
  </function>
  <function name="Involve family_custom dialogue system"><![CDATA[
    if (GetBoolean(game, "James_char")) {
      switch (true) {
        case (game.James=2) {
          SetFlagOn ("Interest_James")
        }
        case (game.James=3) {
          SetFlagOn ("Obsession_James")
        }
      }
    }
    else if (GetBoolean(game, "David_char")) {
      switch (true) {
        case (game.David=2) {
          SetFlagOn ("Interest_David")
        }
        case (game.David=3) {
          SetFlagOn ("Obsession_David")
        }
      }
    }
    else if (GetBoolean(game, "Abigail_char")) {
      switch (true) {
        case (game.Abigail=2) {
          SetFlagOn ("Interest_Abigail")
        }
        case (game.Abigail=3) {
          SetFlagOn ("Obsession_Abigail")
        }
      }
    }
    else if (GetBoolean(game, "Lila_char")) {
      switch (true) {
        case (game.Lila=2) {
          SetFlagOn ("Interest_Lila")
        }
        case (game.Lila=3) {
          SetFlagOn ("Obsession_Lila")
        }
      }
    }
    if (GetInt(game, "James") > 0) {
      SetFlagOn ("James_involved")
    }
  ]]></function>
  <function name="Kokiri_call_deaths"><![CDATA[
    if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_call")) {
      if (GetInt(game, "Call_deaths") = 0) {
        msg ("test")
        SetCounter ("Call_deaths", 1)
        // Check for the flag where you have prevented the meteorite death and make it set another flag that gives permission to the next part of the call to play.
        // Otherwise it doesn't play and instead cuts to a slightly special meteorite death.
        if (GetBoolean(game, "Kokiri_alternate place")) {
          // The meteorite death check is not needed here, it is very far from her.
          SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
          msg ("The same meteorite that had previously ended up cutting your date with Lilith short now passes by her, un-noticed as it breaks into several smaller pieces. <br/>They spreads across the entire forest, none of them landing even near her.<br/>You can't help but smile at the thought.<br/><br/>Lilith is so focussed on her conversation that she can't even suspect her past death. <br/>You think it's better that way, ignorance is bliss.")
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
            SetFlagOn ("Continue_call_one")
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("While Lilith is engrossed in her conversation you notice the Red-Sedan isn't showing up. Looks like your call to the police worked wonderfully.")
          }
          else {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("While Lilith is engrossed in her conversation you notice the Red-Sedan that rode up the hill and hit Lilith riding up the hill once again.<br/>You chuckle to yourself, you just prevented two deaths with one choice. That's not bad at all.<br/><br/>And yet, as the car drives fully up the hill you notice something. The car turns around and comes towards Lilith and you with an even more frightening speed than it had on the hill.<br/>The car appears to have gained momentum from the down-ward slope of the hill. You don't have much time to think about this before it comes hurdling towards the two of you. <br/>You instinctively jump out of the way. Lilith however didn't manage that. <br/><br/>You call an ambulance with shaking hands as you hear screaming coming from her phone. Your suspicion was proven true by the paramedics, she was dead as soon as that car hit her.")
            SetFontSize (29)
            msg ("<br/>Game over")
            SetFontSize (13)
            msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
            SetFontSize (player.nsize)
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            wait {
              MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
            }
          }
        }
        else {
          if (GetBoolean(game, "Meteorite_alert")) {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("The meteorite breaks into many different parts that spread all around the forest. One of them lands right where Lilith was sitting.<br/>For a brief moment you are reminded of the horible state she was in when it hit her head. You try to shake the feeling it gives you away and you half-succeed.<br/><br/>Lilith looks at you with visible shock in her eyes, knowing that she doesn't have much time left you point at the phone and motion her to continue calling.<br/>She nods and frowns slightly, she understands very well what you are not saying directly but thinking nonetheless.<br/>The end is near.<br/>Her end is near.")
            if (GetBoolean(game, "Car_caught")) {
              SetFlagOn ("Continue_call_one")
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("While Lilith is engrossed in her conversation you notice the Red-Sedan isn't showing up. Looks like your call to the police worked wonderfully.")
            }
            else {
              SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
              msg ("Suddenly you notice a strange sound. <br/>A red Sedan speeds towards the both of you with a frightening speed. Fight, flight or freeze. You have three options.<br/>You would like to think you would pick fight and push Lilith out of the way, somehow escaping at the same time.<br/><br/>And yet you instinctively pick flight as you jump away from the car.<br/>Sadly it seems Lilith did not do the same, she instead froze.<br/><br/>And now she is forever frozen as she lays there on the floor, unmoving.<br/><br/>You call an ambulance with shaking hands as you hear screaming coming from her phone. Your suspicion was proven true by the paramedics, she was dead as soon as that car hit her.<br/><br/>")
              SetFontSize (29)
              msg ("<br/>Game over")
              SetFontSize (13)
              msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
              SetFontSize (player.nsize)
              SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
              wait {
                MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
              }
            }
          }
          else {
            SetForegroundColour (player.Narcolor)
            msg ("The meteorite breaks into many different parts that spread all around the forest. One of them crashes straight against Lilith's head with a frightening impact.<br/>Her head is cracked open and a puddle begins to form around it. Everything around you turns silent. Even the phone which you know is currently screaming her lungs out.<br/><br/>You would also like to scream but all that manages to come out is the same silence that seems to have taken over the forest.<br/>It's almost as if the forest itself is mourning her death.<br/><br/>Some dark clouds move in front of the moon as if to stop it from revealing the state of Lilith's corpse. They are rather unsuccessful.<br/>Even if they had been succesful you are sure you still could see her body engraved in your eyelids.")
            SetFontSize (29)
            msg ("<br/>Game over")
            SetFontSize (13)
            msg ("<br/>Your date surely didn't go as planned.")
            SetFontSize (player.nsize)
            SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
            wait {
              MovePlayer (Start_music_pre)
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
    else {
    }
  ]]></function>
  <function name="Conversationcounter">
    IncreaseCounter ("Conversation")
  </function>
  <function name="Love_increase">
    IncreaseCounter ("Love")
  </function>
  <function name="Love_decrease">
    DecreaseCounter ("Love")
  </function>
  <function name="Kokiri_final death check">
    if (GetInt(game, "Conversation") = 3) {
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
      msg ("Kokiri_final death check function works.")
      MovePlayer (Kak_death_4_hill_2)
    }
    else {
      SetForegroundColour (player.Devcolor)
      msg ("Kokiri_final death check function works.")
      SetForegroundColour (player.Lilcolor)
      msg ("So, do you want to talk about something else?")
      MovePlayer (tsme_talk about something else)
    }
  </function>
  <function name="Railroad_riddles">
    wait {
      MovePlayer (After riddles_talking previous past)
    }
  </function>
